1.1: ƆFA A EDI KANNnwom –Dwom Nhyira ne onipa aontie amumɔyɛfo afotuna onni nnebɔneyɛfo nhwɛso akyina ɔntena fɛwdifo tenabea.
1.2: Na mmom, Awurade mmara sɔ nʼani,na osusuw ho awia ne anadwo.
1.3: Ɔte sɛ dua a wɔatɛw wɔ asuten ho,na ɛsow nʼaba ne bere mu anʼahaban no nguan da.Nea ɔyɛ biara yɛ yiye.
1.4: Nanso nnebɔneyɛfo nte saa;wɔte sɛ ntɛtɛ amframa bɔ gu.
1.5: Enti amumɔyɛfo rentumi nnyina atemmu no ano,na nnebɔneyɛfo nso rentena atreneefo asafo mu.
1.6: Efisɛ Awurade kyerɛ ɔtreneeni kwannanso amumɔyɛfo kwan de, ɛbɛyera.

2.1: Dwom Adɛn nti na amanaman no hyehyɛ bɔne hona nnipa no bɔ pɔw hunu yi?
2.2: Asase so ahemfo sɔre gyinana sodifo ka wɔn ho bɔ mutia Awurade ne Nea Wɔasra no no.
2.3: Wɔka se,“Momma yemmubu wɔn nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔnna yɛntow wɔn mpokyerɛ ngu.”
2.4: Nea ɔte agua so wɔ ɔsoro no serew;Awurade di wɔn ho fɛw.
2.5: Afei ɔka wɔn anim wɔ nʼabufuw mu,hunahuna wɔn wɔ nʼabufuwhyew mu, ka se,
2.6: “Masi me Henewɔ Sion, me bepɔw kronkron no so.”
2.7: Mɛpae mu aka Awurade ahyɛde:Ɔka kyerɛɛ me se, “Woyɛ me Ba;nnɛ mayɛ wʼAgya.
2.8: Bisa me,na mede amanaman nyinaa bɛyɛ wʼagyapade,asase ano nyinaa bɛyɛ wo de.
2.9: Wode dade ahempema bedi wɔn so;na woabobɔ wɔn sɛ ɔnwemfo ahina.”
2.10: Enti mo ahemfo, munsua nyansa;monkae kɔkɔbɔ yi, mo asase sodifo.
2.11: Momfa osuro nsom Awuradena monsɛpɛw mo ho ahopopo mu.
2.12: Mumfew Ɔba no ano, na ne bo amfuwna mo akwan de mo bɛkɔ ɔsɛe mu,efisɛ nʼabufuwhyew tumi sɔre mpofirim.Nhyira ne wɔn a woguan toa no nyinaa.

3.1: Dwom Dawid dwom a ɔtoe bere a ɔreguan afi ne babarima Absalom anim.Awurade, hwɛ sɛnea mʼatamfo dɔɔso fa!dodow no ara na wɔsɔre tia me!
3.2: Bebree no ara ka fa me ho se,“Onyankopɔn rennye no.”
3.3: Nanso wo, Awurade, woyɛ nkatabo a atwa me ho ahyiamʼanuonyam, nea Ɔpagyaw me ti.
3.4: Meteɛ mu su frɛ Awurade,na ogye me so fi ne bepɔw kronkron no so.
3.5: Metɔ hɔ na meda a,minyan bio, efisɛ Awurade ma migyina.
3.6: Merensuro atamfo mpem mpem awɔatwa me ho ahyia no.
3.7: Sɔre, Awurade!Gye me, me Nyankopɔn!Bobɔ mʼatamfo nyinaa abogye;na tutu amumɔyɛfo se.
3.8: Awurade hɔ na ogye fi ba.Ma wo nhyira mmra wo nkurɔfo so.

4.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Sɛ misu frɛ wo a, gye me so,me trenee Nyankopɔn.Ma me ɔhome wɔ mʼahohia mu;hu me mmɔbɔ na tie me mpaebɔ.
4.2: Enkosi da bɛn na mobɛdan mʼanuonyam ahohora?Enkosi da bɛn na mobɛdɔ nneɛma hunu na moadi ahoni ahuhuw akyi?
4.3: Hu sɛ Awurade ayi nea ɔwɔ nyamesu ama ne ho;Awurade betie, sɛ misu mefrɛ no a.
4.4: Sɛ mo bo fuw a, monnyɛ bɔne;sɛ modeda mo mpa so a,monyɛ komm na monhwehwɛ mo koma mu.
4.5: Mommɔ afɔre a ɛfatana momfa mo werɛ nhyɛ Awurade mu.
4.6: Nnipa bebree bisa se:“Hena na ɔde yiyeyɛ bɛbrɛ yɛn?”Awurade, ma wʼanim hann no nhyerɛn yɛn so.
4.7: Fa anigye mmoroso hyɛ me koma mabere a wɔn aburow ne nsa foforo abu so no.
4.8: Mɛtɔ hɔ, na mada asomdwoe mu,efisɛ wo nko ara, Awurade,na woma metena dwoodwoo.

5.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade, yɛ aso ma me nsɛmna dwen mʼapinisi ho.
5.2: Tie me mmoa ho sufrɛ,me Hene ne me Nyankopɔn,efisɛ wo na mebɔ wo mpae.
5.3: Awurade, wote me nne anɔpa;anɔpa, mede mʼadesrɛ ba wʼanimna mede anidaso twɛn.
5.4: Wonyɛ Onyankopɔn a wʼani gye bɔne ho;na amumɔyɛfo rentumi ne wo ntena.
5.5: Ahantanfo rentumi nnyina wʼanim;wukyi wɔn a wɔyɛ bɔne nyinaa.
5.6: Wosɛe wɔn a wɔka atosɛm;Awurade kyimogyapɛfo ne asisifo.
5.7: Nanso me, wo mmɔborɔhunu bebrebe nti,mɛba wo fi;na nidi mu na mɛkotowakyerɛ wʼasɔredan kronkron no.
5.8: Awurade kyerɛ me kwanwɔ wo trenee mumʼatamfo nti,bɔ wo kwan tee wɔ mʼanim.
5.9: Wɔn anom asɛm baako mpo nyɛ nokware;ɔsɛe ahyɛ wɔn koma ma.Wɔn menewa yɛ ɔda a so abuewɔde wɔn tɛkrɛma ka nnaadaasɛm.
5.10: Onyankopɔn, bu wɔn fɔ!Ma wɔn pɔw bɔne nyɛ wɔn asehwe.Pam wɔn; esiane wɔn bɔne dodow no nti,efisɛ wɔasɔre atia wo.
5.11: Nanso ma wɔn a woguan ba wo nkyɛn no ani nnye;ma wɔmfa anigye nto dwom daa.Trɛw wo bammɔ mu wɔ wɔn so,na wɔn a wɔdɔ wo din noma wɔn ani nnye wɔ wo mu.
5.12: Awurade, ampa ara, wuhyira atreneefo;na wode wʼayamye twa wɔn ho hyia sɛ nkatabo.

6.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade nka mʼanim wɔ wʼabufuw mu,na ntwe mʼaso nso wɔ wʼabufuwhyew mu.
6.2: Hu me mmɔbɔ, Awurade, efisɛ meyɛ mmrɛw;Awurade sa me yarena me nnompe wɔ ahoyeraw mu.
6.3: Me kra wɔ ahohia mu.Enkosi da bɛn, Ao Awurade, enkosi da bɛn?
6.4: San bra, Awurade, na begye me nkwa;gye me, wo dɔ a enni nhuammɔ no nti.
6.5: Obi a wawu no renkae wo da,hena na ofi ɔda mu kamfo wo?
6.6: Apinisi ama mayɛ mmerɛw.Anadwo mu nyinaa mede agyaadwotwa fɔw me mpa,na me nusu fɔw me sumii.
6.7: Awerɛhow ama mʼani so ayɛ me kusuu.Ɛredum; mʼatamfo nyinaa nti.
6.8: Mo nnebɔneyɛfo, montwe mo ho mfi me ho!efisɛ Awurade ate me sufrɛ.
6.9: Awurade ate me mmɔborɔsu;Awurade tie me sufrɛ.
6.10: Mʼatamfo nyinaa anim begu asena wɔn ho adwiriw wɔn;na wɔapatuw de fɛre asan wɔn akyi.

7.1: Dwom Dawid adesrɛ dwom a Benyaminni Kus nsɛm nti ɔto maa Awurade.Awurade me Nyankopɔn,miguan toa wo;Gye me fi wɔn a wɔtaa me nyinaa nsam,
7.2: anyɛ saa a wɔbɛtetew me mu sɛ gyatana wɔatetew me mu asinasin aobiara rentumi nnye me.
7.3: Awurade me Nyankopɔn, sɛ mayɛ eyina sɛ afɔdi aba me so a,
7.4: sɛ mayɛ bɔne atia nea ɔne me te yiye,anaasɛ mabɔ me tamfo korɔn kwa a,
7.5: ɛno de ma mʼatamfo ntaa me na wɔmmɛto me;ma wontiatia me so wɔ fam,na wɔmma me funu nna mfutuma mu.
7.6: Sɔre wɔ wʼabufuw mu, Awurade!Sɔre tia mʼatamfo abufuw.Nyan, me Nyankopɔn; hyɛ atɛntrenee mmara.
7.7: Ma nnipadɔm mmetwa wo ho nhyia.Fi ɔsoro hɔ di wɔn so;
7.8: ma Awurade mmu nnipa no atɛn.Bu me atɛn, Awurade sɛnea me trenee te,sɛnea me nokwaredi te, Ao, Ɔsorosoroni.
7.9: Onyankopɔn treneeni,wo a wohwehwɛ adwene ne koma mu,fa amumɔyɛfo basabasayɛ bra awieina ma atreneefo nnya bammɔ.
7.10: Me nkatabo ne Ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔnnea ogye koma mu treneeni no.
7.11: Onyankopɔn yɛ otemmufo treneeni,Onyame a ɔda nʼabufuwhyew adi da biara.
7.12: Sɛ wansesa nʼadwene a,ɔbɛsew nʼafoa ano;obekuntun ne tadua na ɔde bɛmma ahyɛ mu.
7.13: Wasiesie nʼakode a ɛyɛ hu;ayɛ ne bɛmma a ɛredɛw no krado.
7.14: Nea onyinsɛn amumɔyɛna basabasayɛ ahyɛ no ma no, ɔwo nnaadaa.
7.15: Nea otu tokuru, na oyi mu dɔte nohwe tokuru a watu no mu.
7.16: Ɔhaw a ɔde ba no dan bɔ nʼankasa so;ne basabasayɛ bɔ nʼankasa ti so.
7.17: Mede aseda bɛma Awurade,ne trenee nti,na mato ayeyi dwom ayi Awurade, Ɔsorosoroni no din ayɛ.

8.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade, yɛn Awurade,wo din kɛseyɛ ada adi wiase mmaa nyinaa.Wode wʼanuonyamatimtim ɔsoro nohɔ,
8.2: mmofra ne nkokoaa mpo de wɔn anokamfo wo, wʼatamfo nti;na wode bɔ atamfo ne aweretɔfo ano.
8.3: Sɛ mehwɛ wo ɔsorosoro,wo nsateaa ano adwuma;ɔsram ne nsoromma awode obiara asi nʼafa a,
8.4: onipa ne hena a wokae no,na onipa ba nso ne hena a wʼani ku ne ho?
8.5: Wobɔɔ no ma ɔyɛɛ akumaa kakra sen abɔfona wode wʼanuonyam ne nidi abɔ no abotiri.
8.6: Woyɛɛ no ɔsodifo maa wo nsa ano nnwumawode nneɛma nyinaa ahyɛ nʼanan ase:
8.7: nguankuw ne anantwikuw nyinaane wuram mmoa nso,
8.8: wim nnomaane po mu mpataa,nea ɛnenam po mu akwan so nyinaa.
8.9: Awurade, yɛn Awurade,wo din yɛ kɛse wɔ asase nyinaa so!

9.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade, mefi me koma nyinaa mu ada wo ase.Mɛka wʼanwonwade no nyinaa.
9.2: Mɛma mʼani agye na madi ahurusi wɔ wo mu.Mɛto ayeyi dwom ama wo din, Ɔsorosoroni.
9.3: Mʼatamfo san wɔn akyi;wɔtetew hwe, na wowuwu wɔ wʼanim.
9.4: Woadi mʼasɛm ama me, na menya mʼahofadi;woatena wʼahengua so, abu atɛntrenee.
9.5: Woatwe amanaman no aso, na woasɛe amumɔyɛfo.Woapepa wɔn din a wɔrenkae wɔn bio.
9.6: Ɔsɛe a enni awiei ato ɔtamfo no,woatutu wɔn nkuropɔn;na wɔnkae wɔn bio mpo.
9.7: Awurade di hene daa daa;wasi nʼatemmu ahengua.
9.8: Ɔde trenee bebu wiase atɛn;ɔde atɛntrenee bedi nnipa no so.
9.9: Awurade yɛ guankɔbea ma wɔn a wodi wɔn nya no,ɔyɛ abandennen wɔ ahohia mmere mu.
9.10: Wɔn a wonim wo din no de wɔn ho bɛto wo so,efisɛ, wo Awurade, wunnyaw obiara a ɔhwehwɛ wo no mu da.
9.11: Monto ayeyi dwom mma Awurade a ɔte ahengua so wɔ Sion;mompae mu nka nea wayɛ wɔ amanaman no mu.
9.12: Na ɔkae nea ɔtɔ mogya so were no;ommu nʼani ngu ɔbrɛfo sufrɛ so.
9.13: Awurade, hwɛ sɛnea mʼatamfo teetee me!Hu me mmɔbɔ na yi me fi owu apon ano,
9.14: na matumi apae mu aka wʼayeyiwɔ Ɔbabea Sion apon ano,na madi ahurusi wɔ wo nkwagye no mu hɔ.
9.15: Amanaman mufo atɔ amoa a wɔatu no mu;afiri a wosum hintaw no ayi wɔn anan.
9.16: Awurade atɛntrenee da no adi;amumɔyɛfo nsa ano adwuma ayi wɔn.
9.17: Amumɔyɛfo san kɔ ɔda mu,amanaman a wɔn werɛ fi Onyankopɔn nyinaa.
9.18: Nanso ɛnyɛ daa na ne werɛ befi ohiani,anaasɛ mmɔborɔni anidaso bɛyera korakora.
9.19: Sɔre! Awurade, mma ɔdesani nni nkonim,bu amanaman no atɛn wɔ wʼanim.
9.20: Bɔ wɔn hu, Awurade;na ma wonhu sɛ, wɔyɛ adesa bi kɛkɛ.

10.1: Dwom Adɛn, Awurade, na wugyina akyirikyiri saa?Adɛn na wode wo ho ahintaw wɔ amanehunu mmere mu yi?
10.2: Omumɔyɛfo de ahantan taataa mmɔborɔfo,wɔn a ne nneyɛe mfiri yiyi wɔn no.
10.3: Ɔde nea ne koma hwehwɛ hoahoa ne ho;ohyira odifudepɛfo na oyi Awurade ahi.
10.4: Ahantan nti omumɔyɛfo nhwehwɛ Awurade;ne nsusuwii mu no Onyankopɔn nsi hwee.
10.5: Nʼakwan nyinaa mu odi yiye;ɔma ne ho so, na wo mmara mfa no ho;na odi nʼatamfo nyinaa ho fɛw.
10.6: Ɔka kyerɛ ne ho se: “Hwee remma minhinhim;mʼani begye daa, na merenkɔ amanehunu mu da.”
10.7: Nnome, atoro ne ahunahuna ahyɛ nʼanom ma;Ɔhaw ne mmusu hyɛ ne tɛkrɛma ase.
10.8: Ɔtɛw bɛn nkuraa no;ofi ahintawee kum nea onnim hwee,ohintaw hwɛ wɔn a ɔrehwehwɛ wɔn ayɛ wɔn bɔne no.
10.9: Ɔte sɛ gyata a wahintaw;ɔtɛw sɛ ɔbɛkyere mmɔborɔni;ɔkyere wɔn twe wɔn ase de wɔn kɔ ne bon mu.
10.10: Ɔdwerɛw wɔn a ɔkyere wɔn no ma wɔtɔ beraw;na ɔde nʼahoɔden ka wɔn hyɛ.
10.11: Ɔka kyerɛ ne ho se, “Onyankopɔn werɛ afi;wayi nʼani afi so na onhu.”
10.12: Sɔre, Awurade! Ma wo nsa so, Onyankopɔn.Mma wo werɛ mfi wɔn a wonni aboafo.
10.13: Adɛn nti na omumɔyɛfo yi Onyankopɔn ahi?Adɛn nti na ɔka kyerɛ ne ho se,“Ɔremfrɛ me akontaabu so?”
10.14: Nanso wo, Onyankopɔn, wuhu amanehunufo haw;na wayɛ wʼadwene sɛ wobɛhwɛ.Mmɔborɔni de ne ho ma wo;wo na woyɛ ayisaa boafo.
10.15: Bubu omumɔyɛfo ne ɔbɔnefo aprɛw;frɛ no na ommebu nʼamumɔyɛ ho nkontaa,nʼamumɔyɛ a anka wɔrenhu no.
10.16: Awurade yɛ ɔhene daa nyinaa;amanaman no bɛyera nʼasase so.
10.17: Awurade, wutie mmɔborɔfo adesrɛ;wohyɛ wɔn nkuran, na wutie wɔn sufrɛ,
10.18: na wudi ma ayisaa ne nea wɔhyɛ no so,sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a ɔdesani a ofi asase murenhunahuna bio.

11.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade mu na mede me werɛ ahyɛ.Adɛn na wutumi ka kyerɛ me se,“Tu te sɛ anomaa kɔ wo bepɔw so.
11.2: Na hwɛ, amumɔyɛfo akuntun wɔn ta mu,na wɔde wɔn mmɛmma asisi ahama sosɛ wɔbɛtow wɔ sum mude awɔ koma mu ahotefo.
11.3: Sɛ wɔresɛe fapem no a,dɛn na ɔtreneeni betumi ayɛ?”
11.4: Awurade wɔ nʼasɔredan kronkron no mu;Awurade te ne soro ahengua so.Ɔhwɛ nnipa mma,nʼani hwehwɛ wɔn mu.
11.5: Awurade hwehwɛ ɔtreneeni mu,na amumɔyɛfo ne wɔn a wɔpɛ basabasayɛ de,ne kra kyi wɔn.
11.6: Ɔbɛtɔ ogyatannaa ne sufre a ɛredɛwagu amumɔyɛfo so;na mframa a mu yɛ hyew bɛyɛ wɔn kyɛfa.
11.7: Awurade yɛ ɔtreneeni,na ɔpɛ atɛntrenee;wɔn a wɔteɛ no behu nʼanim.

12.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Boa yɛn, Awurade, na nyamesurofo asa;nokwafo ayera wɔ nnipa mu.
12.2: Obiara di atoro kyerɛ ne yɔnko;wɔn ano a ɛdɛfɛdɛfɛ no ka nnaadaasɛm.
12.3: Ma Awurade ntwa nnaadaa anone tɛkrɛma biara a ɛhoahoa ne ho nkyene;
12.4: nea ɛka se, “Yɛde yɛn tɛkrɛma bedi nkonim;yɛn ano bedi ama yɛn, na hena na odi yɛn so tumi?”
12.5: “Esiane ɔhyɛ a wɔde hyɛ mmɔborɔnine ohiani apinisi no nti,mɛsɔre afei,” Awurade na ose.“Mɛbɔ wɔn ho ban afi wɔn a wɔhaw wɔn no ho.”
12.6: Awurade asɛm yɛ nokwarete sɛ dwetɛ a wɔasɔn so wɔ fononoo mu,na wɔahoa ho mpɛn ason.
12.7: Awurade, wobɛkora mmɔborɔnina woabɔ yɛn ho ban afi saa nnipa yi ho afebɔɔ.
12.8: Amumɔyɛfo nenam sɛnea wɔpɛ,bere a adesamma de nidi ma afide.

13.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade enkosi da bɛn? Wo werɛ befi me afebɔɔ ana?Enkosi da bɛn na wode wʼanim behintaw me?
13.2: Enkosi da bɛn na mene mʼadwennwene bedi apereperena awerɛhow ahyɛ me koma mu daa?Mʼatamfo nni me so nkonim nkosi da bɛn?
13.3: Twa wʼani hwɛ me na bua me, Awurade, me Nyankopɔn.Ma mʼani so nyɛ hann, na manna owu nna.
13.4: Me tamfo bɛka se, “Madi ne so nkonim.”Na mʼahohiahiafo bedi ahurusi bere a mahwe ase.
13.5: Nanso mede me ho to wo dɔ a ɛnsa da no so;me koma di ahurusi wɔ wo nkwagye mu.
13.6: Mɛto dwom ama Awurade,efisɛ ɔne me adi no yiye.

14.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Ɔkwasea ka wɔ ne koma mu se,“Onyankopɔn bi nni hɔ.”Wɔaporɔw, na wɔn nneyɛe yɛ fina wɔn mu biara nni hɔ a ɔyɛ ade pa.
14.2: Awurade fi ɔsoro hwɛadesamma wɔ famsɛ obehu wɔn mu bi a wɔwɔ ntease,anaa ebinom a wɔhwehwɛ Onyankopɔn.
14.3: Nanso nnipa nyinaa atwe wɔn ho afi Onyankopɔn ho;wɔn nyinaa ayɛ bɔne.Obiara nni hɔ a ɔyɛ papa.Ɔbaako mpo nni hɔ.
14.4: Enti abɔnefo rensua nyansa ana?Wɔwe me nkurɔfo te sɛnea nnipa di aduan.Wonnsu mfrɛ Awurade?
14.5: Nanso wonni, ehu akyekyere wɔn,efisɛ Onyankopɔn te wɔn a wɔteɛ mu.
14.6: Mo nnebɔneyɛfo sɛe ahiafo nhyehyɛe,nanso, Awurade ne wɔn guankɔbea.
14.7: Ao, Israel nkwagye mfi Sion mmra!Awurade bɛsan de ne nkurɔfo agyapade ama wɔn.Na Yakob adi ahurusi, na Israel ani agye!

15.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade, hena na ɔbɛtena wo kronkronbea ntamadan no mu?Hena na ɔbɛtena wo bepɔw kronkron no so?
15.2: Nea ne ho nni asɛmna ɔyɛ nea ɛteɛ,nea ɔka nokware a efi ne koma mu
15.3: na ɔmfa ne tɛkrɛma nsɛe nnipanea ɔnyɛ ne yɔnko bɔnena ommu ne yɔnko nipa abomfiaa,
15.4: nea obu afideyɛni animtiaana ɔde nidi ma wɔn a wosuro Awurade,nea odi ne ntam so,bere a etia no mpo,
15.5: nea ɔde ne sika bɔ bosea a onnye nsihona onnye adanmude ntia nea odi bem.Nea ɔyɛ eyinom norenhinhim da.

16.1: Dwom Dawid mpaebɔ.Bɔ me ho ban, me Nyankopɔn,na wo mu na minya guankɔbea.
16.2: Meka kyerɛɛ Awurade se,“MʼAwurade ne wo;minni ade pa biara ka wo ho.”
16.3: Ahotefo a wɔwɔ asase no so de,wɔne anuonyamfo amʼanigye wɔ wɔn mu.
16.4: Wɔn a wodi anyame afoforo akyi no,wɔn awerɛhow bɛdɔɔso.Merengu mogya nsa mma saa anyame nona meremfa mʼano mmɔ wɔn din.
16.5: Awurade, wode me kyɛfa ne me kuruwa ama me;woama me kyɛfa anya bammɔ.
16.6: Mʼahye akɔdeda mmeae a eye ama me;ampa ara mewɔ agyapade a ho yɛ anigye.
16.7: Mɛkamfo Awurade a otu me fo;na anadwo mpo, me koma kyerɛkyerɛ me.
16.8: Mihu Awurade wɔ mʼani so daa nyinaa.Esiane sɛ ɔwɔ me nsa nifa nti, merenhinhim da.
16.9: Ɛno nti, me kra ani gye, na mede me tɛkrɛma di ahurusi;me nipadua nso bɛhome asomdwoe mu,
16.10: efisɛ, worennyaw me awufo mu.Na woremma wo Kronkronni no mporɔw.
16.11: Woakyerɛ me nkwagye kwan,na wobɛma mʼani agye wɔ wʼanim,na anigye a ɛrensa da wɔ wo nifa so.

17.1: Dwom Dawid Mpaebɔ.Awurade, tie me trenee abisade;tie me sufrɛ.Yɛ aso ma me mpaebɔ;nea emfi nnaadaa anofafa mu.
17.2: Ma me bembu mfi wo;ma wʼani nhu nea ɛyɛ pɛ.
17.3: Wopɛɛpɛɛ me koma mu,wohwehwɛ me mu anadwo,na wosɔ me hwɛ de, nanso wubehu sɛ minsusuw bɔne bi ɛ;mʼano nkaa bɔne bi ɛ.
17.4: Nnipa nneyɛe fam no,anom asɛm ntimatwe me ho afibasabasayɛfo akwan ho.
17.5: Menam wʼakwan so daa;me nan nhintiw ɛ.
17.6: Misu mefrɛ wo, Onyankopɔnna wubegye me so;yɛ aso ma me na tie me mpaebɔ.
17.7: Da wo dɔ nwonwaso no adi;wo a wode wo nsa nifagye wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to wo so no nkwafi wɔn atamfo nsam no.
17.8: Hwɛ me so sɛ obi a wodɔ no;fa me sie wo ntaban nwini no ase,
17.9: fi amumɔyɛfo a wɔretaataa me no nsam,mʼatamfo a wɔatwa me ho ahyia no.
17.10: Wopirim wɔn koma,na wɔkasa ahantan so.
17.11: Wɔadi me ntɛntɛ, afei wɔatwa me ho ahyia;wɔn ani abere sɛ wɔbɛbɔ me ahwe fam.
17.12: Wɔte sɛ gyata a hanam ho kɔm de no,te sɛ gyata kɛse bi a wabutuw wɔ ahintawee.
17.13: Sɔre, Awurade!Wone wɔn mfa mmɔ ani na ka wɔn hyɛ;fa wʼafoa no gye me fi amumɔyɛfo no nsam.
17.14: Awurade, fa wo nsagye me fi nnipa a wɔte sɛɛ nsam;asase so nnipa a wɔn akatua wɔ nkwa yi mu no.Womma ɔkɔm nne wɔn a wʼani ku wɔn ho;wɔn mmabarima wɔ bebree,na wɔkora agyapade ma wɔn mma.
17.15: Na me trenee mu, mehu wʼanim;sɛ minyan na mihu wo a me koma bɛtɔ me yam.

18.1: Dwom Awurade akoa Dawid dwom. Ɔtoo saa dwom yi maa Awurade, bere a ogyee no fii nʼatamfo nyinaa ne Saulo nsam no.Medɔ wo, Awurade, mʼahoɔden.
18.2: Awurade ne me botantim;mʼaban ne me gyefo;me Nyankopɔn yɛ me botan.Ne mu na minya me hintabea.Ɔyɛ me nkatabo, me nkwagye abɛn ne mʼabandennen.
18.3: Misu frɛ Awurade; ɔno na ayeyi sɛ no,efisɛ ogye me fi mʼatamfo nsam.
18.4: Owu nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn kyekyeree me;na ɔsɛe asorɔkye bu faa me so.
18.5: Ɔda mu hama kyekyeree me;mihyiaa owu mfiri.
18.6: Mʼahohia mu, misu frɛɛ Awurade.Misu frɛɛ me Nyankopɔn hwehwɛɛ mmoa.Ofi nʼasɔrefi hɔ tee me nne;me sufrɛ baa nʼanim, na ɛkɔɔ nʼasom.
18.7: Asase wosowee na ehinhimii,na mmepɔw fapem wosoweewosuroe, efisɛ na ne bo afuw.
18.8: Wusiw fii ne hwene mu;ogyaframa fii nʼanom,na nnyansramma dɛw fii mu.
18.9: Ofii ɔsoro baa fam;na omununkum kabii duruu nʼanan ase.
18.10: Ɔte kerubim so tu kɔɔ soro;gyaagyaa ne ho wɔ mframa ntaban so.
18.11: Ɔde sum kataa ne ho,osu a amuna tumm atwa ne ho ahyia.
18.12: Hann kɛse hyerɛn wɔ nʼanim,na omununkum a mparuwbo ne anyinam wɔ mu fii ne ho hyerɛn mu bae.
18.13: Awurade bobɔɔ mu fii ɔsoro;Ɔsorosoroni no nne gyigyee bio.
18.14: Ɔtow ne bɛmma no de bɔɔ atamfo no ahwete,ɔde anyinam a ano yɛn den pam wɔn.
18.15: Po mu abon ho yiyiina asase nnyinaso ho daa hɔ,esiane wʼanimka ne ahomegu a efi wo hwene mu no nti,Awurade.
18.16: Ofi soro baa fam besoo me mu;ɔtwee me fii nsu a mu dɔ mu.
18.17: Ogyee me fii me tamfo hoɔdenfo nsam,wɔn a wɔn ani sa me, na wɔn ho yɛ den dodo ma me no.
18.18: Wɔbaa me so wɔ mʼamanehunu da mu,nanso Awurade maa me so,
18.19: wode me baa baabi a hɔ trɛw;ogyee me, efisɛ nʼani sɔɔ me.
18.20: Awurade ne me adi no sɛnea me trenee te;wahwɛ me nsa a ho tew so atua me ka.
18.21: Manantew Awurade akwan so.Mentwee me ho mfii me Nyankopɔn ho nkɔyɛɛ bɔne ɛ.
18.22: Madi ne mmara nyinaa so:mimmuu nʼahyɛde so.
18.23: Me ho nni asɛm wɔ Onyankopɔn anim,na matwe me ho afi bɔne ho.
18.24: Awurade agyina me treneeyɛne me nsa a ho tew wɔ nʼanim no so atua me ka.
18.25: Woda wo ho adi sɛ ɔnokwafo kyerɛ wɔn a wodi nokware,wɔn a wodi mu nso wokyerɛ wɔn sɛ wodi mu.
18.26: Woyɛ kronkron ma wɔn a wɔyɛ kronkron,na amumɔyɛfo de, wukyi wɔn.
18.27: Wugye ahobrɛasefo nkwa,na wobrɛ ahantanfo ase.
18.28: Awurade, woma me kanea hyerɛn.Yiw, woma me sum dan hann.
18.29: Wʼahoɔden a wode ma me nti, mitumi ka asraafo gu;me Nyankopɔn nti, mitumi foro ɔfasu.
18.30: Onyankopɔn de, nʼakwan yɛ pɛ;Awurade bɔhyɛ nyinaa ba mu.Ɔyɛ nkataboma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ bammɔ wɔ ne mu.
18.31: Na hena na ɔyɛ Onyankopɔn ka Awurade ho?Hena na ɔyɛ Ɔbotan no? Gye sɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn no.
18.32: Ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔma me ahoɔden,na ɔma me kwan yɛ pɛ.
18.33: Ɔma mʼanammɔn ho yɛ hare sɛ ɔforote de.Ɔma me gyina sorɔnsorɔmmea.
18.34: Osiesie me ma ɔko,na me basa tumi kuntun kɔbere mfrafrae tadua.
18.35: Wode wo ogye boa me nkatabo,na wo nsa nifa ma me gyina.Wobrɛ wo ho ase ma meyɛ ɔkɛse.
18.36: Woabɔ kwan tɛtrɛɛ ama mʼanansɛnea me nkotodwe rengurow.
18.37: Metaa mʼatamfo kɔtoo wɔn;mansan mʼakyi kosii sɛ mesɛee wɔn.
18.38: Mɛdwerɛw wɔn, na wɔantumi ansɔre,wɔhwehwee ase wɔ mʼanan ase.
18.39: Wode akodi ahoɔden maa me;womaa mʼatamfo bɔɔ wɔn mu ase wɔ me nan ase.
18.40: Womaa mʼatamfo dan wɔn ho guanee,na mesɛe wɔn a wɔtan me.
18.41: Wosu hwehwɛɛ mmoa, nanso obiara ammegye wɔn,wɔfrɛɛ Awurade, nanso wammua.
18.42: Meyam wɔn sɛ mfutuma a mframa bɔ gu;mihwiee wɔn guu sɛ mmɔnten so dontori.
18.43: Woagye me afi nnipa no ɔfow mu,woayɛ me amanaman no ti;nnipa a minnim wɔn abɛyɛ mʼasomfo.
18.44: Wɔte me nka pɛ a, wɔyɛ osetie ma me;ananafo kotow mʼanim.
18.45: Wɔn nyinaa botobotow;wofi wɔn abandennen mu ba ahopopo so.
18.46: Awurade te ase! Ayeyi nka me Botan!Wɔmma Onyankopɔn, me Gyefo no din so!
18.47: Ɔno ne Onyankopɔn a ɔtɔ were ma me,ɔno na ɔka amanaman hyɛ mʼase,
18.48: ɔno na ogye me fi mʼatamfo nsam.Wopagyaw me sii mʼatamfo so,wugyee me fii basabasayɛfo nsam.
18.49: Ɛno nti, mɛkamfo wo wɔ amanaman mu, Ao Awurade.Mɛto ayeyi dwom ama wo din.
18.50: Wode nkonimdi akɛse ama wo hene;woda ɔdɔ a ɛnsa da adi kyerɛ nea woasra no ngo,wode kyerɛ Dawid, ne nʼasefo afebɔɔ.

19.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Ɔsoro ka Onyankopɔn anuonyam!Wim pae mu ka ne nsa ano adwuma,
19.2: Da biara, wɔkasa;anadwo biara, wɔda nimdeɛ adi.
19.3: Wonni ɔkasa, wɔnnka nsɛm;wɔnnte wɔn nne.
19.4: Wɔn nne akodu asase so mmaa nyinaa,na wɔn nsɛm nso akodu asase ano.Onyankopɔn asi ntamadan ama owia wɔ ɔsoro hɔ.
19.5: Ɛte sɛ ayeforokunu a ofi ne pia mu,te sɛ ɔbran a ne ho pere no sɛ obetu ne mmirika.
19.6: Epue wɔ ɔsoro fa baabina atwa ne ho akosi ano;biribiara nsiw ne hyew ho kwan.
19.7: Awurade mmara yɛ pɛ,ɛkanyan ɔkra no.Ahotoso wɔ Awurade nhyehyɛe mu,ɛma nea onnim nyansa hu nyansa.
19.8: Awurade ahyɛde teɛ;ɛma koma mu anigye.Awurade ɔhyɛ nsɛm mu da hɔ;na ebue ani.
19.9: Awurade suro yɛ kronkron,ɛte hɔ daa.Awurade mmara nsɛm yɛ nokwarena ne nyinaa teɛ.
19.10: Ɛsom bo sen sikakɔkɔɔɛsen sikakɔkɔɔ kann;ɛyɛ dɛ sen ɛwo,ɛsen ɛwo a efi ɛwokyɛm mu.
19.11: Wɔnam so bɔ wo somfo kɔkɔ se,sodi so akatua yɛ bebree.
19.12: Hena na ohu nʼankasa mfomso?Fa me mfomso a ahintaw kyɛ me.
19.13: Bɔ wʼakoa ho ban fi ɔboayɛ bɔne ho,na anhyɛ me so.Ɛno na ɛbɛma madi bem,a merenni fɔ wɔ bɔne akɛse ho.
19.14: Ma mʼanom nsɛm ne me koma mu adwenenyɛ nea ɛsɔ wʼani, Awurademe Botan ne me Gyefo.

20.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade ntie wo wɔ wʼahohia mu;Yakob Nyankopɔn din mmɔ wo ho ban.
20.2: Ɔmfa mmoa mfi kronkronbea hɔ mmrɛ wo,na omfi Sion mmɛhyɛ wo den.
20.3: Ɔnkae wʼafɔrebɔ nyinaa,na ɔmma wo hyew afɔre nsɔ nʼani.
20.4: Ɔmma wo nea wo koma pɛ,na wo nhyehyɛe nyinaa nyɛ yiye.
20.5: Yɛbɛbɔ ose bere a woadi nkonim,na yɛama yɛn frankaa so wɔ yɛn Nyankopɔn din mu.Awurade nyɛ wʼabisade nyinaa mma wo.
20.6: Afei mahu sɛ Awurade ma nea wasra no no nkonimdi,ofi ne kronkronbea wɔ ɔsoro gye no so,ɔde ne nkonimdi tumi a ɛwɔ ne nsa nifa mu no.
20.7: Ebinom de wɔn ho to wɔn nteaseɛnam sona afoforo nso, wɔn apɔnkɔ so,nanso yɛn de, yɛde yɛn ho to Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn din so.
20.8: Wɔbrɛ wɔn ase ma wɔhwehwe ase,na yɛn de, yɛsɔre gyina kirebenn.
20.9: Awurade, ma ɔhene nkonimdi!Yɛfrɛ a, gye yɛn so!

21.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade, ɔhene di anigye wɔ wʼahoɔden mu.Nʼani gye mmoroso wɔ nkonimdi a woma no nti!
21.2: Woama no nea ne koma pɛ;woamfa nʼabisade ankame no.
21.3: Wode nhyira a edi mu hyiaa nona wode sikakɔkɔɔ ankasa ahenkyɛw hyɛɛ no.
21.4: Obisaa wo hɔ nkwa, na wode maa no,nna tenten a enni awiei.
21.5: Nkonimdi a woma no nti, nʼanuonyam so;wode kɛseyɛ ne nidi adom no.
21.6: Ampa ara, woama no nhyira a ɛnsa dana woama no ahosɛpɛw wɔ wʼanim anigye mu.
21.7: Ɔhene no de ne ho to Awurade so;Ɔsorosoroni no nokware dɔ no nti,ɔrenhinhim.
21.8: Wo nsa bɛka wʼatamfo nyinaa;wo nsa nifa beso wɔn a wokyi wo no mu.
21.9: Bere a wubeyi wo ho adi nowobɛyɛ wɔn sɛ fononoo a mu adɔ.Awurade fi nʼabufuwhyew mu bɛmene wɔn,na ne gya no ahyew wɔn.
21.10: Wobɛtɔre wɔn ase wɔ asase so,na wɔn asefo afi adesamma mu.
21.11: Ɛwɔ mu sɛ wɔbɔ pɔw tia wona wɔyɛ nhyehyɛe bɔne, nanso wɔrenni nkonim;
21.12: efisɛ wobɛma wɔasan wɔn akyibere a woatwe bɛmma akyerɛ wɔn so no.
21.13: Yɛma wo so, Awurade, wɔ wʼahoɔden mu;yɛbɛto nnwom na yɛakamfo wo kɛseyɛ.

22.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Me Nyankopɔn, me Nyankopɔn, adɛn nti na woagyaw me?Adɛn nti na me nkwagye ne wo ntam aware,adɛn na mʼapinisi nsɛm ne wo ntam aware?
22.2: Me Nyankopɔn, misu frɛ wo awia, nanso wunnye me so,mefrɛ wo anadwo, nanso minnya ɔhome.
22.3: Nanso wɔasi wo hene sɛ Ɔkronkronni;wo na Israel kamfo wo.
22.4: Wo mu na yɛn agyanom de wɔn werɛ hyɛe;wogyee wo dii, na wugyee wɔn.
22.5: Wosu frɛɛ wo na wugyee wɔn,wɔde wɔn ho too wo so na woanni wɔn nhuammɔ.
22.6: Nanso meyɛ osunson, na menyɛ onipannipa bɔ me ahohora na wobu me animtiaa.
22.7: Obiara a ohu me di me ho fɛw;wotwa me adapaa, wosow wɔn ti ka se:
22.8: “Ɔde ne ho to Awurade so;ma Awurade mmegye no.Ma ɔmmɛboa no,efisɛ ɔwɔ no mu anigye.”
22.9: Wo na wuyii me fii awotwaa mu baena womaa me de me ho too wo sobere a mitua me na nufu ano mpo.
22.10: Efi mʼawo mu na wɔde me too wo so;efi me na yafunu mu, woayɛ me Nyankopɔn.
22.11: Ntwe wo ho mfi me ho!Efisɛ amane abɛnna ɔboafo nni baabi.
22.12: Anantwinini bebree atwa me ho ahyia;Basan anantwinini a wɔn ho yɛ den atwa me ho ahyia.
22.13: Gyata a wɔbobɔ mu na wɔtetew wɔn hanam muabuebue wɔn anom tɛtrɛɛ de kyerɛ me.
22.14: Wɔahwie me agu sɛ nsu,na me nnompe nyinaa ahodwow.Me koma adan amane;anan wɔ me mu.
22.15: Mʼanom ayow te sɛ kyɛmfɛre mu.Na me tɛkrɛma atare mʼanom.Wode me to owu mfutuma mu.
22.16: Akraman atwa me ho ahyia,nnebɔneyɛfo kuw atwa me ahyia,wɔahwirew me nsa ne mʼanan mu.
22.17: Me nnompe nyinaa gu petee mu;Mʼatamfo hwɛ me haa na wɔserew me.
22.18: Wɔkyɛ me atade mu fa,na wɔbɔ me ntama so ntonto.
22.19: Na wo, Awurade, ntwe wo ho;wone mʼahoɔden, bra ntɛm bɛboa me.
22.20: Gye me kra fi afoa ano;gye me nkwa a ɛsom bo no fi akraman tumi ase.
22.21: Gye me nkwa fi gyata anom;gye me fi ɛko mmɛn so.
22.22: Mɛbɔ wo din akyerɛ me nuanom;mɛkamfo wo wɔ wɔn a wɔahyia hɔ no nyinaa anim.
22.23: Monkamfo Awurade, mo a musuro no no!Mo a moyɛ Yakob asefo, monhyɛ no anuonyam!Mo Israel asefo nyinaa, munni no ni!
22.24: Ommuu nʼani nguuɔmanehunufo ateetee so ɛ,ɔmfaa nʼanim nhintaw no;na mmom watie ne sufrɛ a ɔde rehwehwɛ mmoa no.
22.25: Me botae a mede yi wo ayɛ wɔ bagua mu no fi wo;medi me bɔhyɛ so wɔ wɔn a wosuro wo no anim.
22.26: Ahiafo bedidi na wɔamee;wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ Awurade beyi no ayɛ,mo koma nnya nkwa daa.
22.27: Asase ano nyinaabɛkae akɔ Awurade nkyɛn,na amanaman no mmusua nyinaabɛkotow nʼanim,
22.28: efisɛ tumi wɔ Awuradena odi amanaman so hene.
22.29: Asase so adefo nyinaa bedidi na wɔasɔre no;wɔn a wɔkɔ dɔte mu nyinaa bebu nkotodwe nʼanim,wɔn a wɔrentumi mma nkwa mu.
22.30: Nkyirimma nyinaa bɛsom no;wɔbɛka Awurade ho asɛm akyerɛ awo ntoatoaso a edidi so.
22.31: Wɔbɛka ne trenee akyerɛnnipa a wonnya nwoo wɔnefisɛ ɔno na wayɛ.

23.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade ne me hwɛfo, hwee renhia me.
23.2: Ɔma meda wura frɔmfrɔm adidibea;ogya me kɔ nsu a ɛho dwo ho,
23.3: odwudwo me kra.Ɔde me fa akwantrenee so,ne din nti.
23.4: Sɛ menamowu sum kabii mu mpo a,minsuro bɔne bi,efisɛ wo ne me na ɛwɔ hɔ;wʼabaa ne wo pemana ɛkyekye me werɛ.
23.5: Woto me pon wɔmʼatamfo anim.Wode ngo fɔw me tirim;me kuruwa yɛ ma bu so.
23.6: Yiye ne adɔe nko na ebedi mʼakyime nkwanna nyinaa;na mɛtena Awurade fidaa.

24.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Asase ne nea ɛwɔ mu nyinaa yɛ Awurade de;wiase ne wɔn a wɔte mu nyinaa wɔ no;
24.2: efisɛ ɔno na ɔtoo ne fapem wɔ po sona ɔde sii nsu ani.
24.3: Hena na obetumi aforo Awurade bepɔw no?Hena na obetumi agyina ne tenabea kronkron hɔ?
24.4: Nea ɔyɛ ade trenee na ne koma mu tew,nea ne kra nni ahoni akyina ɔnka ntamhunu.
24.5: Obenya Awurade nsam nhyirane bembu a efi ne Nkwagye Nyankopɔn.
24.6: Saa na awo ntoatoaso a wɔhwehwɛ Awurade no tewɔn a wɔhwehwɛ wʼanim no, Yakob Nyankopɔn.
24.7: Mo aponkɛse, momma mo ti so;wɔmma mo so, mo tete apon,na Anuonyam Hene nhyɛn mu.
24.8: Hena ne saa Anuonyam Hene yi?Ɔno ne Awurade hoɔdenfo ne otumfo noAwurade a ɔyɛ ɔko mu nkonimdifo.
24.9: Momma mo ti so, mo aponkɛsemomma wɔn so, mo tete apon,na anuonyam Hene no nkɔ mu.
24.10: Hena ne saa anuonyam Hene yi?Asafo Awurade no,ɔno ne anuonyam Hene no.

25.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade, me Nyankopɔn, wo mu na mede me werɛ hyɛ.
25.2: Wo so, me Nyankopɔn, na mede me ho to,mma mʼanim ngu ase,na mma mʼatamfo nso nni me so nkonim.
25.3: Wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to wo so no mu biaraanim rengu ase da,mmom, wɔn a wɔyɛ kɔntɔnkye kwa noanim begu ase.
25.4: Kyerɛ me wʼakwan, Awurade,na minhu wʼatempɔn.
25.5: Fa wo nokware no so kyerɛkyerɛ me,efisɛ woyɛ Onyankopɔn, me Gyefo,na mʼani da wo so daa nyinaa.
25.6: Kae, Awurade, wo mmɔborɔhunu ne wo dɔ kɛsea ɛwɔ hɔ fi tete no.
25.7: Nkae me mmabun bere mu bɔnene mʼatuatew akwan;kae me sɛnea wʼadɔe te,Awurade, efisɛ wuye.
25.8: Awurade ye na ɔteɛ;enti ɔkyerɛkyerɛ nnebɔneyɛfo nʼakwan.
25.9: Ɔde ahobrɛasefo fa ɔkwan pa sona ɔkyerɛ wɔn nʼapɛde.
25.10: Awurade akwan nyinaa yɛ ɔdɔ ne nokwaredima wɔn a wodi nʼapam mu ahyɛde so.
25.11: Awurade, me bɔne so de,nanso wo din nti, fa kyɛ me.
25.12: Enti hena ne onipa a osuro Awurade?Ɔbɛkyerɛ no ɔkwan a wabɔ ama no.
25.13: Obedi yiye wɔ ne nkwanna mu,na nʼasefo afa asase no sɛ wɔn agyapade.
25.14: Awurade da nʼatirimsɛm adi kyerɛ wɔn a wosuro no;na ɔma wohu nʼapam.
25.15: Mʼani da Awurade so daa,efisɛ ɔno nko ara na obeyi mʼanan afi afiri mu.
25.16: Dan wʼani hwɛ me, na dom me,efisɛ meyɛ ankonam na meyɛ mmɔbɔ.
25.17: Me koma mu dadwen adɔɔso;yi me dadwen fi me so.
25.18: Hwɛ me haw ne mʼahohiahiana yi me bɔne nyinaa fi me so.
25.19: Hwɛ sɛnea mʼatamfo adɔɔsone ɔtan kɛse a wɔde tan me!
25.20: Bɔ me nkwa ho ban na gye me;mma mʼanim ngu ase,efisɛ me guankɔbea ne wo.
25.21: Ma trenee ne nokware mmɔ me ho ban,efisɛ mʼani da wo so.
25.22: Gye Israel, Onyankopɔn,fi wɔn haw nyinaa mu.

26.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Bu me bem, Awurade,efisɛ, mabɔ bra a asɛm nni ho:mede me ho too Awurade sona manhinhim.
26.2: Sɔ me hwɛ, Awurade,hwehwɛ me koma ne mʼadwene mu.
26.3: Wʼadɔe wɔ mʼanim daana mɛnantew wo nokware mu.
26.4: Me ne nnaadaafo ntenana me ne nyaatwomfo nso nni hwee yɛ.
26.5: Mikyi nnebɔneyɛfo guabɔna mempɛ sɛ me ne amumɔyɛfo tena.
26.6: Mehohoro me nsa wɔ bembu mu,na mekɔ wʼafɔremuka ho ahyia, Awurade,
26.7: na mepae mu ka wʼayeyina meka wʼanwonwade nyinaa.
26.8: Mʼani gye ofi a wote mu ho, Awurade,faako a wʼanuonyam wɔ no.
26.9: Mfa me kra nka nnebɔneyɛfo de ho nkɔ,ne me nkwa nka mogyapɛfo de ho,
26.10: wɔn a amumɔyɛ nhyehyɛe wɔ wɔn nsamna adanmude ayɛ wɔn nsa nifa ma.
26.11: Nanso mebɔ ɔbra a ho tew;hu me mmɔbɔ na gye me nkwa.
26.12: Mʼanan sisi asase tamaa so;na guabɔ kɛse ase na mɛkamfo Awurade.

27.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade ne me hann ne me nkwagye;hena na minsuro no?Awurade ne me nkwa ahoɔden,na hena anim na me ho mpopo?
27.2: Sɛ nnipa bɔne bɔ toa mepɛ sɛ wokum me,sɛ mʼatamfo tow hyɛ me so a,wobehintihintiw ahwehwe ase.
27.3: Sɛ dɔm mpo twa me ho hyia a,me koma rentu;mpo sɛ wotu me so sa a,ɛno mu koraa na minya awerehyɛmu.
27.4: Ade baako na mibisa Awurade;na ɛno na mehwehwɛ;sɛ mɛtena Awurade fime nkwanna nyinaa,na mahwɛ Awurade ahoɔfɛna mahwehwɛ no wɔ nʼasɔrefi.
27.5: Hiada mu no,ɔde me besie nʼatenae dwoodwoo;ɔbɛkora me wɔ Ahyiae Ntamadan kronkron muɔde me si ɔbotan so wɔ sorosoro.
27.6: Afei ɔbɛma me ti sowɔ atamfo a wɔatwa me ho ahyia no so;mede anigye bɛbɔ afɔre wɔ nʼAhyiae Ntamadan mu;na mɛto dwom, ahyehyɛ nnwom ama Awurade.
27.7: Awurade, sɛ misu frɛ wo a, tie me!Hu me mmɔbɔ na gye me so!
27.8: Me koma ka wɔ wo ho se, “Hwehwɛ nʼanim!”Wʼanim, Awurade na mɛhwehwɛ.
27.9: Mfa wʼanim nhintaw me,mfa abufuw mpam wo somfome boafo ne wo.Mpo me, na nnyaw me,mʼAgyenkwa Nyankopɔn.
27.10: Mʼagya ne me na begyaw me hɔ de,nanso Awurade begye me.
27.11: Kyerɛ me wʼakwan, Awurade;fa me fa ɔkwan tee so,me nhyɛsofo nti.
27.12: Nnyaa me mma sɛnea mʼatamfo pɛ,nnansekurumfo sɔre tia mena wopuw awurukasɛm.
27.13: Meda so wɔ saa anidaso yi sɛ:mehu Awurade ayamyewɔ ateasefo asase so.
27.14: Twɛn Awurade.Hyɛ wo ho den na ma wo bo nyɛ duruna twɛn Awurade.

28.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Wo na misu frɛ wo,Awurade me Botan;nsiw wʼaso wɔ me ho.Sɛ woyɛ komm a,mɛyɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔasian kɔ amoa mu no.
28.2: Tie me mmɔborɔsubere a mefrɛ wo apɛ mmoa,bere a mema me nsa sokyerɛ wo Tenabea Kronkron hɔ.
28.3: Mfa me mfra amumɔyɛfo mu ntwe me nkɔ,mfa me nka wɔn a wɔyɛ bɔne no ho.Wɔne wɔn yɔnkonom kasa fɛfɛ,nanso wɔde ɔtan sie wɔn koma mu.
28.4: Twe wɔn aso wɔ nea wɔayɛ no so;wɔn adwuma bɔne no so;tua nea wɔde wɔn nsa ayɛ so kana fa nea ɛfata wɔn san bra wɔn so.
28.5: Sɛ wommu nea Awurade ayɛne nea ɔde ne nsa ayɛ no ntiɔbɛbrɛ wɔn asena ɔremma wɔnnsɔre bio.
28.6: Ayeyi nka Awurade,efisɛ watie me mmɔborɔsu.
28.7: Awurade ne mʼahoɔden ne me nkatabome koma wɔ ne mu ahotoso, na ɔboa me.Me koma di ahurusina mede dwonto bɛda no ase.
28.8: Awurade yɛ ahoɔden ma ne nkurɔfo;ne nkwagye nsraban ma nea wɔasra no ngo.
28.9: Gye wo nkurɔfo na hyira wʼagyapade;yɛ wɔn hwɛfo, na wo ne wɔn nnantew afebɔɔ.

29.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Momfa mma Awurade no, mo ɔsoro abɔde,momfa anuonyam ne tumi mma Awurade.
29.2: Momfa anuonyam a ɛfata Awurade din mma no;monsɔre Awurade wɔ nʼanuonyam kronkron mu.
29.3: Awurade nne wɔ nsu no so;anuonyam Nyankopɔn bobɔ mu,Awurade bobɔ mu wɔ nsu akɛse so.
29.4: Awurade nne mu wɔ tumi;Awurade nne mu wɔ anuonyam.
29.5: Awurade nne bubu sida;Awurade nne bubu Lebanon sida mu nketenkete
29.6: Ɔma Lebanon huruhuruw te sɛ nantwi ba,na Sirion nso sɛ ɛko ba.
29.7: Awurade nne pa ma anyinam gya dɛw.
29.8: Awurade nne wosow sare so;Awurade wosow Kades sare.
29.9: Awurade nne kyinkyim adumna ɛma kwae yɛ kwaterekwa.Nʼasɔredan mufo nyinaa teɛ mu ka se,“Anuonyam nka Onyankopɔn!”
29.10: Awurade di hene wɔ nsuyiri so;wɔasi Awurade hene afebɔɔ.
29.11: Awurade ma ne nkurɔfo ahoɔden,na ɔde asomdwoe hyira wɔn.

30.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Mɛma wo so, Awurade,efisɛ, woayi me afi bun muna woamma mʼatamfo anserew me.
30.2: Awurade me Nyankopɔn, misu frɛɛ wo sɛ boa mena wosaa me yare.
30.3: Awurade, wuyii me fii ɔda mu;wode me ho kyɛɛ me na woamma mankɔ amoa mu.
30.4: Monto ayeyi nnwom mma Awurade;mo a moyɛ nʼahotewfo!Monkamfo ne din kronkron no.
30.5: Nʼabufuw nkyɛ,na nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa;agyaadwotwa bɛwɔ hɔ anadwo,nanso ahosɛpɛw bɛba anɔpa.
30.6: Metee nka sɛ mewɔ bammɔ no, mekae se,“Merenhinhim da.”
30.7: Awurade, woyɛɛ me adom nowomaa me bepɔw gyinaa pintinnna wode wʼanim hintaw me no,me koma tui.
30.8: Wo, Awurade na mefrɛɛ wo;wo hɔ na misu mesrɛɛ mmɔborɔhunu se:
30.9: “Mfaso bɛn na ɛwɔ me sɛe so,sɛ mɛkɔ amoa mu?Mfutuma beyi wo ayɛ ana?Ɛbɛpae mu aka wo nokwaredi ana?
30.10: Tie me, Awurade, na hu me mmɔbɔ!Awurade, yɛ me boafo.”
30.11: Wodan mʼagyaadwotwa yɛɛ no asaw;wuyii mʼatweaatam fii me hona wode anigye furaa me,
30.12: sɛ me koma bɛto nnwom ama wo na ɛrenyɛ komm.Awurade me Nyankopɔn, meyi wo ayɛ daa.

31.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Wo mu, Awurade na manya guankɔbea;mma mʼanim ngu ase;fi wo trenee mu gye me.
31.2: Yɛ aso ma me,bra ntɛm begye me;yɛ me bammɔ botan,aban a mʼatamfo nsa renka me.
31.3: Sɛ woyɛ me botan ne mʼaban nti,wo din nti di mʼanim na kyerɛ me kwan.
31.4: Gye me fi afiri a wɔasum me no mu,efisɛ wo ne me guankɔbea.
31.5: Wo nsam na mede me kra hyɛ;gye me bio, Awurade, Onyankopɔn nokwafo.
31.6: Mikyi wɔn a wɔsom abosom huhuw;mede me ho to Awurade so.
31.7: Mʼani begye na madi ahurusi wɔ wo dɔ mu,efisɛ wuhu mʼamanehunu,na wunim me kra mu haw.
31.8: Womfaa me nhyɛɛ ɔtamfo no nsammom wode me nan asisi petee mu.
31.9: Hu me mmɔbɔ, Awurade, efisɛ me ho yeraw me;awerɛhow ama mʼani so ayɛ kusuuɔyaw ama me kra ne me honam ayɛ mmerɛw.
31.10: Ɔyawdi retew me nkwa so,na abooboo tew me mfe so;ɔhaw nti mʼahoɔden kɔ fam,na me nnompe nso ahodwow.
31.11: Mʼatamfo nyinaa nti,mayɛ ahohora wɔ me nnamfonom mu;nnipa a wonim me suro me,na wɔn a wohu me mmɔnten so guan.
31.12: Obiara werɛ afi me te sɛ nea mawu;mayɛ sɛ kuku a abɔ.
31.13: Mete asomsɛm dodow a wɔkaahunahuna atwa me ho ahyia.Wɔrepam me ti so,na wɔbɔ pɔw sɛ wobekum me.
31.14: Nanso mede me ho ato wo so, Awurade;meka se, “Woyɛ me Nyankopɔn.”
31.15: Me mmere wɔ wo nsamgye me fi mʼatamfone wɔn a wɔtaa me no nsam.
31.16: Tew wʼanim kyerɛ wo somfo;gye me wɔ wo dɔ a enni huammɔ no mu.
31.17: Mma mʼanim ngu ase, Awurade,efisɛ masu afrɛ wo;mmom, ma amumɔyɛfo anim ngu asena wɔnna wɔn nna mu komm.
31.18: Mua atorofo ano,efisɛ wɔde ahantan ne animtiaabukasa tia atreneefo.
31.19: Wo papayɛ dɔɔso,ɛno na woakora ama wɔn a wosuro wo noɛno na wode ma wɔn a woguan toa wo nowɔ nnipa anim.
31.20: Wode wɔn sie wʼanim bammɔ mufi nnipa nsusuwii bɔne ho;wo tenabea hɔ na wode wɔn sie dwoodwoofi tɛkrɛma a ɛbɔ sobo ho.
31.21: Ayeyi nka Awurade!Sɛ wayi ne dɔ nwonwaso akyerɛ mebere a na mewɔ kuropɔn a atamfo atwa ho ahyia no mu no.
31.22: Mebɔɔ huboa no mekae se:“Woayi wʼani afi me so!”Nanso wotee me mmɔborɔsubere a mekotow srɛɛ wo no.
31.23: Monnɔ Awurade mo a moyɛ nʼahotewfo nyinaa!Awurade kora wɔn a wodi nokware so,na ahomasofo de, otua wɔn ka pɛpɛɛpɛ.
31.24: Monyɛ den na momma mo bo ntɔ mo yam,mo a mowɔ anidaso wɔ Awurade mu nyinaa.

32.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Nhyira ne wɔn awɔde wɔn amumɔyɛ akyɛ wɔn,na wɔakata wɔn bɔne so.
32.2: Nhyira nka onipa aAwurade mmu ne bɔne ngu no sona nnaadaa nni ne honhom mu.
32.3: Bere a meyɛɛ komm no,me nnompe yɛɛ mmrɛw,apini a misii no da mu nyinaa nti.
32.4: Awia ne anadwowo nsa yɛɛ den wɔ me so;mʼahoɔden saete sɛ awia bere mu ɔhyew.
32.5: Afei, migyee me bɔne too mu.Mankata mʼamumɔyɛ so.Mekae se, “Mɛkame bɔne akyerɛ Awurade,”na wode me bɔne ho afɔdi kyɛɛ me.
32.6: Enti, ma agyidifo nyinaa mmɔ wo mpaebere a wohu wo;ampa ara sɛ asu akɛse yiri a,ɛrenka no.
32.7: Wone me hintabea;wobɛbɔ me ho ban wɔ amanehunu muna wode nkwagye nnwom atwa me ho ahyia.
32.8: Mɛkyerɛkyerɛ wo ɔkwan a wobɛfa sometu wo fo na mahwɛ wo so.
32.9: Ɛnyɛ sɛ ɔpɔnkɔ anaa afurumpɔnkɔ aonni ntease ntiwɔde nnareka ne hama na ɛdannan no,sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wɔbɛba wo nkyɛn.
32.10: Omumɔyɛfo amanehunu dɔɔso,nanso Awurade adɔe a ɛnsa da notwa onipa a ɔde ne ho to no so no ho hyia.
32.11: Munni ahurusi na mo ani nnye wɔ Awurade mu, mo atreneefo;monto dwom, mo a mo koma mu tew.

33.1: Dwom Momfa ahurusi nto dwom mma Awurade, mo atreneefo,ɛfata sɛ wɔn a wɔteɛ no yi no ayɛ.
33.2: Momfa sanku nkamfo Awurade;monto dwom mma no wɔ sankuten so.
33.3: Monto dwom foforo mma no.Momfa nimdeɛ mmɔ sanku no na monteɛ mu ahurusi so!
33.4: Awurade asɛm teɛ na ɛyɛ nokwareodi nokware wɔ nea ɔyɛ nyinaa mu.
33.5: Awurade dɔ treneeyɛ ne atɛntrenee.Nʼadɔe a ɛnsa da no ahyɛ asase so ma.
33.6: Awurade asɛm so na wɔnam yɛɛ ɔsorosoro,nʼanom home so na wɔnam yɛɛ ɔsoro asafo.
33.7: Ɔka po nsu boa ano kuw;na ɔde bun sie nea hɔ dɔ.
33.8: Momma asase sofo nyinaa nsuro Awurade;na wiasefo nyinaa mfa nidi mma no.
33.9: Ɔno na ɔkasa ma ɛbaa muna ɔhyɛ ma egyinaa pintinn.
33.10: Awurade sɛe amanaman no nhyehyɛe;ɔma adesamma nsusuwii yɛ ɔkwa.
33.11: Nanso Awurade nhyehyɛe tim hɔ daa,ne koma mu botae wɔ hɔ ma awo ntoatoaso.
33.12: Nhyira ne ɔman a ne Nyankopɔn ne Awurade,nnipa a oyii wɔn sɛ nʼagyapade no.
33.13: Awurade hwɛ adesamma nyinaa fi ɔsoro.
33.14: Ofi nʼatenae hwɛ wɔn a wɔte asase so nyinaa.
33.15: Ɔno ne nea ɔbɔɔ wɔn nyinaa koma,na osusuw nea wɔyɛ nyinaa ho.
33.16: Ɛnyɛ ɔhene asraafo dɔm kɛse na ebegye no;ɔkofo biara nni hɔ a ofi nʼahoɔden mu guan.
33.17: Ɔpɔnkɔ mu ahotoso yɛ ɔkwa wɔ nkwagye mu;nʼahoɔden nyinaa akyi no, ɔrentumi nnye nkwa.
33.18: Nanso Awurade ani wɔ wɔn a wosuro no no so,wɔn a wɔwɔ anidaso wɔ ne dɔ a ɛnsa da no mu,
33.19: sɛ obegye wɔn afi owu muna wama wɔatena nkwa mu wɔ ɔkɔm bere mu.
33.20: Yɛde anidaso twɛn Awurade;ɔyɛ yɛn boafo ne yɛn nkatabo.
33.21: Ne mu na yɛn koma di ahurusi,efisɛ yɛde yɛn ho to ne din kronkron no so.
33.22: Ma wʼadɔe a ɛnsa da no ntena yɛn so, Awurade,sɛnea anidaso a yɛwɔ wɔ mu no te.

34.1: Dwom Dawid dwom a ɔtoo bere a ɔboapa dan ɔbɔdamfo wɔ Abimelek anim no na ɔpanyin no gyaa no ma ɔkɔe no akyi.Mede aseda bɛma Awurade bere nyinaa;nʼayeyi wɔ mʼanom daa.
34.2: Me kra bɛhoahoa ne ho wɔ Awurade mu;ma amanehunufo nte na wonni ahurusi.
34.3: Mo ne me nkamfo Awurade;momma yɛmmɔ mu nkamfo ne din!
34.4: Mefrɛɛ Awurade na ogyee me so;na ogyee me wɔ nea misuro nyinaa mu.
34.5: Wɔn a wɔhwɛ nʼanim no hyerɛnna wɔn anim rengu ase da.
34.6: Ohiani yi frɛe, na Awurade tiee no;na ogyee no fii nʼahohia nyinaa mu.
34.7: Awurade bɔfo wɛn wɔn a wosuro no,na ogye wɔn.
34.8: Monka nhwɛ na munhu sɛ Awurade ye.Nhyira ne onipa a oguan toa no.
34.9: Munsuro Awurade, mo a moyɛ nʼahotefo,na wɔn a wosuro no no nhia hwee.
34.10: Gyata yɛ mmerɛw na ɔkɔm de wɔn,nanso wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ Awurade no, ade pa biara remmɔ wɔn.
34.11: Mommra, me mma, monyɛ aso mma me;mɛkyerɛkyerɛ mo Awurade ho suro.
34.12: Mo mu hena na ɔpɛ nkwana ɔpɛ sɛ ohu nna pa bebree?
34.13: Ɛne ɛnsɛ sɛ ɔka kasa bɔne, na ɛsɛ sɛ ogyae atorotwa.
34.14: Twe wo ho fi bɔne ho, na yɛ papa;hwehwɛ asomdwoe na tiw no.
34.15: Awurade ani wɔ atreneefo sona otie wɔn mpaebɔ;
34.16: Awurade ani sa wɔn a wɔyɛ bɔne,sɛ obeyi wɔn nkae afi asase yi so.
34.17: Atreneefo teɛ mu su, na Awurade tie wɔn;oyi wɔn fi wɔn haw nyinaa mu.
34.18: Awurade bɛn wɔn a wɔn koma abotowna ogye wɔn a wɔadwerɛw wɔn wɔ honhom mu no nkwa.
34.19: Onipa trenee behu amane bebreenanso Awurade gye no fi ne nyinaa mu;
34.20: ɔbɔ ne nnompe nyinaa ho ban,sɛnea mu baako mpo mu remmu.
34.21: Bɔne bekum ɔdebɔneyɛni;ɔtreneeni atamfo benya afɔbu.
34.22: Awurade gye nʼasomfo nkwa;wɔn a woguan toa no no mu biara renkɔ afɔbu mu.

35.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade wo ne wɔn a wɔne me di asi no nni asi;ko tia wɔn a wɔko tia me.
35.2: Fa wo nkatabo ne wʼakode;na sɔre bra bɛboa me.
35.3: Twe peaw ne abonnuawɔ wɔn a wɔtaa me no so.Ka kyerɛ me kra se,“Mene wʼagyenkwa.”
35.4: Wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wokum me no,ma wɔn anim ngu ase;wɔn a wɔbɔ me sɛe ho pɔw no,ma wɔmfa aniwu nsan wɔn akyi.
35.5: Ma wɔnyɛ sɛ ntɛtɛ a mframa bɔ guwɔn a Awurade bɔfo repam wɔn no.
35.6: Ma wɔn akwan so nnuru sum na ɛso ɛnyɛ toro,na Awurade bɔfo ntaa wɔn.
35.7: Esiane sɛ wɔde ɔtan sum me afiri kwa,na wotuu amoa maa me a menyɛɛ wɔn hwee no nti
35.8: ma ɔsɛe mmefu wɔn muna ɔtan no a wɔde hintaw no nyi wɔn,na ma wɔnhwe amoa no mu nsɛe.
35.9: Afei me kra ani begye wɔ Awurade muna wasɛpɛw ne ho wɔ ne nkwagye mu.
35.10: Me nipadua nyinaa bɛteɛ mu aka se,“Hena na ɔte sɛ wo, Awurade?Wugye ohiani fi ahoɔdenfo nsam,ne nea onni bi fi apoobɔfo nsam.”
35.11: Adansekurumfo sɔre;wobisa me nneɛma a minnim ho hwee ho asɛm.
35.12: Wɔde bɔne tua papa a meyɛ so kana wɔma me kra yɛ basaa.
35.13: Nanso bere a wɔyaree no, mifuraa atweaatamna mede akɔnkyen brɛɛ me ho ase.Bere a me mpaebɔ ho mmuae nnya mmae no,
35.14: mekɔɔ so twaa adwo,sɛnea meyɛ ma mʼadamfo anaa onuabarima.Mede awerɛhow sii me ti asete sɛ nea meregyam me na.
35.15: Nanso bere a mihintiw no wɔde anigye boaa wɔn ho ano;afowfo twaa me ho hyiae a minnim,na wodii me ho nseku a wɔantwa so da.
35.16: Wɔde adwemmɔne dii me ho fɛw te sɛ nnipa a wonni nyamesu,wɔtwɛree wɔn se guu me so.
35.17: Awurade, wobɛhwɛ wɔn akosi da bɛn?Gye me nkwa fi wɔn sɛe mu,gye me nkwa a ɛsom bo no fi saa gyata yi nsam.
35.18: Na mɛda wo ase wɔ guabɔ kɛse ase;wɔ nnipa dodow mu na mɛkamfo wo.
35.19: Mma mʼatamfo a wɔtan me kwa nonhwɛ me haw nserew.Mma wɔn a menyɛɛ wɔn hwee nanso wɔtan me nommfa adwene bɔne mmu me anikyiw.
35.20: Wɔnnkasa asomdwoe so,na mmom, wɔde ntwatosotia nnipa a wɔmpɛ wɔn ho asɛm wɔ asase yi so.
35.21: Wɔhwɛ me haw ka se, “Yiw! Yiw,yɛde yɛn ankasa ani ahu.”
35.22: Awurade, woahu na mmua wʼano.Ntwe wo ho nkɔ akyiri, Awurade.
35.23: Nyan, sɔre na bɛbɔ me ho ban!Ka bi ma me, me Nyankopɔn ne mʼAwurade.
35.24: Di mʼasɛm ma me wɔ wo trenee no mu, Awurade me Nyankopɔn;mma wɔnnhwɛ me haw nserew.
35.25: Mma wɔnnwene nka se, “Yiw, nea yɛpɛ ni!”anaa wɔnnka se, “Yɛanya no.”
35.26: Ma wɔn a wɔhwɛ me haw serew me wɔ mʼahohiahia mu nonyinaa anim ngu ase na wɔnyɛ basaa;ma wɔn a wodi me so akokurokosɛm nonhyɛ aniwu ne animguase atade.
35.27: Ma wɔn a wodi ahurusi wɔ me bembu ho nomfa anigye ne ahosɛpɛw nteɛ mubere nyinaa mu; ma wɔnka se, “Momma Awurade so,ɔno na nʼani gye ne somfo yiyedi ho.”
35.28: Me tɛkrɛma bɛka wo trenee,ne wʼayeyi, da mu nyinaa.

36.1: Dwom Awurade somfo Dawid dwom.Nkɔmhyɛ bi wɔ me koma mu a efi Onyankopɔn hɔa ɛfa omumɔyɛfo mmarato ho.Onyankopɔn suro nni wɔn ani so.
36.2: Na ɔno ankasa ani so no ɔdaadaa no ho dodo,nti ɛmma onhu ne bɔne nnyae yɛ.
36.3: Nʼanom nsɛm yɛ atirimɔden ne nnaadaa;onnim nyansa bio na wayɛ papa.
36.4: Ɔda ne mpa so mpo a ɔbɔ pɔw bɔne;na ogyaa ne ho ma bɔne kwanna ɔmpo nea enye.
36.5: Awurade, wʼadɔe du ɔsorosorowo nokwaredi du wim tɔnn.
36.6: Wo trenee te sɛ mmepɔw akɛse.Wʼatɛntrenee mu dɔ sɛ po bun.Ao Awurade, wokora nnipa ne mmoa nyinaa so.
36.7: Wʼadɔe a ɛnsa da no som bo!Nnipa mu akɛse ne nketewanya guankɔbea wɔ wo ntaban nwini ase.
36.8: Wodi nea abu so wɔ wo fi,woma wɔnom fi wʼanika asuten no mu.
36.9: Wo nkyɛn na nkwa asuti wɔ;wo hann mu na yehu hann.
36.10: Kɔ so dɔ wɔn a wonim wo,ma wo trenee ntena wɔn a wɔteɛ, koma mu.
36.11: Mma ɔhantanni nan ntia meanaa omumɔyɛfo nsa nnsunsum me.
36.12: Hwɛ sɛnea nnebɔneyɛfo ahwehwe ase,wɔdeda hɔ a wɔrentumi nsɔre bio.

37.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Nhaw wo ho, nnebɔneyɛfo nti;mma wʼani mmmere wɔn a wɔyɛ bɔne;
37.2: Wɔte sɛ sare, ɛrenkyɛ na ahyew,wɔte sɛ dua amono, ɛrenkyɛ na awu.
37.3: Fa wo ho to Awurade so na yɛ papa.Tena asase no so na ma wʼani nka asomdwoe adidibea hɔ.
37.4: Ma wʼani nnye wɔ Awurade muna wama wo nea wo koma pɛ.
37.5: Fa wʼakwan hyɛ Awurade nsam;na fa wo ho to no so, na ɔno na ɔbɛyɛ:
37.6: ɔbɛma wo treneeyɛ ahyerɛn sɛ adekyee,na wʼatɛntrenee ayɛ sɛ owigyinae.
37.7: Yɛ komm wɔ Awurade anim na tɔ wo bo ase twɛn no,nhaw wo ho wɔ wɔn a asi wɔn yiye hoefisɛ wɔnam bɔne akwan so.
37.8: Mma wo bo mmfuw na gyae abufuwhyew;nhaw wo ho, ekowie bɔne nko ara.
37.9: Wobetwa nnebɔneyɛfo agu,nanso wɔn a wɔn ani da Awurade so nowobenya asase no adi so.
37.10: Ɛrenkyɛ, nnebɔneyɛfo bɛyera.Wɔbɛhwehwɛ wɔn, nanso wɔrenhu wɔn.
37.11: Nanso ahobrɛasefo benya asase no adi sona wɔanya asomdwoe mmoroso.
37.12: Amumɔyɛfo bɔ pɔw bɔne tia atreneefona wɔtwɛre wɔn se gu wɔn so;
37.13: nanso Awurade serew amumɔyɛfo,na onim sɛ wɔn nna abɛn.
37.14: Amumɔyɛfo twe afoana wokuntun wɔn ta musɛ wobekum ahiafo ne mmɔborɔfo,sɛ wobekum wɔn a wɔn akwan teɛ.
37.15: Nanso wɔn afoa bɛwowɔ wɔn ankasa koma mu,na wɔn ta mu abubu.
37.16: Kakra a atreneefo wɔ no som bosen amumɔyɛfo bebree ahonya;
37.17: efisɛ amumɔyɛfo ahoɔden bɛsananso Awurade bɛwowaw atreneefo.
37.18: Awurade nim wɔn a wɔn ho nni asɛm no nna,na wɔn agyapade bɛtena hɔ daa.
37.19: Ahohiahia bere mu wɔremmrɛ.Ɔkɔm bere mu wobenya ama abu so.
37.20: Nanso amumɔyɛfo bɛyera.Awurade atamfo bɛyɛ sɛ nwura mu nhwiren;wobetu ayera sɛ wusiw.
37.21: Amumɔyɛfo pɛ bosea, na wontua,nanso ɔtreneeni de ahummɔbɔ ma;
37.22: Wɔn a Awurade ahyira wɔn no benya asase no adi so,na wobetwa wɔn a ɔdome wɔn no agu.
37.23: Sɛ Awurade ani sɔ onipa akwan a,ɔma nʼanammɔntu si pi.
37.24: Sɛ ohintiw a ɔrenhwe ase,efisɛ Awurade kura no wɔ ne nsam.
37.25: Na meyɛ aberante, na mprempren mabɔ akwakoraa,na minhuu ɔtreneeni a Awurade apa nʼakyianaasɛ ne mma resrɛ aduan.
37.26: Bere biara ɔyɛ adɔe, na ɔde fɛm kwa;na ne mma benya nhyira.
37.27: Twe wo ho fi bɔne ho na yɛ papana wobɛtena asase no so afebɔɔ.
37.28: Efisɛ, Awurade pɛ nea ɛteɛ,na ɔrennyaw ne nkurɔfo anokwafo no.Wobenya bammɔ daa nyinaa.Nanso amumɔyɛfo asefo de, wobetwa wɔn agu.
37.29: Atreneefo benya asase no adi sona wɔatena so afebɔɔ.
37.30: Ɔtreneeni ano ka nyansasɛm,na ne tɛkrɛma ka nea ɛteɛ.
37.31: Ne Nyankopɔn mmara wɔ ne koma mu;wɔn anan nwatiri.
37.32: Amumɔyɛfo tetɛw atreneefohwehwɛ sɛ wobekum wɔn,
37.33: nanso Awurade nnyaa wɔn mma wɔn,na ɔremma wommu wɔn kumfɔ wɔ asennii.
37.34: Montwɛn Awuradena monhwɛ nʼakwan.Ɔbɛma mo so na moanya asase no adi so;sɛ wotwitwa amumɔyɛfo no gu a, mubehu.
37.35: Mahu omumɔyɛfo a ɔyɛ basabasasɛ ɔredi yiye sɛ dua amono a esi asase pa so,
37.36: nanso ankyɛ na nʼawiei bae a wonhu no bio;mehwehwɛɛ no, nanso manhu no.
37.37: Susuw nea ɔyɛ pɛ ho, na hwɛ nea ɔteɛ;na asomdwoe nipa benya asetena pa daakye.
37.38: Nanso wɔbɛsɛe nnebɔneyɛfo nyinaa;na wɔbɛtɔre wɔn asefo ase.
37.39: Atreneefo nkwagye fi Awuradeɔne wɔn aban wɔ amanehunu bere mu.
37.40: Awurade boa wɔn na ogye wɔn;oyi wɔn fi amumɔyɛfo nsam, na ogye wɔn nkwa,efisɛ wohintaw wɔ ne mu.

38.1: Dwom Dawid dwom. Adesrɛ.Awurade, nka mʼanim wɔ wʼabufuw muna ntwe mʼaso wɔ wʼabufuwhyew mu.
38.2: Wo bɛmma hwirew me mu,na wo nsa adwerɛw me.
38.3: Wʼabufuwhyew no nti ahoɔden biara nni me mu;me bɔne nti, me nnompe ahodwow.
38.4: Mʼafɔdi amene mete sɛ adesoa a mu yɛ duru dodo.
38.5: Mʼakuru bɔn na aporɔwesiane me bɔne mu agyimisɛm nti.
38.6: Makotow na wɔabrɛ me ase;da mu nyinaa menantenantew twa agyaadwo.
38.7: Mʼakyi dompe mu yaw boro so:ahoɔden biara nni me nipadua mu.
38.8: Mabrɛ na mapɛtɛw koraa.Me koma mu yaw ma misi apini.
38.9: Awurade, nea merehwɛ anim nyinaa da wʼanim;mʼapinisi nhintaw wo.
38.10: Me koma bɔ kitirikitiri, na mʼahoɔden asampo mʼaniwa aduru sum.
38.11: Mʼapirakuru nti me nnamfonom ne me yɔnkonom mmɛn me;mʼafipamfo twe wɔn ho fi me ho.
38.12: Wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wokum me no sum me mfiri,wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔhaw me no di me sɛe ho nkɔmmɔda mu nyinaa wodwen nnaadaasɛm ho.
38.13: Mete sɛ ɔsotifo a ɔnte asɛm,mete sɛ mum a ontumi nkasa.
38.14: Mayɛ sɛ obi a ɔnte asɛm,nea nʼano ntumi mma mmuae.
38.15: Awurade, meretwɛn wo;Awurade me Nyankopɔn, wubegye me so.
38.16: Mekae se, “Mma wɔn ani nnye;anaa wɔmma wɔn ho so bere a mʼanan awatiri no.”
38.17: Mereyɛ mahwe ase,na me yaw da so wɔ me mu.
38.18: Meka me mfomso kyerɛ;me bɔne hyɛ me so.
38.19: Bebree na wɔyɛ mʼatamfo;wɔn a wɔtan me kwa no dɔɔso.
38.20: Wɔn a wɔde bɔne tua me papa so ka no,bɔ me ahohora bere a mereyɛ papa.
38.21: Awurade nnyaw me.Me Nyankopɔn, nkɔ akyiri!

39.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Mekae se, “Mɛhwɛ mʼakwan yiyena mamfa me tɛkrɛma anyɛ bɔne;mɛto mʼano nnarekabere a amumɔyɛfo bɛn me yi.
39.2: Enti meyɛɛ komma manka asɛm papa biara mponanso mʼapinisi mu yɛɛ den.
39.3: Me koma ho guan no wɔ me mu.Midwinnwen no, ogya dɛwee;afei mede me tɛkrɛma kasae se:
39.4: “Awurade, ma minhu me nkwa awieine me nna dodow;ma minhu sɛnea me nkwa si twa mu ntɛm so.
39.5: Woayɛ me nna sɛ nsateaa baako pɛ;na me mfe dodow nyɛ hwee wɔ wʼani so.Onipa nkwa yɛ ɔhome bi kɛkɛ.
39.6: Onipa redi akɔneaba nyinaa no, ɔte sɛ sunsuma bi kwa;ɔhaw ne ho nanso ɔyɛ kwa;ɔboa ahonya ano na onnim nea ɛbɛyɛ ne de.
39.7: “Afei Awurade, dɛn na merehwehwɛ?Mʼanidaso wɔ wo mu.
39.8: Gye me fi me bɔne nyinaa mu;mma mennyɛ nkwaseafo aserewde.
39.9: Meyɛɛ komm, na mammue mʼano,efisɛ wo na woayɛ eyi.
39.10: Yi wʼasotwe fi me so;wo nsa ano amanehunu amene me.
39.11: Woka nnipa anim, na wotwe wɔn aso wɔ wɔn bɔne ho;wosɛe wɔn ahonya te sɛ nwewee;onipa biara yɛ ɔhome kɛkɛ.
39.12: “Awurade, tie me mpaebɔ,tie me sufrɛ;nsiw wʼaso wɔ me su ho.Me ne wo te hɔ sɛ ɔnanani,sɛnea na mʼagyanom nyinaa te no.
39.13: Yi wʼani fi me so na manya nkwa bio,ansa na mafi ha a mente ase bio.”

40.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Mede boasetɔ twɛn Awurade;na ɔhwɛɛ me, na ɔtee me sufrɛ.
40.2: Oyii me fii amoa a mu yɛ toro mu,fii dɔte ne dontori mu;ɔde mʼanan sii ɔbotan sona ɔmaa me baabi pa gyinae.
40.3: Ɔde dwom foforo hyɛɛ mʼanom,ayeyi dwom a yɛde ma yɛn Nyankopɔn.Bebree behu na wɔasuro,na wɔde wɔn werɛ ahyɛ Awurade mu.
40.4: Nhyira ne onipa aɔde Awurade yɛ nʼahotoso,nea ɔmfa nʼani nto ahomaso so,ne wɔn a wɔman di anyame huhuw akyi.
40.5: Awurade me Nyankopɔnwoayɛ anwonwade bebree.Nneɛma a wohyehyɛ maa yɛn noobiara ntumi nka ne nyinaa nkyerɛ wo;sɛ meka se mereka ne nyinaa ho asɛm aɛbɛdɔɔso dodo.
40.6: Wompɛ afɔrebɔ ne ayɛyɛde,nanso woabue mʼaso;woampɛ ɔhyew afɔre ne bɔne afɔre.
40.7: Na mekae se, “Mini, maba,sɛnea wɔakyerɛw afa me ho wɔ nhoma mmobɔwee no mu no.
40.8: Me Nyankopɔn, mepɛ sɛ meyɛ wʼapɛde;wo mmara wɔ me koma mu.”
40.9: Meka wo trenee ho asɛm wɔ guabɔ kɛse ase;mimmua mʼano,Awurade, sɛnea wunim no.
40.10: Memmfa wo trenee ho asɛm nsie me koma mu;meka wo nokware ne wo nkwagye ho asɛm.Mankata wʼadɔe ne wo nokware sowɔ guabɔ kɛse no ase.
40.11: Awurade, nyi wʼahummɔbɔ mfi me so;ma wʼadɔe ne wo nokware mmɔ me ho ban daa.
40.12: Ɔhaw bebree atwa me ho ahyia;mʼamumɔyɛ abu afa me so enti minhu ade bio.Ɛdɔɔso sen me ti so nwi,na me koma abotow wɔ me mu.
40.13: Awurade, ma ɛnsɔ wʼani sɛ wubegye me;Awurade, bra ntɛm bɛboa me.
40.14: Wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wokum me no nyinaa,ma wɔn anim ngu ase na wɔnyɛ basaa;ma wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ mesɛe nomfa aniwu nsan wɔn akyi.
40.15: Ma wɔn a wɔka, “Ɔtwea! Ɔtwea!” kyerɛ me nonsan wɔn akyi, esiane wɔn aniwu nti.
40.16: Nanso ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ wo nyinaansɛpɛw wɔn ho na wɔn ani nnye wɔ wo mu;ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo nkwagye no nka da biara se,“Awurade yɛ ɔkɛse!”
40.17: Nanso meyɛ ohiani ne mmɔborɔni;ma Awurade nnwen me ho.Wo ne me boafo ne me gyefo;wo ne me Nyankopɔn, bra ntɛm.

41.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Nhyira ne onipa a mmɔborɔni asɛm ho hia no;Awurade gye no wɔ amanehunu bere mu.
41.2: Awurade bɛbɔ ne ho ban na wakora ne kra;obehyira no wɔ asase no so;ɔrennyaa no mma nʼatamfo apɛde.
41.3: Awurade bɛhwɛ no wɔ ne yare mpa sona wagye no asi hɔ.
41.4: Mekae se, “Ao Awurade hu me mmɔbɔ;sa me yare, efisɛ mayɛ bɔne atia wo.”
41.5: Mʼatamfo de adwene bɔne ka fa me ho se:“Da bɛn na obewu ama ne din ayera?”
41.6: Bere biara a obi ba me nkyɛn no,ɔka atosɛm, na ne koma hɔre dinsɛe;ofi adi kɔ a, ɔde kodi nseku.
41.7: Mʼatamfo nyinaa keka asomsɛm fa me ho;wosusuw bɔne ma me na wɔka se:
41.8: “Ɔyare bɔne bi abɔ no;ɔrensɔre mfi nea ɔda hɔ bio.”
41.9: Mpo me yɔnko pa ara a mede me ho too no so,nea me ne no too nsa didii no,asɔre atia me.
41.10: Nanso wo, Awurade, hu me mmɔbɔ;ma me so, na mintua wɔn so ka.
41.11: Minim sɛ wʼani sɔ me,na me tamfo renni me so nkonim.
41.12: Me nokwaredi mu, wukura me muna wode me gyina wʼanim afebɔɔ.
41.13: Nhyira nka Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn,nnɛ ne daa nyinaa.Amen! ne Amen!

42.1: NHOMA A ƐTO SO ABIENNnwom –Dwom Koramma “maskil” dwom.Sɛnea ɔforote pere hwehwɛ nsuwansuwa no,saa ara na me kra pere hwehwɛ wo, me Nyankopɔn.
42.2: Onyankopɔn ho sukɔm de me kra, Onyankopɔn teasefo no.Da bɛn na metumi akohyia Onyankopɔn?
42.3: Me nisu ayɛ mʼaduanawia ne anadwo,na da mu nyinaa nnipa bisa me se:“Wo Nyankopɔn wɔ he?”
42.4: Saa nneɛma yi na mekaebere a mereka me koma mu nsɛm;sɛnea na midi asafokuw anim,na yɛde anigye nteɛteɛmu ne aseda nnwomnantew yuu bɔ mu kɔ Onyankopɔn fiwɔ afahyɛ da no.
42.5: Me kra, adɛn, na woabotow?Adɛn na woayɛ basaa wɔ me mu saa?Fa wo ho to Onyankopɔn so,na mɛkɔ so ayi no ayɛ,mʼAgyenkwa ne me Nyankopɔn.
42.6: Me kra abotow wɔ me mu,enti mɛkae wofi Yordan asase so,Hermon mmepɔw so, fi Bepɔw Misar so.
42.7: Ebun kɔ bun muwɔ wo nsu a ɛworo gu no nnyigyei mu;wʼasorɔkye nyinaaabu afa me so.
42.8: Adekyee mu, Awurade kyerɛ nʼadɔe,adesae mu, ne dwom ba me nkyɛn,mpae a mebɔ srɛ me nkwa Nyankopɔn.
42.9: Mibisa Onyankopɔn, me Botan no se,“Adɛn nti na wo werɛ afi me?Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ menantenantew twa adwo,mʼatamfo nhyɛso nti?”
42.10: Me nnompe te ɔdesani yawdi,mʼahohiahiafo ateetee nti,daa nyinaa wobisa me se,“Wo Nyankopɔn wɔ he?”
42.11: Me kra, adɛn, na woabotow?Adɛn na woayɛ basaa wɔ me mu saa?Fa wo ho to Onyankopɔn so,na mɛkɔ so ayi no ayɛ,mʼAgyenkwa ne me Nyankopɔn.

43.1: Dwom Me Nyankopɔn, bu me bem,na ka mʼasɛm a etia ɔman a wonsuro wo no ma me;gye me fi nnaadaafo ne amumɔyɛfo nsam.
43.2: Woyɛ Onyankopɔn, mʼabandennen.Adɛn nti na woapo me?Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ menantenantew twa adwomʼatamfo nhyɛso nti?
43.3: Soma wo hann ne wo nokwarema wɔnkyerɛ me kwan;ma wɔmfa me mmra wo Bepɔw Kronkron no so,faako a wote no.
43.4: Afei, mɛkɔ Onyankopɔn afɔremuka anim,mʼanigye ne mʼahosɛpɛw Nyankopɔn nkyɛn.Mede sanku beyi wo ayɛ,Onyankopɔn, me Nyankopɔn.
43.5: Me kra, adɛn, na woabotow?Adɛn na woayɛ basaa wɔ me mu saa?Fa wo ho to Onyankopɔn so,na mɛkɔ so ayi no ayɛ,mʼAgyenkwa ne me Nyankopɔn.

44.1: Dwom Koramma “maskil” dwom.Ao, Onyankopɔn, yɛde yɛn aso ate;yɛn agyanom aka akyerɛ yɛn;nea woyɛɛ wɔ wɔn bere so,wɔ tete mmere no mu.
44.2: Wode wo nsa pam amanaman nona wobɔɔ yɛn agyanom atenase;wodwerɛw nnipa nona womaa yɛn agyanom dii yiye.
44.3: Ɛnyɛ wɔn afoa na wɔde nyaa asase no,na ɛnyɛ wɔn nsa na ɛmaa wɔn nkonimdi;ɛyɛ wo nsa nifa, wo basa,ne wʼanim hann, efisɛ na wodɔ wɔn.
44.4: Woyɛ me Hene ne me Nyankopɔn,nea ɔhyɛ nkonimdi ma Yakob.
44.5: Ɛnam wo so na yɛpam yɛn Atamfo;wo din mu na yetiatia wɔn a wokyi yɛn no so.
44.6: Memmfa me ho nto mʼagyan so,mʼafoa remfa nkonimdi mmrɛ me;
44.7: na wo na woma yedi yɛn atamfo sowugu wɔn a wɔtan yɛn no anim ase.
44.8: Onyankopɔn mu na yɛhoahoa yɛn ho da mu nyinaa,na yɛbɛkamfo wo din no daa daa.
44.9: Nanso mprempren woapo yɛn abrɛ yɛn ase;wone yɛn asraafo nkɔ ɔsa bio.
44.10: Woma yeguan fii dɔm anim,ma yɛn atamfo fom yɛn agyapade.
44.11: Wuyii yɛn maa sɛ wonkum yɛn sɛ nguanna woahwete yɛn wɔ amanaman no mu.
44.12: Wotɔn wo nkurɔfo fofoofow,na woannya mfaso biara amfi mu.
44.13: Woayɛ yɛn ahohorade ama yɛn afipamfo,animtiaabude ne aserewde ama wɔn a wɔatwa yɛn ho ahyia.
44.14: Woayɛ yɛn kasabebui wɔ aman no muna nnipa no wosow wɔn ti de gu yɛn so.
44.15: Mʼanimguase di mʼanim daa,na aniwu akata mʼanim,
44.16: esiane wɔn a wɔbɔ me ahohora na wɔkasa tia me de yi me ahi,esiane ɔtamfo a nʼani abere sɛ ɔbɛtɔ were no nti.
44.17: Eyinom nyinaa too yɛn de,nanso yɛn werɛ mfii wo,na yemmuu wʼapam no nso so ɛ.
44.18: Yɛn koma ntwe mfii wo ho;na yɛn anan nso mman mfii wo kwan so ɛ.
44.19: Nanso wodwerɛw yɛn yɛɛ yɛn sakraman tuna wode sum kabii kataa yɛn so.
44.20: Sɛ na yɛn werɛ afi yɛn Nyankopɔn dinanaa sɛ yɛatrɛw yɛn nsam akyerɛ ananafo nyame a,
44.21: anka Onyankopɔn behu,efisɛ onim koma mu ahintasɛm.
44.22: Nanso wo nti wokum yɛn daa nyinaa;wobu yɛn sɛ nguan a wɔrekokum wɔn.
44.23: Nyan, Awurade! Adɛn nti na woada?Keka wo ho! Nnyaw yɛn hɔ afebɔɔ.
44.24: Adɛn nti na wode wʼanim ahintawna wo werɛ fi yɛn ahohia ne nhyɛso?
44.25: Wɔabrɛ yɛn ase kɔ dɔte muna yɛn nipadua aka afam dɔte.
44.26: Sɔre bɛboa yɛn;wʼadɔe a ɛnsa da no nti, gye yɛn.

45.1: Dwom Koramma dwom. Ayeforohyia dwom.Botae bi a edi mu akanyan me komabere a merebɔ ɔhene mmran no;me tɛkrɛma yɛ ɔkyerɛwfo kunini bi kyerɛwdua.
45.2: Wudi mu koraa wɔ mmarima muna wɔde adom bi asra wʼano,esiane sɛ Onyankopɔn ahyira wo afebɔɔ no nti.
45.3: Fa wʼafoa bɔ wo nkyɛn mu, okokuroko;fa anuonyam ne kɛseyɛ fura.
45.4: Fa wo kɛseyɛ mu kɔ wʼanim nkonimdi sowɔ nokware, ahobrɛase ne trenee mu;ma wo nsa nifa nna wo nnwuma a ɛyɛ nwonwa no adi.
45.5: Ma wo bɛmma nnamnam no nhwirew ɔhene atamfo koma mu;na ma amanaman nhwe wʼanan ase.
45.6: Ao Onyankopɔn, wʼahengua no bɛtena hɔ daa daa;trenee ahempema bɛyɛ wʼahenni no ahempema.
45.7: Wodɔ trenee na wukyi bɔne.Ɛno nti Onyankopɔn, wo Nyankopɔn de wo asi wo mfɛfo so,na ɔde anigye ngo asra wo.
45.8: Kurobow, pɛprɛ ne bɛwewonua hua agye wo batakari mu nyinaa;sanku so nnwom a efi ahemfi a wɔde asonse asiesie ho muma wʼani gye.
45.9: Ahemfo mmabea ka wo mmea atitiriw ho;wo nsa nifa so na ayeforo dehye a ɔhyɛ Ofir sikakɔkɔɔ gyina.
45.10: Ɔbabea tie, dwene ho, na yɛ osetie;ma wo werɛ mfi wo nkurɔfo ne wo papa fi.
45.11: Wʼahoɔfɛ asɔ ɔhene no ani;di no ni, efisɛ ɔno ne wo wura.
45.12: Tiro Babea de ayɛyɛde bɛba;mmarima adefo bɛdɛfɛdɛfɛ wo.
45.13: Ɔhene babea a ɔwɔ ne pia mu no yɛ onuonyamfowɔde sikakɔkɔɔ abobɔ nʼatade yuu mu.
45.14: Ɔhyɛ ntade a wɔadi mu adwinni na wɔde no kɔma ɔhene;ne mfɛfo mmabun di nʼakyina wɔde wɔn nyinaa brɛ wo.
45.15: Wɔde ahosɛpɛw ne anigye kɔ mu;wɔhyɛn ɔhempɔn no ahemfi.
45.16: Wo mmabarima besi wʼagyanom anan muwobɛyɛ wɔn mmapɔmma wɔ asase no so nyinaa.
45.17: Mɛma wɔakae wo wɔ awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu;ɛno nti amanaman bɛkamfo wo daa nyinaa.

46.1: Dwom Koramma dwom. Wɔto no “alamot” sanku nne so.Onyankopɔn ne yɛn guankɔbea ne yɛn ahoɔden,amanehunu mu boafo a ɔwɔ hɔ bere biara.
46.2: Enti sɛ asase ani dan butuw,na mmepɔw tutu kogu po ase a, yɛrensuro,
46.3: sɛ po bɔ asorɔkye na ehuruna ɛma nkoko wosow mpo a, yɛrensuro.
46.4: Asuten bi wɔ hɔ ane nsuwansuwa de anigye ba Onyankopɔn kuropɔn mu,beae kronkron a Ɔsorosoroni no te.
46.5: Onyankopɔn te kuropɔn no mu, na ɔrenhwe ase;Onyankopɔn bɛboa no anɔpahema.
46.6: Amanaman yɛ hoo, na ahenni hwehwe ase;ɔma ne nne so ma asase nan.
46.7: Asafo Awurade ka yɛn ho.Yakob Nyankopɔn yɛ yɛn aban.
46.8: Bra bɛhwɛ Awurade nnwuma,ɔsɛe a ɔde aba asase no so.
46.9: Ɔma akodi gyae kosi asase ano.Obubu agyan mu na ɔsɛe peaw;ɔde ogya hyew nkatabo.
46.10: Monyɛ komm na munhu sɛ me ne Onyankopɔn;wɔbɛma me so wɔ amanaman no mu,wɔbɛma me so wɔ asase so.
46.11: Asafo Awurade ka yɛn ho;Yakob Nyankopɔn yɛ yɛn aban.

47.1: Dwom Koramma dwom.Amanaman nyinaa, mommɔ mo nsam;momfa anigye nteɛ mu mfrɛ Onyankopɔn.
47.2: Awurade Ɔsorosoroni no ho yɛ nwonwa,Ɔyɛ Ɔhene kɛse wɔ asase nyinaa so!
47.3: Ɔde amanaman hyɛɛ yɛn ase,na ɔde nnipa hyɛɛ yɛn anan ase.
47.4: Oyii yɛn agyapade maa yɛn,nea ɛyɛ Yakob a ɔdɔ no no ahohoahoade.
47.5: Onyankopɔn aforo kɔ soro wɔ anigye nteɛteɛmu mu,Awurade wɔ torobɛnto nnyigyei mu.
47.6: To ayeyi nnwom ma Onyankopɔn, to ayeyi nnwom;to ayeyi nnwom ma yɛn Hene, to ayeyi nnwom.
47.7: Efisɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ asase nyinaa so Hene.Monto ahurusi nnwom mma no.
47.8: Onyankopɔn di hene wɔ amanaman no so;Onyankopɔn te nʼahengua kronkron so.
47.9: Amanaman no mu akunini boaboa wɔn ho anosɛ Abraham Nyankopɔn nkurɔfo,efisɛ asase so ahemfo yɛ Onyankopɔn de;na wɔma no so kɛse.

48.1: Dwom Koramma dwom.Awurade yɛ ɔkɛse na ɔsɛ nkamfo,wɔ yɛn Nyankopɔn kuropɔn mu, ne bepɔw kronkron so.
48.2: Ne sorokɔ ma ɛyɛ fɛ,ɛyɛ wiase nyinaa anigyede.Bepɔw Sion te sɛ Safon sorɔnsorɔmmea,Ɔhenkɛse no kuropɔn.
48.3: Onyankopɔn te nʼabankɛse muwada ne ho adi sɛ ɔyɛ nʼabandennen.
48.4: Bere a ahemfo yi boaa wɔn ho ano,na wotuu ɔsa bɔɔ mu no,
48.5: wohuu no ma ɛyɛɛ wɔn ahodwiriw,na wɔde ehu guanee.
48.6: Wɔbɔɔ huboa wɔ hɔ,ɔyaw a ɛte sɛ ɔbea a awo aka no.
48.7: Wosɛe wɔn sɛ Tarsis ahyɛn aapuei mframa abɔ adwira wɔn.
48.8: Sɛnea yɛate no,saa ara na yɛahuwɔ Asafo Awurade kuropɔn no mu,yɛn Nyankopɔn kuropɔn mu;Onyankopɔn ma etim hɔ afebɔɔ.
48.9: Wʼasɔredan no mu; Ao, Onyankopɔn,na yɛdwene wo dɔ a enni huammɔ da no ho,
48.10: Ao, Onyankopɔn, wʼayeyi du asase anote sɛ wo din te;trenee ayɛ wo nsa nifa mu ma.
48.11: Sion bepɔw di ahurusi,Yuda nkuraase no ani gyeesiane wʼatemmu no nti.
48.12: Nantew Sion na twa ho hyia,kan nʼabantenten dodow,
48.13: dwene nʼafasu ho yiye,hwɛ nʼabankɛse no,na woaka ho asɛm akyerɛ nkyirimma.
48.14: Saa Onyankopɔn yi yɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn daa daa;ɔbɛyɛ yɛn kwankyerɛfo akosi awiei mpo.

49.1: Dwom Koramma dwom.Muntie, mo saa nnipa yi nyinaa;monyɛ aso, mo a mowɔ wiase yi mu nyinaa,
49.2: nea ɔyɛ abomfiaa ne nea odi mu,adefo ne ahiafo nyinaa.
49.3: Mʼano bɛka anyansasɛm;nsɛm a efi me koma mu bɛma nhumu.
49.4: Mɛbrɛ mʼaso ase atie mmebusɛm;na sanku na mede bɛkyerɛ mʼabisae ase.
49.5: Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ misuro, bere a nna bɔne aba,bere a amumɔyɛfo nnaadaafo atwa me ho ahyia,
49.6: wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to wɔn ahonya sona wɔde wɔn ade dodow hoahoa wɔn ho?
49.7: Onipa biara rentumi nnye ne yɔnko nkwana ɔrentumi mfa mpata biara mma Onyankopɔn,
49.8: nkwa ho mpata bo yɛ den,akatua biara renso,
49.9: sɛ ɛbɛma no atena ase afebɔɔa ɔrenhu porɔwee.
49.10: Obiara nim pefee sɛ anyansafo wu;saa ara na nkwaseafo ne agyimifo nso wu,na wogyaw wɔn ahonya hɔ ma afoforo.
49.11: Wɔn nna bɛyɛ wɔn afi afebɔɔ,wɔn atenae wɔ awo ntoatoaso bere a enni awiei mu,ɛmfa ho sɛ wɔde wɔn din atoto nsase so.
49.12: Na onipa ahonya nyinaa akyi no, ɔrentena hɔ daa;ɔte sɛ mmoa a wowu no ara.
49.13: Eyi ne nea ɛda hɔ ma wɔn a wogye wɔn ho di,ne wɔn akyidifo a wɔfoa wɔn nsɛm so.
49.14: Wɔte sɛ nguan, na wɔbɛkɔ ɔda mu,na owu de wɔn bɛyɛ nʼaduan.Atreneefo bedi wɔn so anɔpa;wɔn nipadua bɛporɔw wɔ ɔda mu,na wɔne wɔn adan akɛse no ntam akwan bɛware.
49.15: Nanso Onyankopɔn begye me afi ɔda mu;ampa ara, ɔde me bɛkɔ ne nkyɛn.
49.16: Sɛ onipa nya ne ho a, mma ɛnnhaw wo;na sɛ ne fi anigye yɛ bebree a, mma ɛnnhaw wo;
49.17: efisɛ, sɛ owu a ɔremmfa hwee nkɔ,nʼanuonyam ne no renkɔ amoa mu.
49.18: Mpo ɔte ase no, ɔfaa no sɛ wɔahyira no,efisɛ wɔkamfo nnipa bere a wodi yiye,
49.19: nanso ɔbɛkɔ akɔka nʼagyanom ho,wɔn a wɔrenhu nkwa hann ara da no.
49.20: Onipa a ɔwɔ ahonya na onni nhumu note sɛ mmoa a wowu.

50.1: Dwom Asaf dwom.Tweduampɔn, Onyankopɔn, Awurade no kasa,na ɔfrɛ asase nyinaaefi apuei kosi atɔe.
50.2: Onyankopɔn hyerɛn fi Sionkurow a ne fɛ wie pɛyɛ.
50.3: Yɛn Nyankopɔn reba nanso ɔrenyɛ komm;ogya a ɛhyew nneɛma di nʼanim,ahum a ɛretu atwa ne ho ahyia.
50.4: Ɔfrɛ ɔsorosoro ne asase,sɛ ɔrebu ne nkurɔfo atɛn;
50.5: Ɔka se, “Boaboa nnipa a wɔatew wɔn ho no ano ma me;wɔn a wɔnam afɔrebɔ so ne me yɛɛ apam no.”
50.6: Ɔsoro pae mu ka ne trenee,na Onyankopɔn ankasa ne otemmufo.
50.7: “Muntie, me nkurɔfo, na mɛkasa,medi adanse atia wo, Israel;Mene Onyankopɔn, wo Nyankopɔn no.
50.8: Merenka mo anim wɔ mo afɔrebɔdeanaa mo hyew afɔre a ɛwɔ mʼanim daa no ho.
50.9: Anantwinini a wofi mo mfuw soanaa mpapo a wofi mo buw mu ho nhia me,
50.10: efisɛ kwae mu aboa biara yɛ me de,anantwi a wɔwɔ nkoko mpempem so nso saa ara.
50.11: Minim anomaa biara a ɔwɔ mmepɔw no so,na wuram abɔde nyinaa yɛ me de.
50.12: Sɛ ɔkɔm dee me a, anka merenka nkyerɛ mo;efisɛ, wiase ne nea ɛwɔ mu nyinaa yɛ me de.
50.13: Mewe anantwinini nam,na menom mpapo mogya ana?
50.14: Momfa aseda afɔre mma Onyankopɔn,na munni bɔ a mohyɛɛ Ɔsorosoroni no so,
50.15: na momfrɛ me hiada;na megye mo na moahyɛ me anuonyam.”
50.16: Nanso amumɔyɛfo de, Onyankopɔn bisa wɔn se,“Adɛn nti na moka me mmarana mʼapam da mo ano?
50.17: Mukyi me nkyerɛkyerɛ,na motow me nsɛm gu mo akyi.
50.18: Sɛ muhu ɔkorɔmfo a mode mo ho bɔ no;na mo ne nguaman nso bɔ.
50.19: Mode mo ano yɛ bɔne,na mode mo tɛkrɛma boaboa nnaadaa ano.
50.20: Mokasa tia mo nuabarima bere biarana mosopa mo ankasa na ba.
50.21: Moayɛ eyinom nyinaa; nanso manka hwee,enti mususuw sɛ mete sɛ mo.Nanso mɛka mo anim,na mede mo sobo asi mo anim.
50.22: “Munnwen eyi ho, mo a mo werɛ fi Onyankopɔn,anyɛ saa a, mɛtetew mo mu nketenkete a obiara remmegye mo;
50.23: Nea ɔbɔ aseda afɔre no hyɛ me anuonyam,na osiesie kwansɛnea mɛda Onyankopɔn nkwagye adi akyerɛ no.”

51.1: Dwom Dawid dwom a ɔtoo no bere a ɔde ne ho kaa Batseba na odiyifo Natan kɔɔ ne nkyɛn no.Ao, Onyankopɔn hu me mmɔbɔ,sɛnea wʼadɔe a ɛnsa da no te;wʼahummɔbɔ kɛse no nti,pepa me mmarato.
51.2: Hohoro mʼamumɔyɛ nyinaana tew me ho fi me bɔne mu!
51.3: Na mahu me mmarato,na mekae me bɔne daa.
51.4: Mayɛ mfomso atia wo; atia wo nko arana mayɛ nea ɛyɛ bɔne wɔ wʼani so,enti wudi bem wɔ wʼatemmu muna woteɛ wɔ wʼatemmu mu.
51.5: Ampa ara wɔwoo me wɔ bɔne mu,na bɔne mu na me na nyinsɛn me.
51.6: Ampa ara nokware na wohwehwɛ wɔ me mu.Wokyerɛ me nyansa a mu dɔ.
51.7: Fa adwerɛ hohoro me ho, na me ho afi;guare me, na mɛhoa asen sukyerɛmma.
51.8: Ma mente ahosɛpɛw ne anigye nka;na ma nnompe a woabubu no nni ahurusi.
51.9: Kata wʼani wɔ me bɔne hona pepa mʼamumɔyɛ nyinaa.
51.10: Ao, Onyankopɔn, bɔ koma a mu tew wɔ me mu,na yɛ honhom a atim no foforo wɔ me mu.
51.11: Mpam me mfi wʼanim,na nyi wo Honhom Kronkron mfi me mu.
51.12: Fa wo nkwagye mu anigye no ma me bio,na ma me ɔpɛ honhom a ɛbɛma magyina.
51.13: Afei mɛkyerɛ nnebɔneyɛfo wʼakwan,na amumɔyɛfo bɛsan aba wo nkyɛn.
51.14: Ao, Onyankopɔn, gye me fi mogya ho afɔdi mu.Onyame a wugye me nkwa,na me tɛkrɛma bɛto wo trenee ho dwom.
51.15: Awurade, bue mʼano fafa,na mede mʼano bɛpae mu aka wʼayeyi.
51.16: Wompɛ afɔrebɔ, anka mɛbɔ;wʼani nnye ɔhyew afɔre ho.
51.17: Onyankopɔn afɔre yɛ honhom a abotow,Onyankopɔn,worempo ahonu ne ahobrɛase koma.
51.18: Ma ɛnyɛ wo fɛ sɛ wobɛma Sion anya nkɔso wɔ wʼanigye mu;na woasi Yerusalem afasu.
51.19: Afei wʼani begye ɔtreneeni afɔrebɔ ho,ɔhyew afɔre a edi mu;na wɔde anantwinini bɛbɔ afɔre wʼafɔremuka so.

52.1: Dwom Dawid “maskil” dwom. Ɔtoo bere a Edomni Doeg bɛka kyerɛɛ Saulo se, “Dawid akɔ Ahimelek fi” no.Ɔkɛse, adɛn nti na wohoahoa wo ho wɔ wo bɔne ho?Adɛn nti na wohoahoa wo ho da mu nyinaa,wo a woyɛ animguasede wɔ Onyankopɔn ani so?
52.2: Wo tɛkrɛma bɔ ɔsɛe ho pɔw;ɛte sɛ oyiwan a ano yɛ nam yiye.Wo a wutwa nkontompo nko ara.
52.3: Wʼani gye bɔne ho sen papa,wopɛ atoro sen sɛ wobɛka nokware.
52.4: Wodɔ asɛm biara a ɛde ɔhaw ba,wo tɛkrɛma daadaafo!
52.5: Ampa ara Onyankopɔn de ɔsɛe a enni awiei bɛbrɛ wo;ɔbɛtwe wo afi wo ntamadan mu na watetew wo mu;Ɔbɛtɔre wʼase wɔ ateasefo asase so.
52.6: Atreneefo behu eyi na wɔasuro;wɔbɛserew no na wɔaka se,
52.7: “Hwɛ, onipa no ni,nea wamfa Onyankopɔn anyɛ nʼabandennenna mmom ɔde ne ho too nʼahonya dodow so,na onyaa ahoɔden de sɛee afoforo no!”
52.8: Nanso mete sɛ ngodua aɛrenyin wɔ Onyankopɔn fi:mede me ho to Onyankopɔn dɔ a ɛnsa da no sodaa nyinaa.
52.9: Meyi wo ayɛ daa wɔ nea woayɛ nti;wo din so na mʼani bɛda, efisɛ eye.Meyi wo ayɛ wɔ wʼahotefo anim.

53.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Ɔkwasea ka wɔ ne koma mu se,“Onyankopɔn bi nni hɔ.”Porɔwee adi wɔn, na wɔn akwan yɛ animguase.Obiara nni hɔ a ɔyɛ ade pa.
53.2: Onyankopɔn fi ɔsoro hwɛ adesamma wɔ famsɛ obehu wɔn mu bi awɔwɔ ntease,anaa ebinom a wɔhwehwɛ Onyankopɔn.
53.3: Nanso nnipa nyinaa atwe wɔn ho afi Onyankopɔn ho;wɔn nyinaa ayɛ bɔne.Obiara nni hɔ a ɔyɛ papa.Ɔbaako mpo nni hɔ.
53.4: Enti abɔnefo rensua nyansa ana?Wɔwe me nkurɔfo sɛnea nnipa di aduan.Wonnsu mfrɛ Onyankopɔn.
53.5: Wɔn na wɔwɔ hɔ a wɔabɔ huboawɔ faako a ehu nni.Onyankopɔn hwetee wɔn a wɔtow hyɛɛ wo so no nnompe mu;wuguu wɔn anim ase, efisɛ Onyankopɔn buu wɔn animtiaa.
53.6: Ao, Israel nkwagye mfi Sion mmra!Awurade bɛsan de ne nkurɔfo agyapade ama wɔn.Na Yakob adi ahurusi, na Israel ani agye!

54.1: Dwom Dawid “maskil” dwom. Ɔtoo no bere a Sififo kɔka kyerɛɛ Saulo se, “Dawid abehintaw wɔ yɛn mu.”Ao, Onyankopɔn, gye me wɔ wo din mu;fa wo tumi bu me bem.
54.2: Ao, Onyankopɔn, tie me mpaebɔ;tie mʼanom nsɛm.
54.3: Ahɔho retow ahyɛ me so.Atirimɔdenfo rehwehwɛ me akum me;nnipa a wɔmmfa Onyankopɔn nyɛ hwee.
54.4: Ampa ara, Onyankopɔn ne me boafo;Awurade ne me hwɛfo.
54.5: Ma mmusu nkyim mmra wɔn a wodi me ho nseku no so;wo nokwaredi mu, sɛe wɔn.
54.6: Mefi me pɛ mu abɔ afɔre ama wo;Awurade, meyi wo din ayɛ,efisɛ eye.
54.7: Woagye me afi me haw nyinaa mu,na mʼani ahu nkonimdi wɔ mʼatamfo so.

55.1: Dwom Dawid “maskil” dwom.Ao Onyankopɔn, tie me mpaebɔ,mmu wʼani ngu me nkotosrɛ so,
55.2: tie me na gye me so.Me dadwen haw me na ama mayɛ basaa,
55.3: esiane nea me tamfo reka,esiane omumɔyɛfo ahunahuna nti;efisɛ wɔde amanehunu ba me so;na wofi wɔn abufuw mu kum me.
55.4: Me koma wɔ ahoyeraw mu;na owu huboa aba me so.
55.5: Ehu ne ahopopo akyekyere me.Ahodwiriw abu afa me so.
55.6: Mekae se, “Ao, sɛ mewɔ ntaban sɛ aburuburu a,anka metu akɔ ama me ho atɔ me,
55.7: anka metu akɔ akyirikyiriakɔtena sare so;
55.8: anka mɛyɛ ntɛm akɔ me hintabea,faako a mframahweam ne ahum mmɛn koraa.”
55.9: Awurade, ma amumɔyɛfo nyɛ basaa, na ma wɔn kasa ntoto,efisɛ mihu basabasayɛ ne aperepere wɔ kuropɔn no mu.
55.10: Awia ne anadwo wɔtetɛw nʼafasu ho;adwemmɔne ne asisi wɔ mu.
55.11: Adesɛefo dɔm reyɛ adwuma wɔ kuropɔn no mu.Ahunahuna ne nnaadaa wɔ ne mmɔnten so daa.
55.12: Sɛ ɛyɛɛ ɔtamfo na ɔresopa me a,anka metumi agyina ano;sɛ ɛyɛɛ ɔtamfo na ɔrema ne ho so atia me a,anka metumi de me ho ahintaw no.
55.13: Nanso ɛyɛ wo, ɔdesani te sɛ me,me yɔnko, mʼadamfo kann,
55.14: a kan no na me ne no wɔ ayɔnkofa a mu yɛ denbere a yɛn nyinaa bɔɔ mu yuu kɔɔ Onyankopɔn fi na yɛka asomfo no ho no.
55.15: Ma owu mmɛfa mʼatamfo mpofirim;ma wɔnkɔ ɔda mu anikann,efisɛ bɔne te wɔn mu.
55.16: Nanso misu frɛ Onyankopɔn,na Awurade gye me nkwa.
55.17: Anwummere, anɔpa ne awia,mede mmɔborɔnne su frɛ no,na ɔte me nne.
55.18: Ɔde ne ho bɔ afɔre ma minya me ti didi muwɔ ako a wodi tia me no mu,mpo dodow na wɔsɔre tia me.
55.19: Onyankopɔn a wɔasi no hene afebɔɔ no,ɔbɛte wɔn nka na wahaw wɔn,ɔbɛhaw nnipa a wɔnsakra wɔn akwan dana wonsuro Onyankopɔn nso.
55.20: Me yɔnko tow hyɛ ne nnamfonom so;na obu nʼapam so.
55.21: Ɔwɔ tɛkrɛmawo,nanso ɔtan wɔ ne koma mu.Nʼano asɛm dwudwo sen ngo,nanso ɛyɛ afoa a wɔatwe.
55.22: Fa wo haw to Awurade sona ɔno na obegye wo;ɔremma ɔtreneeni nhwe ase.
55.23: Nanso wo, Onyankopɔn, wobɛbrɛ amumɔyɛfo aseama wɔakɔ ɔporɔw amoa mu;mogyapɛfo ne nnaadaaforenni wɔn nkwanna mu fa.Nanso me de, mede me ho to wo so.

56.1: Dwom Dawid dwom a ɔtoo bere a Filistifo kyeree no wɔ Gat no.Onyankopɔn, hu me mmɔbɔ na nnipa taa me anibere so;da mu nyinaa womia wɔn taa no mu.
56.2: Wɔn a wɔbɔ me ahohora taa me da mu nyinaa;wɔn a wɔma wɔn ho so tia me no dɔɔso.
56.3: Sɛ mebɔ hu a,mede me ho bɛto wo so.
56.4: Onyankopɔn a mekamfo nʼasɛm no,mede me ho to Onyankopɔn so, na merensuro.Dɛn na onipa desani betumi ayɛ me?
56.5: Da mu nyinaa wogye mʼano si bɔne;bere biara wɔbɔ pɔw sɛ wɔbɛsɛe me.
56.6: Wɔbɔ pɔw, wɔtetɛw,wɔhwɛ mʼanammɔntu,susuw sɛ wobekum me.
56.7: Wɔn amumɔyɛ nti mma wɔmmfa wɔn ho nni;Onyankopɔn, brɛ amanaman no ase wɔ wʼabufuw mu.
56.8: Kyerɛw me kwadwom to hɔ;sese me nusu wɔ wo nhoma mmobɔwee no mu.Enni nea woakyerɛw ato hɔ no mu ana?
56.9: Sɛ mepɛ mmoa fi wo hɔ a,mʼatamfo bɛsan wɔn akyi.Eyi bɛma mahu sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ mʼafa.
56.10: Onyankopɔn a mekamfo nʼasɛm no,Awurade a mekamfo nʼasɛm no,
56.11: mede me ho to Onyankopɔn so; na merensuro.Dɛn na ɔdesani betumi ayɛ me?
56.12: Me Onyankopɔn, mehyɛ bɔ a mahyɛ wo no ase,mede mʼaseda afɔre bɛbrɛ wo.
56.13: Efisɛ, woagye me afi owu mu,na mʼanan anhintiw,na matumi anantew Onyankopɔn animwɔ nkwa hann no mu.

57.1: Dwom Dawid dwom a ɔtoo bere a oguan fii Saulo nkyɛn kɔɔ ɔbodan no mu.Hu me mmɔbɔ, me Onyankopɔn, hu me mmɔbɔ,na wo mu na me kra nya guankɔbea.Wo ntaban nwini ase na mɛpɛ guankɔbeakosi sɛ amanehunu no betwa mu.
57.2: Misu frɛ Onyankopɔn, Ɔsorosoroni no;Onyankopɔn a ɔma ne pɛ ba mu wɔ me ho.
57.3: Ɔsoma fi ɔsoro hɔ begye me nkwa,ɔka wɔn a wɔtaa me anibere so no anim;Onyankopɔn soma ne dɔ ne ne nokware.
57.4: Gyata atwa me ho ahyia;meda mmoa a wɔwe nam amono mu,nnipa a wɔn se te sɛ mpeaw ne mmɛmmana wɔn tɛkrɛma te sɛ afoa a ɛyɛ nnam.
57.5: Onyankopɔn, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔma wo so tra ɔsoro,na ama wʼanuonyam aba asase nyinaa so.
57.6: Wɔtrɛw asau mu de sum mʼanan afiri,ahohiahia brɛɛ me ase.Wotuu amoa wɔ me kwan mu,nanso wɔn ankasa akɔtotɔ mu.
57.7: Ao, Onyankopɔn, me koma agyina pintinn,me koma yɛ pintinn;mɛto dwom na mayi wo ayɛ.
57.8: Me kra nyan!Sanku ne bɛnta, munnyan!Me nso menyan anɔpahema.
57.9: Awurade, mɛkamfo wo wɔ aman no mu;mɛto wo ho nnwom wɔ nnipa mu.
57.10: Wʼadɔe so, ɛkorɔn sen ɔsoro;wo nokwaredi du wim.
57.11: Ao, Onyankopɔn, wɔmma wo so mmoro ɔsoro;ma wʼanuonyam nkata asase nyinaa so.

58.1: Dwom Dawid “miktam” dwom.So mo asodifo, ampa ara sɛ, moka asɛm a ɛteɛ ana?Mubu atɛntrenee wɔ nnipa mu ana?
58.2: Dabi da! Modwene ntɛnkyew wɔ mo koma muna mo nsa de akakabensɛm ba asase so.
58.3: Amumɔyɛfo fom kwan fi awo mu;wɔyɛ mmaratofo fi awotwaa mu na wodi atoro.
58.4: Wɔn ano bɔre te sɛ ɔwɔ de,ɛte sɛ ɔprammiri a wawɛn nʼaso,
58.5: a ɔnte ntafowayifo dwom,na ne dwom dɛdɛ no mpo mfa ne ho.
58.6: Ao Onyankopɔn, bubu ɛse a egu wɔn anom,Awurade, tutu gyata no sebɔmmɔfo no gu!
58.7: Ma wontwa mu nkɔ sɛ sunsuan;sɛ wɔtwe wɔn agyan a, ma wɔn bɛmma no ano nwu.
58.8: Ma wɔnyɛ sɛ nwaw horɔdɔhorɔdɔ bi a ɔrenan agu wɔ bere a ɔretene no.Ma wɔnyɛ sɛ ɔba a owu wɔ awoe a onhu owia koraa.
58.9: Ansa na mo nkuku bɛte nsɔe ano yaw,sɛ ɛyɛ amono anaa awo no, wɔbɛpra amumɔyɛfo akɔ.
58.10: Sɛ wɔtɔ were ma atreneefo a wɔn ani begye,na wɔbɛhohoro wɔn anan ho wɔ amumɔyɛfo mogya mu.
58.11: Afei nnipa bɛka se, “Ampa ara atreneefo kɔ so nya wɔn akatua;na ampa ara Onyankopɔn bi wɔ hɔ a obu wiase atɛn.”

59.1: Dwom Wɔto no sɛnea wɔto “Nsɛe No” sanku nne so. Dawid “miktam” dwom. Ɔtoo no bere a Saulo soma kɔwɛn Dawid fi sɛ wonkokum no no.Ao, Onyankopɔn, gye me fi mʼatamfo nsam;bɔ me ho ban fi wɔn a wɔtaa me no ho.
59.2: Gye me fi amumɔyɛfo nsam.Gye me nkwa fi mogyapɛfo nsam.
59.3: Hwɛ sɛnea wɔatɛw rehwehwɛ me akum me!Nnipa a wɔn ho yɛ hu bɔ pɔw bɔne tia mea emfi me mfomso anaa bɔne bi, Awurade.
59.4: Menyɛɛ mfomso bi, nanso wɔayɛ krado sɛ wɔbɛtow ahyɛ me so.Sɔre begye me; hwɛ mʼamanehunu!
59.5: Wo, Awurade Nyankopɔn, Israel Nyankopɔn,ma wo ho so na twe amanaman no nyinaa aso;nhu amumɔyɛfo nkontompofo no mmɔbɔ.
59.6: Wɔsan ba anwummere,wɔbobɔ mu sɛ akraman,na wokyinkyin kuropɔn no mu.
59.7: Hwɛ nea wɔfe fi wɔn anom,wɔn anofafa mu nsɛm ano yɛ nnam sɛ mfoa,na wosusuw se: “Hena na ɔbɛte yɛn nka?”
59.8: Nanso wo Awurade, woserew wɔn;wudi saa aman no nyinaa ho fɛw.
59.9: Wone mʼAhoɔden, mehwɛ wo kwan;wo, Onyankopɔn, ne mʼabandennen,
59.10: me Nyankopɔn a metumi atweri no.Onyankopɔn bedi mʼanimna ɔbɛma mahwɛ wɔn a wɔbɔ me ahohora no haw.
59.11: Nanso nkum wɔn, Awurade, yɛn nkatabo,na me nkurɔfo werɛ amfi wɔn.Wo tumi mu no tutu wɔn ase,na brɛ wɔn ase.
59.12: Bɔne a efi wɔn anom,ne wɔn ano nsɛm ntima wɔn ahomaso nkyekyere wɔn.Abususɛm a wɔka ne atoro a wotwa nti,
59.13: sɛe wɔn wɔ abufuwhyew mu,kosi sɛ wɔn ase bɛtɔre.Afei ɛbɛma asase so mmaa nyinaa ahusɛ Onyankopɔn di Yakob so.
59.14: Wɔsan ba anwummere,wɔbobɔ mu sɛ akraman,na wokyinkyin kuropɔn no mu.
59.15: Wokyinkyin pɛ aduanna sɛ wɔammee a, wosu bobɔ mu.
59.16: Nanso mɛto wʼahoɔden ho dwom,mɛto wʼadɔe ho dwom anɔpa;efisɛ woyɛ mʼabandennen,me guankɔbea wɔ ahohia mmere mu.
59.17: Ao mʼAhoɔden, mɛto ayeyi dwom ama wo;wo, Onyankopɔn, ne mʼabandennen, me Nyankopɔn a ɔyɛ ɔdɔ.

60.1: Dwom Dawid “Miktam” dwom. Wɔde yɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ. Ɔtoo no bere a ɔne Aram Naharanfo ne Aram Zobafo koe na Yoab san kokum Edomfo mpem dumien wɔ Nkyene Bon mu no.Onyankopɔn, woapo yɛn, woabɔ yɛn agu;wo bo afuw yɛn, nanso gye yɛn bio!
60.2: Woawosow asase no na woapae mu;toatoa nea abubu no, efisɛ ɛrehinhim.
60.3: Woama wo nkurɔfo ahu mmere bɔne;woama yɛn nsa a ɛma yɛtɔ ntintan.
60.4: Nanso wɔn a wosuro wo de, woama wɔn frankaa sosɛ wontu ntia agyan no.
60.5: Gye yɛn nkwa na fa wo nsa nifa boa yɛn,na ama wɔn a wodɔ wɔn no anya nkwa.
60.6: Onyankopɔn akasa afi ne kronkronbea se,“Nkonim mu, mɛkyɛ Sekem mu,na masusuw Sukot bon no.
60.7: Gilead yɛ me de; Manase nso saa ara;Efraim yɛ me dade kyɛw,Yuda yɛ mʼahempema.
60.8: Moab yɛ me guasɛn,Edom so na metow me mpaboa gu;na meteɛ mu nkonimdi so gu Filistifo so.”
60.9: Hena na ɔde me bɛkɔ kuropɔn a wɔabɔ ho ban no mu?Hena na obedi mʼanim akɔ Edom?
60.10: Onyankopɔn, ɛnyɛ wo na woapo yɛnna wo ne yɛn asraafo nkɔ ɔsa bio ana?
60.11: Boa yɛn tia ɔtamfo no,na ɔdesani mmoa nka hwee.
60.12: Onyankopɔn wɔ yɛn afa yi, yebedi nkonim,na obetiatia yɛn atamfo so.

61.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Ao, Onyankopɔn, tie me sufrɛ;tie me mpaebɔ.
61.2: Mifi asase ano frɛ wo,mefrɛ wo, efisɛ me koma atɔ beraw;fa me kɔ ɔbotan a ɛware sen me no so.
61.3: Woayɛ me guankɔbea,aban a ɛyɛ den ma ɔtamfo no.
61.4: Me kɔn dɔ sɛ metena wo ntamadan no mu afebɔɔna manya guankɔbea wɔ wo ntaban nwini ase.
61.5: Woate me bɔ a mehyɛe no, Onyankopɔn;na wode wɔn a wosuro wo din no agyapade ama me.
61.6: To ɔhene nkwanna mu bebree;na ne mfe mfi awo ntoatoaso nkodu awo ntoatoaso.
61.7: Ma onni hene wɔ Onyankopɔn anim daafa wʼadɔe ne wo nokware bɔ ne ho ban.
61.8: Afei mɛto ayeyi dwom ama wo din daana madi me bɔhyɛ so daa nyinaa.

62.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Me kra wɔ ahomegye wɔ Onyankopɔn nko ara mu;me nkwagye fi ne nkyɛn.
62.2: Ampa, ɔyɛ me botan ne me nkwagye;ɔyɛ mʼabandennen, hwee renhinhim me da.
62.3: Mobɛkɔ so ahyɛ onipa so akosi da bɛn,mo nyinaa besum me ahwe fam ana?Ɔfasu a akyea yi, ban a ɛrebu yi?
62.4: Ampa, wɔayɛ adwene se wobetu noafi ne dibea a ɛkorɔn no so;wɔn ani gye atorodi ho.Wɔde wɔn ano hyirana wɔn koma mu de, wɔdome.
62.5: Yiw me kra, gye wʼahome wɔ Onyankopɔn nko ara mu;na ne mu na mʼanidaso wɔ.
62.6: Ampa, ɔyɛ me botan ne me nkwagye;ɔyɛ mʼabandennen, hwee renhinhim me.
62.7: Me nkwagye ne mʼanuonyam gyina Onyankopɔn so;ɔyɛ me botan a ɛkorɔn, ne me guankɔbea.
62.8: Mo nnipa, momfa mo ho nto ne so daa;monka mo koma mu nsɛm nyinaa nkyerɛ no,efisɛ Onyankopɔn ne yɛn guankɔbea.
62.9: Nnipa nyinaa te sɛ home;akɛse ne nkumaa nyinaa nka hwee;sɛ wɔkari wɔn wɔ nsania so a, wɔnka hwee;wɔn nyinaa bɔ mu a wɔyɛ home nko.
62.10: Mommfa mo ho nto asisi sona monnhoahoa mo ho akorɔnne ho;ɛwɔ mu sɛ mo ahonya dɔɔso de,nanso mommfa mo koma nto so.
62.11: Asɛm baako na Onyankopɔn aka,nsɛm abien na mate sɛ,wo, Onyankopɔn, na wowɔ ahoɔden,
62.12: na wo, Awurade, na woyɛ adɔe,ampa ara wubetua obiara kasɛnea nʼadwuma te.

63.1: Dwom Dawid dwom. Bere a ɔwɔ Yuda Sare so no na ɔtoe.Wo, Onyankopɔn, ne me NyankopɔnMehwehwɛ wo anibere so;wo ho sukɔm de me kra,me nipadua ani agyina wo,wɔ asase a awo na asade nni mu so,faako a nsu nni.
63.2: Mahu wo wɔ Kronkronbea hɔmahu wo tumi ne wʼanuonyam.
63.3: Esiane sɛ wʼadɔe di mu sen nkwa ntimʼanofafa bɛhyɛ wo anuonyam.
63.4: Sɛ mete ase yi, mɛkamfo wo,na wo din mu na mɛma me nsa so.
63.5: Me kra bɛmee sɛnea wadi aduan papa bi;mede anofafa a ɛto dwom beyi wo ayɛ.
63.6: Meda me mpa so a, mekae wo.Anadwo dasu mu nyinaa, midwen wo ho.
63.7: Efisɛ wone me boafo,wo ntaban ase nwini mu na mɛto dwom.
63.8: Me kra bata wo ho;na wo nsa nifa kura me mu.
63.9: Wɔn a wɔpɛ me akum me no bɛsɛe;wɔbɛkɔ asase ase tɔnn.
63.10: Wɔbɛdan wɔn ama afoana wɔbɛyɛ aduan ama sakraman.
63.11: Nanso ɔhene bedi ahurusi wɔ Onyankopɔn mu;wɔn a wɔka ntam wɔ Onyankopɔn din mu nyinaa bɛkamfo no,na wobemua atorofo ano.

64.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Me Nyankopɔn, tie me, bere a mereka me haw;bɔ me kra ho ban fi ɔtamfo ahunahuna ho.
64.2: Fa me sie fi amumɔyɛfo agyinatu ho,ne nnebɔneyɛfo pɔwbɔ ho.
64.3: Wɔsew wɔn tɛkrɛma sɛ afoana wɔde atirimɔden nsɛm sɔn sɛ mmɛmma werɛmfo.
64.4: Wofi ahintawee mu, tow bɔ onipa a ne ho nni asɛm;wɔtow bɔ no mpofirim a wonsuro.
64.5: Wɔhyehyɛ wɔn ho wɔn ho nkuran wɔ wɔn amumɔyɛ nhyehyɛe ho,wɔka sɛnea wobesum wɔn mfiri asie;wɔka se, “Hena na obehu yɛn?”
64.6: Wɔbɔ ntɛnkyew ho pɔw na wɔka se,“Yɛayɛ nhyehyɛe a ɛso nni koraa!”Ampa ara onipa koma ne nʼadwene yɛ anifere.
64.7: Nanso Onyankopɔn bɛto bɛmma abɔ wɔn;na wɔbɛhwe fam prɛko pɛ.
64.8: Ɔbɛdan wɔn ankasa tɛkrɛma atia wɔnna ɔde wɔn aba ɔsɛe mu;na wɔn a wobehu wɔn nyinaa de animka bɛbɔ wɔn ti nko.
64.9: Adesamma nyinaa besuro;wɔbɛpae mu aka Onyankopɔn nnwumana wɔasusuw nea wayɛ ho.
