64.10: Ma atreneefo nni ahurusi wɔ Awurade muna wɔmpɛ guankɔbea wɔ no mu;ma wɔn a wɔn koma mu tew nyinaa nyi no ayɛ!

65.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Yɛn Nyankopɔn, ayeyi retwɛn wo wɔ Sion,na yebedi yɛn bɔ a yɛahyɛ wo no so.
65.2: Wo a woyɛ mpaebɔ tiefo,wo nkyɛn na nnipa nyinaa bɛba.
65.3: Bere a yɛn bɔne menee yɛn no,wo na wode yɛn mmarato kyɛɛ yɛn.
65.4: Nhyira nka wɔn a wuyi wɔnma wɔbɛn wo sɛ wɔntena wʼadiwo hɔ!Nneɛma pa a ɛwɔ wo fi ahyɛ yɛn ma,nea ɛwɔ wʼasɔredan kronkron mu no.
65.5: Wode trenee nnwuma a ɛyɛ nwonwa ma yɛn mmuae,Onyankopɔn, yɛn agyenkwa,asase so mmaa nyinaa anidasone po so akyirikyiri nso.
65.6: Wonam wo tumi so yɛɛ mmepɔwde daa wʼahoɔden adi.
65.7: Wudwudwoo po asorɔkye ano,asorɔkye no mmobɔwee,ne amanaman no hooyɛ.
65.8: Wɔn a wɔte akyirikyiri no suro wʼanwonwade;faako a ade kye, nea anwummere yera,wofrɛ ahurusi nnwom wɔ hɔ.
65.9: Wohwɛ asase no gugu so nsu;woma no yɛ asase pa ma ɛboro so.Wode nsu hyɛ Onyankopɔn nsuwansuwa masɛnea ɛbɛma nnipa no aduan,efisɛ saa ne nea woahyɛ.
65.10: Wofɔw nea woafuntum hɔ no fɔkyeena wokaa nkɔmoa no kataa so;wode nsu petee so ma no yɛɛ bɛtɛɛna wuhyiraa so afifide.
65.11: Wode nnɔbae bebree wiee afe no,na wo nteaseɛnam yɛɛ ma buu so.
65.12: Sare so nwura dɔɔsona anigye baa nkoko so.
65.13: Nguankuw ahyɛ adidibea hɔ mana awi akata aku no so;wɔbɔ ose, to ahosɛpɛw dwom.

66.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Asase nyinaa momfa ahosɛpɛw nteɛ mu mma Onyankopɔn!
66.2: Monto ne din anuonyamhyɛ ho dwom;momma nʼayeyi nyɛ anuonyamhyɛ!
66.3: Munse Onyankopɔn sɛ, “Wo nneyɛe yɛ nwonwa dodo!Wo tumi so mmorosoa wʼatamfo nyinaa de osuro kotow wʼanim.
66.4: Asase nyinaa kotow wo;wɔto ayeyi dwom ma wo,wɔto dwom kamfo wo din.”
66.5: Mommra mmɛhwɛ nea Onyankopɔn ayɛ;anwonwade a wayɛ wɔ nnipa mu.
66.6: Ɔmaa po yɛɛ asase kesee;wɔnantew twaa nsu nomommra mma yenni ahurusi wɔ no mu.
66.7: Ɔde ne tumi di hene daa daa,na ɔde nʼani nso hwɛ aman so.Mma atuatewfo nsɔre ntia no.
66.8: Aman nyinaa, munhyira yɛn Nyankopɔn,momma wɔnte mo nkamfo no nnyigyei;
66.9: wahwɛ yɛn nkwa sona wamma yɛn anan anwatiri.
66.10: Na wo, Onyankopɔn, wosɔɔ yɛn hwɛe;na wonan yɛn sɛ dwetɛ.
66.11: Wode yɛn koguu afiasena wode nneɛma a ɛyɛ duru too yɛn akyi.
66.12: Womaa yɛn atamfo twiw faa yɛn so;yɛfaa ogya ne nsu mu,nanso wode yɛn baa faako a nnepa abu so.
66.13: Mede ɔhyew afɔre bɛba wʼasɔredan muna madi bɔ a mahyɛ wo no so,
66.14: bɔ a mʼanofafa hyɛe, na mʼano kaabere a na mewɔ ɔhaw mu no.
66.15: Mede mmoa a wɔadɔ srade bɛbɔ afɔre ama wo;adwennini ayɛyɛde;mede anantwinini ne mpapo bɛbɔ afɔre.
66.16: Mommra mmetie, mo a musuro Onyankopɔn nyinaa;momma menka nea wayɛ ama me nkyerɛ mo.
66.17: Mede mʼano su frɛɛ no;na me tɛkrɛma yii no ayɛ.
66.18: Sɛ mede bɔne hyɛɛ me koma mu a,anka Awurade antie me.
66.19: Nanso nokware, Onyankopɔn atie me,wate me mpaebɔ.
66.20: Nhyira nka Onyankopɔn,a wampo me mpaebɔna wanyi nʼadɔe amfi me so.

67.1: Dwom Dwom.Onyankopɔn nnom yɛn na onhyira yɛnɔmma nʼanim nhyerɛn wɔ yɛn so,
67.2: na ɔmma wonhu nʼakwan wɔ asase so,ne ne nkwagye wɔ amanaman no nyinaa mu.
67.3: Ma adesamma nyi wo ayɛ, Onyankopɔn;ma nnipa nyinaa nkamfo wo.
67.4: Ma amanaman ani nnye na wɔnto ahosɛpɛw dwom,efisɛ wudi nnipa no so trenee muna woma asase so amanaman no akwankyerɛ.
67.5: Ma adesamma nyi wo ayɛ, Onyankopɔn;ma nnipa nyinaa nkamfo wo!
67.6: Afei asase no bɛbɔ ne nnɔbae,na Onyankopɔn, yɛn Nyankopɔn ahyira yɛn.
67.7: Onyankopɔn behyira yɛn,na asase mmaa nyinaa besuro no.

68.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Ma Onyankopɔn nsɔre, ma nʼatamfo nhwete;wɔn a wɔtan no no nguan mfi nʼanim.
68.2: Sɛnea mframa bɔ wusiw gu no,saa ara na bɔ wɔn gu;sɛnea srade nan wɔ ogya so no,saa ara na amumɔyɛfo nyera mfi Onyankopɔn anim.
68.3: Nanso ma atreneefo ani nnyena wɔnsɛpɛw wɔn ho wɔ Onyankopɔn anim;ma wɔn ho ntɔ wɔn na wonni ahurusi.
68.4: To dwom ma Onyankopɔn, to dwom yi ne din ayɛ.Ma nea ɔnantew omununkum so no din so.Ne din ne Awurade;ma wʼani nnye wɔ nʼanim.
68.5: Ayisaa agya ne nea odi akunafo asɛm ma wɔnne Onyankopɔn a ɔte nʼatenae kronkron hɔ.
68.6: Ɔma ohiani tena mmusua mu,na ɔde nnwonto yi nneduafo ma wɔde wɔn ho;na atuatewfo de, wɔtena asase a awo so.
68.7: Onyankopɔn, bere a wudii wo nkurɔfo anim,bere a wode wɔn faa sare so no,
68.8: asase wosowee,na ɔsoro tuee osu guu fam,wɔ Onyankopɔn, Sinai Nyankopɔn,Onyankopɔn, Israel Nyankopɔn no anim.
68.9: Womaa osu tɔɔ bebree, Ao, Onyankopɔn,guu wʼagyapade a abotow no so ma ɛyɛɛ frɔmfrɔm.
68.10: Wo nkurɔfo bɔɔ atenase wɔ so,Onyankopɔn, wonam wʼadɔe bebree no so hwɛɛ ahiafo.
68.11: Awurade kaa asɛm no,na dodow no ara ne wɔn a wɔpaee mu kae;
68.12: “Ahemfo ne wɔn asraafo guan ntɛm so;mmea a wɔwɔ fie no kyɛ asade.
68.13: Mpo bere a woda nguanban mu no,wɔde dwetɛ duraa mʼaborɔnoma ntaban ho,de sikakɔkɔɔ a ɛhyerɛn guu wɔn ntakra so.”
68.14: Bere a Otumfo bɔɔ ahene a wɔwɔ asase no so hwetee no,na ɛte sɛ sukyerɛmma a agu Bepɔw Salmon so.
68.15: Basan mmepɔw gyinagyina hɔ,Basan mmepɔw so yɛ abonkyiabonkyi.
68.16: Wo bepɔw abonkyiabonkyi, adɛn nti na wode ani bɔne hwɛbepɔw a Onyankopɔn ayi sɛ obedi so hene,faako a Awurade ankasa bɛtena afebɔɔ?
68.17: Onyankopɔn nteaseɛnam yɛ mpem mpemne mpem mpem mu mpem;Awurade fi Sinai aba ne kronkronbea.
68.18: Bere a woforo kɔɔ soro no,wode nnommum kaa wo ho;wunyaa ayɛyɛde fii nnipa hɔ,fii atuatewfo hɔ mpo,sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a wobɛtena hɔ, Awurade Nyankopɔn.
68.19: Ayeyi nka Awurade, nka Onyankopɔn yɛn Agyenkwa,nea ɔsoa yɛn nnesoa da biara no.
68.20: Yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ Onyankopɔn a ogye nkwa;na Awurade mu na owu tow fom yɛn.
68.21: Ampa ara Onyankopɔn bɛdwerɛw nʼatamfo ti,wɔn a wɔkɔ so yɛ bɔne ti kusuu no.
68.22: Awurade ka se, “Mede wɔn befi Basan aba;mede wɔn befi po bun mu aba,
68.23: na moanantew wɔn a wokyi mo no mogya muna mo akraman tɛkrɛma anya wɔn kyɛfa.”
68.24: Onyankopɔn, yɛahu wo santen yuu no,me Nyankopɔn ne me Hene santen yuu no a ɔde reba ne kronkronbea hɔ.
68.25: Nnwontofo no wɔ anim, na asankubɔfo no nso di so,na mmabaa a wɔrewosow akasae nso ka wɔn ho.
68.26: Monkamfo Onyankopɔn wɔ asafo kɛse no mu;monkamfo Awurade wɔ Israel nnipakuw no mu.
68.27: Abusuakuw ketewa, Benyamin na odi wɔn kan,Yuda mmapɔmma kuw kɛse no di so,na Sebulon ne Naftali mmapɔmma aba.
68.28: Kyerɛ wo tumi, Onyankopɔn;da wʼahoɔden adi kyerɛ yɛn, sɛnea woayɛ pɛn no.
68.29: Wʼasɔredan a ɛwɔ Yerusalem ntiahemfo de ayɛyɛde bɛbrɛ wo.
68.30: Ka aboa a ɔhyɛ mfea mu no anim,ne anantwinini kuw a wɔhyɛ amanaman no nantwimma mu no.Brɛ wɔn ase kosi sɛ wɔde dwetɛ mpɔw bɛba.Bɔ wɔn a wɔn ani gye ɔko ho no pansam.
68.31: Ananmusifo befi Misraim aba,na Kus de ne ho bɛma Onyankopɔn.
68.32: Wiase ahemman, monto dwom mma Onyankopɔn,monto ayeyi nnwom mma Awurade,
68.33: monto mma nea ɔte tete ɔsorosoro so no,na ɔde nne kɛse bobɔ mu no.
68.34: Mompae mu nka Onyankopɔn tumi,nea ne kɛseyɛ kata Israel so no,na ne tumi wɔ soro ɔsoro no.
68.35: Wo ho yɛ hu, Onyankopɔn, wɔ wo kronkronbea hɔ;Israel Nyankopɔn de tumi ne ahoɔden ma ne nkurɔfo.Ayeyi nka Onyankopɔn!

69.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Ao, Onyankopɔn, gye me nkwana nsu no abɛdeda me kɔn mu.
69.2: Meremem wɔ dontori a mu dɔ mu,wɔ baabi a mʼanan nnya sibea.Madu bun muna nsu abu afa me so.
69.3: Mafrɛ abrɛ rehwehwɛ mmoa.Me mene mu ayow.Mʼani so ayɛ kusuu,na merehwehwɛ me Nyankopɔn.
69.4: Wɔn a wɔtan me kwa nodɔɔso sen me ti so nwi;wɔn a wɔtan me kwa no dɔɔso,wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ sɛ wɔbɛsɛe me no.Wɔhyɛ me sɛ mennannea minnwiae no mma.
69.5: Wo, Onyankopɔn, nim me nkwaseasɛm;mʼafɔdi nhintaw wo.
69.6: Awurade, Awurade Tweduampɔn,mma wɔn a wɔn ani da wo so no,anim ngu ase esiane me nti, Awurade, Asafo Awurade;Israel Nyankopɔn,mma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ wo noanim ngu ase esiane me nti.
69.7: Wo nti migyina animka ano,na aniwu kata mʼanim.
69.8: Mete sɛ ɔhɔho wɔ me nuanom mu,mete sɛ ɔmamfrani wɔ me na mmabarima mu,
69.9: na wo fi ho mmɔdemmɔ hyɛ me so,wɔn a wɔbɔ wo ahohora no animtiaabu bɛda me so.
69.10: Sɛ mitwa adwo na midi mmuada awɔbɔ me ahohora;
69.11: sɛ mifura atweaatam annipa de me yɛ aserewde.
69.12: Wɔn a wɔtete ɔpon no ano no serew me,na akɔwensafo de me din to dwom.
69.13: Nanso mɛbɔ wo mpae, Awurade,wɔ wʼadom bere mu;wɔ wʼadɔe kɛse no nti, Ao, Onyankopɔn,fa wo nokware nkwagye no gye me so.
69.14: Yi me fi dontori no mu,mma memmem wɔ mu;gye me fi wɔn a wɔtan me no nsam,ne nsu bun mu.
69.15: Mma nsu nnyiri mmfa meanaa bun mmene meanaa amoa nkata me so.
69.16: Awurade, gye me so fi wʼadɔe a eye no mu;wʼadom nti, dan bɛhwɛ me.
69.17: Mfa wʼanim nhintaw wo somfo;gye me so ntɛm, na mewɔ ɔhaw mu.
69.18: Twiw bɛn me na gye me;gye me nkwa, mʼatamfo nti.
69.19: Wunim sɛnea wɔkasa tia me, gu mʼanim ase na wotiatia mʼanim;wʼani tua mʼatamfo nyinaa.
69.20: Kasatia ahyɛ me koma soama mayɛ sɛ obi a onni ɔboafo;mepɛɛ awerɛkyekye, nanso mannya bi,mepɛɛ ɔwerɛkyekyefo, nanso manhu bi.
69.21: Wɔde bɔnwoma guu mʼaduan mu,osukɔm dee me no, wɔmaa me nsa nwenweenwen.
69.22: Ma wɔn didipon a esi wɔn anim nyi wɔn sɛ afiri;ma ɛnyɛ akatua ne afide mma wɔn.
69.23: Ma wɔn ani so nyɛ wɔn kusuu na wɔanhu ade,na ma wɔn akyi nkuntun afebɔɔ.
69.24: Hwie wʼabufuwhyew gu wɔn so;na ma wʼabufuw huhuhuhu no mmra wɔn so.
69.25: Ma wɔn fi nyɛ amamfo;mma obiara ntena wɔn ntamadan mu.
69.26: Wɔtaa wɔn a wupira wɔn no,wɔka wɔn a wupira wɔn no yawdi ho asɛm.
69.27: Fa amumɔyɛ mu amumɔyɛ ho sobo bɔ wɔn;mma wonnya wo nkwagye mu kyɛfa.
69.28: Pepa wɔn din fi nkwa nhoma no mu,mfa wɔn din nka atreneefo de ho.
69.29: Mewɔ ɔyaw ne ahohiahia mu;Onyankopɔn, ma wo nkwagye no mmɔ me ho ban.
69.30: Mede dwonto beyi Onyankopɔn din ayɛna mede aseda ahyɛ no anuonyam.
69.31: Eyi bɛsɔ Awurade ani yiye asen nantwi,asen nantwinini a otua mmɛn na ɔwɔ tɔte.
69.32: Mmɔborɔni behu na nʼani agye,mo a mohwehwɛ Onyankopɔn no koma benya nkwa.
69.33: Awurade tie wɔn a ade ahia wɔn,na ommu ne nkurɔfo nneduafo animtiaa.
69.34: Ma ɔsoro ne asase nkamfo no,po ne nea ɛkeka ne ho wɔ mu nyinaa,
69.35: efisɛ Onyankopɔn begye Sion nkwana wakyekye Yuda nkuropɔn no bio.Afei nnipa bɛtena mu na ayɛ wɔn de;
69.36: Nʼasomfo asefo na wɔbɛfa hɔ,na wɔn a wɔdɔ ne din no bɛtena hɔ.

70.1: Dwom Dawid adesrɛ dwom.Ao, Onyankopɔn, yɛ ntɛm gye me nkwa;Awurade bra ntɛm bɛboa me.
70.2: Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me kra noanim ngu ase na wɔnyɛ basaa;ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me sɛe no nyinaamfa animguase nsan wɔn akyi.
70.3: Ma wɔn a wɔka, “Ɔtwea! Ɔtwea!” kyerɛ me nonsan wɔn akyi, esiane wɔn aniwu nti.
70.4: Nanso ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ wo nyinaansɛpɛw wɔn ho na wɔn ani nnye wɔ wo mu;ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo nkwagye no nka da biara se,“Onyankopɔn yɛ ɔkɛse!”
70.5: Me de meyɛ ohiani a minni ɔboafo;Ao, Onyankopɔn, bra me nkyɛn ntɛm.Wo ne me boafo ne me gyefo;Awurade, ntwentwɛn wʼanan ase.

71.1: Dwom Awurade, wo mu na maguan ahintaw;mma mʼanim ngu ase da.
71.2: Wo trenee no nti, yi me na gye me;tie me na gye me nkwa.
71.3: Yɛ me nkwagye botan,faako a metumi akɔ daa;hyɛ ma wommegye me nkwa,na wone me botan ne mʼabandennen.
71.4: Me Nyankopɔn, gye me fi amumɔyɛfo nsam,gye me fi nnebɔneyɛfo ne atirimɔdenfo nsam.
71.5: Na woayɛ mʼanidaso, Asafo Awurade,mʼahotoso fi me mmabun bere mu.
71.6: Mede me ho ato wo so fi awo mu;wo na wuyii me fii me na yafunu mu.Mɛkamfo wo daa.
71.7: Mayɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne ama bebree,nanso wo ne me guankɔbea dennen.
71.8: Wo nkamfo ahyɛ mʼanom ma,mekamfo wʼanuonyam da mu nyinaa.
71.9: Ntow me nkyene bere a mabɔ akwakoraa;mʼahoɔden sa wɔ me mu a, nnyaw me.
71.10: Efisɛ mʼatamfo kasa tia mewɔn a wɔtwɛn sɛ wobekum me no bɔ mu pam me ti so.
71.11: Wɔka se, “Onyankopɔn agyaw no mu;momma yentiw no na yɛnkyere no,na obiara nni hɔ a obegye no.”
71.12: Me Nyankopɔn, mfi me nkyɛn nkɔ akyiri;Onyankopɔn, yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me.
71.13: Ma wɔn a wɔbɔ me sobo no nsɛe wɔ animguase mu;wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wopira me noma ahohora ne animguase nkata wɔn so.
71.14: Nanso me de, menya anidaso daa;mɛkɔ so akamfo wo.
71.15: Mɛka wo trenee ho asɛm,ne wo nkwagye da mu nyinaa,nanso minnim ano.
71.16: Otumfo Awurade, mɛba abɛpae mu aka wo nnwuma akɛse no;mɛpae mu aka wo trenee, wo nko ara de no, akyerɛ.
71.17: Onyankopɔn, efi me mmabun bere na wokyerɛkyerɛɛ me,na ebesi nnɛ yi meka wʼanwonwade a woayɛ kyerɛ.
71.18: Mpo sɛ mebɔ akwakoraa na mifuw dwen a,Onyankopɔn, nnyaw me,kosi sɛ mɛka wo tumi ho asɛm akyerɛ nkyirimma,ne wo kɛseyɛ akyerɛ wɔn a wɔbɛba nyinaa.
71.19: Onyankopɔn, wo trenee du ɔsorosoro,wo a woayɛ nneɛma akɛse.Onyankopɔn, hena na ɔte sɛ wo?
71.20: Mmom woama mahu ɔhaw bebree a ɛyɛ yaw;nanso wobɛma me nkwa bio;na wubeyi me bio,afi asase yam.
71.21: Wobɛhyɛ me anuonyam bebreena woakyekye me werɛ bio.
71.22: Mede sanku bɛkamfo wome Nyankopɔn, wo trenee ntimɛto wʼayeyi dwom wɔ sankuten so,Israel Kronkronni.
71.23: Mʼanofafa de anigye bɛteɛ mubere a meto dwom kamfo wo,me a woagye me no.
71.24: Me tɛkrɛma bɛka wo trenee nnwumada mu nyinaa,efisɛ wɔn a wɔpɛ sɛ wɔhaw me nokɔ animguase ne basaayɛ mu.

72.1: Dwom Salomo dwom.Ao, Onyankopɔn, fa wʼatɛntrenee dom ɔhene no,na fa wo trenee ma ɔhene babarima.
72.2: Ɔde trenee bebu wo nkurɔfo atɛn,obebu wo nkurɔfo a wɔrehu amane no atɛntrenee.
72.3: Mmepɔw no de yiyedi bɛbrɛ nnipa no,nkoko no de trenee bɛba.
72.4: Ɔbɛko ama nnipa no mu amanehunufona wagye wɔn a wonni bi mma nkwa;ɔbɛdwerɛw nhyɛsofo.
72.5: Owia ne ɔsram da so wɔ hɔ yiwobesuro wo awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu.
72.6: Ɔbɛyɛ sɛ osu a ɛtɔ gu asase a wɔadɔw so so,te sɛ obosu a egugu asase so.
72.7: Atreneefo benyin frɔmfrɔm wɔ ne bere so;yiyedi bebu so akosi da a ɔsram nni hɔ bio.
72.8: Obedi hene afi po akosi po,afi Asubɔnten Efrata akosi asase ano.
72.9: Sare so mmusua bɛkotow nʼanimna nʼatamfo adi mfutuma.
72.10: Tarsis ne mpoano ahemfo a wɔwɔ akyirikyiride sonkahiri bɛbrɛ no;Saba ne Seba ahemfode ayɛyɛde bɛbrɛ no.
72.11: Ahemfo nyinaa bɛkotow no,amanaman nyinaa bɛsom no.
72.12: Na obegye mmɔborɔfo a wosu frɛ no,ne amanehunufo a wonni ɔboafo.
72.13: Obehu wɔn a wɔayɛ mmrɛw ne ahiafo mmɔbɔna wagye ahiafo nkwa.
72.14: Obegye wɔn afi nhyɛso ne akakabensɛm ase,efisɛ wɔn mogya som bo wɔ nʼanim.
72.15: Ɔhene nkwa so!ma wɔmfa sikakɔkɔɔ mfi Seba mmrɛ no.Ma nnipa mmɔ mpae mma nona wonhyira no da mu nyinaa.
72.16: Aburow mmu so wɔ asase no so nyinaa;nnuan mmu so wɔ nkoko so,ma nʼaba mmɔ sɛ Lebanon;na enyin sɛ mfuw so sare.
72.17: Ne din bɛtena hɔ daa;ɛntena hɔ nkyɛ sɛ owia.Wɔbɛfa no so ahyira amanaman no,na wɔbɛfrɛ no nhyira.
72.18: Nhyira nka Awurade Nyankopɔn, Israel Nyankopɔn!Ɔno nko ara na ɔyɛ anwonwade.
72.19: Nhyira nka ne din a anuonyam ahyɛ no ma no daa daa.Ma nʼanuonyam nhyɛ wiase nyinaa ma.Amen! Amen!
72.20: Yisai ba Dawid mpaebɔ no awiei ni.

73.1: NHOMA A ƐTO SO ABIƐSANnwom –Dwom Asaf dwom.Ampa ara Onyankopɔn ye ma Israel,oye ma wɔn a wɔn koma mu tew.
73.2: Nanso me de, anka me nan reyɛ awatiri;anka merehwere me nnyinaso,
73.3: efisɛ mʼani beree ahantanfobere a mihuu amumɔyɛfo yiyedi no.
73.4: Wonni aperepere;na wɔwɔ ahoɔden ne apɔwmuden.
73.5: Dadwen a ɛtaa ba nnipa so biara nna wɔn so;ɔdesani haw biara nna wɔn so.
73.6: Enti ahantan yɛ wɔn kɔnmuade,na wofura akakabensɛm.
73.7: Wɔn koma a apirim no mu na nnebɔne fi;na wɔn amumɔyɛ adwene nni awiei.
73.8: Wɔserew afoforo na wɔka wɔn ho nsɛm a enye;wɔde nhyɛso hunahuna afoforo wɔ ahomaso mu.
73.9: Wɔn ano ka ɔsoro nsɛm,na wɔn tɛkrɛma agye asase afa.
73.10: Ɛno nti wɔn nkurɔfo kɔ wɔn nkyɛnna wonya nsu nom ma ebu so.
73.11: Wobisa se, “Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na Onyankopɔn ahu?Na Ɔsorosoroni no wɔ nhumu ana?”
73.12: Sɛɛ na amumɔyɛfo no te,hwee mfa wɔn ho, na wɔkɔ so pɛ ahonyade.
73.13: Ampa ara, mannya hwee amfi me komamtew mu;me nsa a enni fɔ no ayɛ ɔkwa.
73.14: Da mu nyinaa mihu amane;anɔpa biara wɔtwe mʼaso.
73.15: Sɛ mekae se, “Mɛkasa saa” a,anka midii wo mma no huammɔ.
73.16: Mebɔɔ mmɔden sɛ mɛte eyinom nyinaa ase,nanso na ɛhyɛ me so
73.17: kosii sɛ mekɔɔ Onyankopɔn kronkronbea hɔ;ɛhɔ na metee nea awiei no ɛbɛba wɔn so no ase.
73.18: Ampa ara wode wɔn gu faako a hɔ yɛ torowode wɔn hwe fam sɛe wɔn pasaa.
73.19: Sɛnea wɔsɛe prɛko pɛ,na ehu hwim wɔn kɔ no.
73.20: Ɛte sɛ adaeso, bere a onipa anyan,Awurade, sɛ wokanyan wo ho a,wubebu wʼani agu wɔn so sɛ biribi a enni hɔ.
73.21: Bere a awerɛhow hyɛɛ me koma muna me honhom dii yaw no,
73.22: meyɛɛ sɛ obi a onnim hwee na onni adwene;meyɛɛ sɛ aboa gyimfo wɔ wʼanim.
73.23: Nanso na me ne wo wɔ hɔ bere biara;na wode wo nsa nifa aso me mu.
73.24: Wode wʼafotu kyerɛ me kwan;na akyiri no, wode me bɛkɔ anuonyam mu.
73.25: Hena na mewɔ wɔ ɔsoro ka wo ho?Na biribiara nni asase so a mepɛ ka wo ho.
73.26: Me honam, ne me koma bedi me huammɔ,nanso Onyankopɔn ne me koma ahoɔdenne me kyɛfa daa nyinaa.
73.27: Wɔn a wɔmmɛn wo no bɛyera.Wosɛe wɔn a wonni wo nokware nyinaa.
73.28: Nanso me de, minim sɛ eye sɛ wobɛbɛn Onyankopɔn.Mede Otumfo Awurade ayɛ me guankɔbea;mɛka wo nneyɛe nyinaa akyerɛ.

74.1: Dwom Asaf dwom.Ao, Onyankopɔn, adɛn nti na woapo yɛn koraa yi?Adɛn nti na wʼabufuw hyew wʼadidibea nguan?
74.2: Kae nkurɔfo a wotɔɔ wɔn teteete no,abusua a ɛyɛ wʼagyapade a wugyee wɔn no,Bepɔw Sion, faako a wote hɔ.
74.3: Dan wʼanammɔntu kyerɛ saa nnwiriwii a ɛto ntwa da yi,ɔtamfo no de saa ɔsɛe yi nyinaa aba wo kronkronbea no so.
74.4: Wʼatamfo bobɔɔ mu wɔ faako a wuhyiaa yɛn no;wɔasisi wɔn mfrankaa sɛ agyiraehyɛde wɔ hɔ.
74.5: Wɔyɛɛ wɔn sɛ nnipa a wɔrehwim mmonnuade abubu nnua a ayɛ nkyɛkyerɛ.
74.6: Wɔde wɔn mmonnua ne nnamebubuu nnua a wɔasen adi ho adwinni no.
74.7: Wɔhyew wo kronkronbea no dwerɛbee;woguu faako a wo Din te no ho fi.
74.8: Wɔkaa wɔ wɔn koma mu se, “Yebetiatia wɔn so ayɛ wɔn pasaa!”Wɔhyew baabiara a wɔsom Onyankopɔn wɔ asase no so.
74.9: Wɔmmaa yɛn nsɛnkyerɛnne a ɛyɛ nwonwa biara;adiyifo no asa,na yɛn mu biara nnim nna dodow a ebedi.
74.10: Onyankopɔn, wʼatamfo bɛserew wo akosi da bɛn?Wɔn a wokyi wo no begu wo din ho fi daa ana?
74.11: Adɛn nti na woatwe wo nsa, wo nsa nifa no?Yi fi wʼatade mmobɔwee no mu na sɛe wɔn.
74.12: Nanso Onyankopɔn yɛ me hene fi tete;wode nkwagye ba asase so.
74.13: Ɛyɛ wo na wode wo tumi paee po mu no;wopɛtɛw nsu mu ɔwɔ no ti.
74.14: Wopɛtɛw Lewiatan no tina wode no maa sare so abɔde sɛ wɔn aduan.
74.15: Wo na womaa nsuwa ne nsuti tuei;na womaa nsubɔnten a ɛsen yoyowee.
74.16: Adekyee wɔ wo na adesae nso yɛ wo dea;wode owia ne ɔsram sisii hɔ.
74.17: Ɛyɛ wo na wototoo asase so ahye nyinaa;wobɔɔ ahohuru ne awɔw mmere.
74.18: Awurade, kae sɛnea ɔtamfo no aserew wo,sɛnea nkwaseafo agu wo din ho fi.
74.19: Mmfa wʼaborɔnoma nkwa mma nkekaboa;mma wo werɛ mfi wo nkurɔfo a wɔrehu amane no nkwa afebɔɔ.
74.20: Ma wʼapam no ho nhia wo,efisɛ akakabensɛm ahyɛ asase no so sum mu ma.
74.21: Mma wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so no mmfa animguase nsan;ma ahiafo ne mmɔborɔfo nkamfo wo din.
74.22: Ao, Onyankopɔn, ma wo ho so na ka wo ara wʼasɛm;kae sɛnea nkwaseafo serew wo da mu nyinaa.
74.23: Mmu wʼani ngu wɔn a wɔsɔre tia wo no nteɛteɛmu so,wʼatamfo gyegyeegyeyɛ a ɛkɔ soro daa no.

75.1: Dwom Asaf dwom.Onyankopɔn, yɛda wo ase,yɛda wo ase, efisɛ wo Din abɛn;nnipa ka wʼanwonwade kyerɛ.
75.2: Woka se, “Me na mehyɛɛ bere a ɛsɛ no;ɛyɛ me na mibu atɛntrenee.
75.3: Sɛ asase ne so nnipa nyinaa wosow a,me na mema nʼafadum gyina hɔ pintinn.
75.4: Meka kyerɛ ahantanfo se, ‘Monnhoahoa mo ho bio,’na meka kyerɛ amumɔyɛfo nso se, ‘Mommma mo mmɛn so.
75.5: Mommma mo mmɛn so ntia ɔsoro;mommfa animtiaabu nkasa.’ ”
75.6: Obiara mmfi apuei anaa atɔeanaa sare no so a obetumi ama obi so.
75.7: Ɛyɛ Onyankopɔn na obu atɛn:Ɔbrɛ ɔbaako ase, na ɔma ɔfoforo so.
75.8: Kuruwa bi hyɛ Awurade nsamnsa bi a etwa ahuru a wɔde nnuhuam afra ahyɛ no ma;ohwie, na asase so amumɔyɛfo nyinaanom ma ɛka ase puw.
75.9: Me de, mɛpae mu aka eyi daa daa;mɛto ayeyi dwom ama Yakob Nyankopɔn.
75.10: Mebubu amumɔyɛfo nyinaa mmɛn,na atreneefo mmɛn de, wɔbɛma so.

76.1: Dwom Asaf dwom.Onyankopɔn din ahyeta wɔ Yuda;ne din so wɔ Israel.
76.2: Ne ntamadan si Salem,ne tenabea wɔ Sion.
76.3: Ɛhɔ na obubuu mmemma a ɛpa gya,nkatabo ne afoa, akode nyinaa mu.
76.4: Wo ho hann no hyerɛn,na woso sen mmepɔw a mmoadoma ahyɛ mu ma no.
76.5: Mmarima akokodurufo deda hɔ a wɔagye wɔn ho nneɛma,wɔadeda awufo nna;na akofo no mu baako mpontumi mma ne nsa so.
76.6: Yakob Nyankopɔn, wokaa wɔn anim noapɔnkɔ no ne nteaseɛnam no adeda dinn.
76.7: Wo nko ara na ɛsɛ sɛ wosuro wo.Sɛ wo bo fuw a hena na obetumi agyina wʼanim?
76.8: Wubuu atɛn fii ɔsoro,asase suroe, na ɛyɛɛ komm,
76.9: bere a wo, Onyankopɔn, sɔre buu atɛn,de gyee amanehunufo wɔ asase no so no.
76.10: Ampa ara wʼabufuwhyew a etia nnipa no de ayeyi brɛ wo,na wɔn a wotumi gyina ano no nya kɔkɔbɔ.
76.11: Monhyɛ Awurade mo Nyankopɔn no bɔ na munni so;momma nsase a atwa ne ho ahyiamfa ayɛyɛde mmrɛ Ɔbaako a ɛsɛ sɛ wosuro no no.
76.12: Ɔbrɛ sodifonom honhom ase;na asase so ahemfo suro no.

77.1: Dwom Asaf dwom.Misu mefrɛɛ Onyankopɔn srɛɛ mmoa;misu mefrɛɛ no sɛ ontie me.
77.2: Bere a mewɔ ahohiahia mu no, mehwehwɛɛ Awurade;metrɛw me nsa a ɛmpa abaw mu anadwona me kra ampene sɛ wɔbɛkyekye ne werɛ.
77.3: Onyankopɔn mekaee wo, na misii apini;medwenee, na me honhom tɔɔ beraw.
77.4: Woamma mʼani ankum;amanehunu dodow nti, mantumi ankasa.
77.5: Medwenee nna a atwam no ho,teteete mfe no ho;
77.6: mekaee me nnwom a na meto no anadwo.Me koma dwenee ho na me honhom bisae se:
77.7: “Enti, Awurade bɛpo yɛn daa?Ɔrenhu yɛn mmɔbɔ bio ana?
77.8: Nʼadɔe a ɛnsa da atu ayera koraa ana?Na ne bɔhyɛ no, amma mu koraa ana?
77.9: Onyankopɔn werɛ afi sɛ ɔbɛyɛ mmɔborɔhunufo ana?Ɔde abufuw atwe nʼayamhyehye no asan ana?”
77.10: Afei misusuwii se, “Eyi de, mɛsrɛ:mfe a Ɔsorosoroni no teɛɛ ne nsa nifa mu no.”
77.11: Mɛkae nneɛma a Awurade ayɛ;yiw, mɛkae wo tete anwonwade no.
77.12: Mɛdwene wo nnwuma nyinaa hona masusuw wo nneyɛe akɛse nyinaa ho.
77.13: Onyankopɔn, wʼakwan yɛ kronkron.Onyame bɛn na ɔso sɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn?
77.14: Wone Onyankopɔn a woyɛ anwonwade;wokyerɛ wo tumi wɔ aman mu.
77.15: Wode wo tumi nsa no gyee wo nkurɔfo,Yakob ne Yosef asefo no.
77.16: Onyankopɔn, nsu no huu wo,nsu no huu wo na wɔpopoe;bun no mpo ho wosowee.
77.17: Omununkum tɔɔ nsu,aprannaa gyigyee wɔ ɔsoro;na wo bɛmma paa gya dii akɔneaba.
77.18: Wʼaprannaa bobɔɔ mu wɔ mfɛtɛ no mu,wʼanyinam hyerɛn wiase;asase popoe, na ɛwosowee.
77.19: Wode wo kwan faa po mu,wode faa nsu kɛse mu,nanso wɔanhu wʼanammɔn.
77.20: Wonam Mose ne Aaron abasa so,dii wo nkurɔfo anim sɛ nguankuw.

78.1: Dwom Asaf dwom.Me nkurɔfo, muntie me nkyerɛkyerɛ;monyɛ aso mma mʼanom nsɛm.
78.2: Mɛkasa wɔ abebu mu,mɛka ahintasɛm, teteete nneɛma no,
78.3: nneɛma a yɛate na yɛahu;nneɛma a yɛn agyanom aka ho asɛm akyerɛ yɛn.
78.4: Yɛremfa nkame wɔn mma;yɛbɛka akyerɛ nkyirimmaAwurade nneyɛe a ɛfata nkamfo no,ne tumi ne anwonwade a wayɛ no.
78.5: Ɔyɛɛ ahyɛde maa Yakobna ɔyɛɛ mmara wɔ Israel,nea ɔhyɛɛ yɛn nenanomsɛ wɔnkyerɛ wɔn mma,
78.6: sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a nkyirimma besua,mpo mmofra a wonnya nwoo wɔn,na wɔn nso akyerɛkyerɛ wɔn mma.
78.7: Afei wɔde wɔn ho bɛto Onyankopɔn so,na wɔn werɛ remfi ne nneyɛe,na wobedi nʼahyɛde so.
78.8: Wɔrenyɛ sɛ wɔn nenanom,a na wɔyɛ asoɔdenfo ne atuatewfo,wɔn a wonni Onyankopɔn nokware wɔ wɔn koma muna woyɛ honhom mu atorofo ma no no.
78.9: Ɛwɔ mu sɛ na Efraim mmarima kurakura agyan,nanso ɔko da no woguanee;
78.10: Wɔanni Onyankopɔn apam no so,wɔampɛ sɛ wodi ne mmara no so.
78.11: Wɔn werɛ fii nea wayɛ,anwonwade a wayɛ akyerɛ wɔn no.
78.12: Ɔyɛɛ anwonwade wɔ wɔn nenanom anim,wɔ Soan mantam a ɛwɔ Misraim asase so.
78.13: Ɔkyɛɛ po mu na ɔde wɔn faa mu.Ɔmaa nsu no gyinaa sɛ afasu.
78.14: Ɔde omununkum dii wɔn anim awiana ɔde ogyatɛn dii wɔn anim anadwo nyinaa.
78.15: Ɔpaee ɔbotan mu wɔ sare so,na ɔmaa wɔn nsu a ɛdɔɔso sɛ po;
78.16: Ɔmaa asuti fii abotan muna ɔmaa nsu sen sɛ nsubɔnten.
78.17: Nanso wɔkɔɔ so yɛɛ bɔne tiaa no,wɔsɔre tiaa Ɔsorosoroni no wɔ sare no so.
78.18: Wɔhyɛɛ da kaa aduan a wɔpɛ,de sɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛe.
78.19: Wɔkasa tiaa Onyankopɔn se,“Onyankopɔn betumi ato pon wɔ sare so ana?
78.20: Ɔde ade bɔɔ ɔbotan mu no, nsu tue fii mu,na nsuwa sen buu so.Na obetumi ama yɛn aduan nso?Obetumi ama ne nkurɔfo nam ana?”
78.21: Bere a Awurade tee nea wɔreka no, ne bo fuw yiye;ne gya beguu Yakob so,na nʼabufuwhyew sɔre tiaa Israel,
78.22: efisɛ na wonni Onyankopɔn mu gyidianaasɛ ne nkwagye mu ahotoso.
78.23: Nanso ɔkasa kyerɛɛ ɔsoro wɔ ɔhyɛ so;na obuee ɔsorosoro apon.
78.24: Ɔtɔɔ mana guu fam maa nnipa no sɛ wunni,ɔmaa wɔn ɔsoro aduan.
78.25: Nnipa dii abɔfo aduan;ɔmaa wɔn aduan a wobetumi adi nyinaa.
78.26: Ogyaa apuei mframa fi ɔsoro,na ofi ne tumi mu bɔɔ atɔe mframa.
78.27: Ɔtɔɔ nam sɛ mfutuma guu wɔn so,nnomaa a wotu bebree sɛ mpoano nwea.
78.28: Ɔma wɔbaa fam kɔɔ wɔn atenae,ne wɔn ntamadan ho nyinaa.
78.29: Wodidi maa aduan no boroo wɔn soefisɛ ɔmaa wɔn nea wɔhwehwɛ.
78.30: Nanso ansa na wobefi aduan a wɔhwehwɛ no ho,bere a ɛhyehyɛ wɔn anom mpo no,
78.31: Onyankopɔn abufuw sɔree wɔn so;okum ahoɔdenfo a wɔwɔ wɔn mutwitwaa Israel mmerante gui.
78.32: Eyinom nyinaa akyi, wɔkɔɔ so yɛɛ bɔne;nʼanwonwade akyi no, wɔannye anni.
78.33: Enti otwaa wɔn nna so te sɛ ahuruyɛɛ wɔn mfe awiei huhuuhu.
78.34: Bere biara a Onyankopɔn bekum wɔn no, wɔhwehwɛ nona wɔpere wɔn ho san ba ne nkyɛn.
78.35: Wɔkaee sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ wɔn botan,sɛ Ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn no yɛ wɔn Gyefo.
78.36: Nanso wɔde wɔn ano bɛdaadaa no,na wɔde wɔn tɛkrɛma atwa atoro akyerɛ no;
78.37: wɔn koma nni no nokware,na wonni nʼapam no so.
78.38: Nanso na ɔyɛ ahummɔbɔ;ɔde wɔn amumɔyɛ kyɛɛ wɔna wansɛe wɔn.Mpɛn pii, ɔtwentwɛn nʼabufuw sona wanhwie nʼabufuwhyew nyinaa.
78.39: Ɔkaee sɛ wɔyɛ ɔhonam ara kwa,mframa bi a ɛbɔ twa mu na ɛnsan nʼakyi.
78.40: Mpɛn ahe na wɔansɔre antia no wɔ sare no so hɔ,na mpɛn ahe na wɔamma ne werɛ anhow wɔ asase wosee no so!
78.41: Wɔsɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛɛ bere biara;na woyii Israel Ɔkronkronni no abufuw.
78.42: Wɔn werɛ fii ne tumi no,da a ogyee wɔn fii wɔn nhyɛsofo nsam no,
78.43: da a ɔyɛɛ nsɛnkyerɛnne nwonwaso wɔ Misraim none nʼanwonwade wɔ Soan mantam mu no.
78.44: Ɔmaa wɔn nsubɔnten dan mogya;wɔantumi annom wɔn nsuten mu nsu.
78.45: Ɔmaa nwansenadɔm baa wɔn so bɛhaw wɔnna mpɔtorɔ nso bɛsɛee wɔn asase.
78.46: Ɔmaa tɛwtɛw bedii wɔn mfuw so aduanna ɔde wɔn nnɔbae nso maa mmoadabi.
78.47: Ɔde mparuwbo sɛee wɔn bobena ɔde sukyerɛmma sɛee wɔn ankye nnua.
78.48: Ɔde sukyerɛmma kum wɔn anantwiɔde anyinam kum wɔn nyɛmmoa.
78.49: Ohwiee nʼabufuwhyew guu wɔn so,abufuw, anibere ne ɔtan;abɔfo asɛefo kuw no.
78.50: Ɔbɔɔ kwan maa nʼabufuw;na wamfa wɔn nkwa ankyɛ wɔn,mmom, ɔde wɔn maa ɔyaredɔm.
78.51: Okunkum Misraimfo mmakan nyinaa,Ham ntamadan mu nnipa mu abakan.
78.52: Nanso oyii ne nkurɔfo fii mu sɛ nguankuw;odii wɔn anim sɛ nguan wɔ sare no so.
78.53: Odii wɔn anim dwoodwoo, enti wɔansuro;nanso wɔn atamfo de, po asorɔkye bu faa wɔn so.
78.54: Sɛɛ na ɔyɛ de wɔn baa nʼasase kronkron no ahye so,bepɔw asase a ɔde ne nsa nifa gyee no.
78.55: Ɔpam amanaman a wɔwɔ wɔn anim nona ɔkyekyɛɛ wɔn nsase no mu maa wɔn sɛ wɔn agyapade;ɔbɔɔ Israel mmusuakuw no atenase wɔ wɔn afi mu.
78.56: Nanso wɔsɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛe,na wɔsɔre tiaa Ɔsorosoroni no;na wɔanni ne mmara so.
78.57: Wɔyɛɛ sɛ wɔn agyanom, wɔanni nokware na wɔannya gyidi,ahotoso nni wɔn mu na wɔte sɛ agyan a asɛe.
78.58: Wɔde wɔn sorɔnsorɔmmea hyɛɛ no abufuwna wɔn ahoni maa ne ninkutwe mu yɛɛ den.
78.59: Onyankopɔn tee wɔn nka no, ne bo fuwii;na ɔpoo Israel korakora.
78.60: Ogyaw nʼatenae a ɛwɔ Silo no,ntamadan a wasi wɔ nnipa mu no.
78.61: Ɔde Apam Adaka a ɛyɛ ne tumi no kɔɔ nnommum mu,nʼanuonyam kɔɔ atamfo nsam.
78.62: Ɔde ne nkurɔfo maa afoa;ne bo fuw nʼagyapade yiye.
78.63: Ogya hyew wɔn mmerante kum wɔn,na wɔn mmabaa annya ayeforohyia dwom anto;
78.64: Wɔn asɔfo wuwuu afoa ano,na wɔn akunafo antumi ansu.
78.65: Afei Awurade sɔree sɛnea ofi nna mu no,sɛnea ɔbarima a wabow nsa nyan fi nnahɔɔ mu no.
78.66: Ɔbobɔɔ nʼatamfo ma woguan kɔɔ wɔn akyi;ɔhyɛɛ wɔn aniwu afebɔɔ.
78.67: Afei ɔpoo Yosef ntamadan no,na wamfa Efraim abusuakuw no nso;
78.68: Na mmom, ɔfaa Yuda abusuakuw no,Bepɔw Sion a ɔdɔ no no.
78.69: Osii ne kronkronbea te sɛ sorɔnsorɔmmea,te sɛ asase a etim hɔ daa.
78.70: Oyii ne somfo Dawid,ɔfrɛɛ no fii nguannan mu;
78.71: fii nguan akyi na ɔde no baese ɔmmɛyɛ oguanhwɛfo mma ne nkurɔfo Yakob,mma Israel a wɔyɛ nʼagyapade.
78.72: Na Dawid de koma pa hwɛɛ wɔn sona ɔde ne nimdeɛ dii wɔn anim.

79.1: Dwom Asaf dwom.Ao Onyankopɔn, amanaman no atow ahyɛ wʼagyapade so;wɔagu wʼasɔredan kronkron no ho fi,wɔama Yerusalem adan nnwiriwii.
79.2: Wɔde wʼasomfo afunu ayɛ aduanama wim nnomaa,na wɔde wʼahotefo nam ama asase so mmoa.
79.3: Wɔahwie mogya agu te sɛ nsuwɔ Yerusalem ho nyinaa,na obiara nni hɔ a obesie awufo no.
79.4: Yɛayɛ animtiaabude ama yɛn mfɛfo,fɛwdi ne nsopa ama wɔn a wɔatwa yɛn ho ahyia.
79.5: Awurade, enkosi da bɛn? Wo bo befuw afebɔɔ ana?Wo ninkunu bɛdɛw sɛ ogya akosi da bɛn?
79.6: Hwie wʼabufuw gu amanamana wonnye wo nto mu no so,ahenni awɔmmɔ wo din no;
79.8: Mfa yɛn agyanom bɔne so asotwe mma yɛn;ma wo mmɔborɔhunu mmra yɛn so ntɛm,na yɛwɔ ahohiahia mu.
79.9: Onyankopɔn yɛn Agyenkwa, boa yɛn,wo din no anuonyam nti;gye yɛn na fa yɛn bɔne kyɛ yɛnwo din nti.
79.10: Adɛn nti na ɛsɛ sɛ amanaman ka se,“Wɔn Nyankopɔn wɔ he?”Yɛn anim ha ara, ma wonhu wɔ amanaman mu sɛwotɔ wʼasomfo mogya a wɔahwie agu no so werɛ.
79.11: Ma nneduafo no apinisi nnu wʼanim;fa wo basa ahoɔden nokora wɔn a wɔabu wɔn kumfɔ no.
79.12: Awurade, ahohora a yɛn mfɛfo asum agu wo so no,tua wɔn so ka mpɛn ason.
79.13: Na yɛn a yɛyɛ wo nkurɔfo, wʼadidibea nguan no,beyi wo ayɛ daa nyinaa;efi awo ntoatoaso kosi awo ntoatoaso,yɛbɛkɔ so aka wʼayeyi akyerɛ.

80.1: Dwom Asaf dwom.Israel guanhwɛfo, tie yɛn,wo a wudii Yosef anim sɛnea wodi nguankuw anim;wo a wote ahengua so wɔ kerubim ntam no, hyerɛn
80.2: wɔ Efraim, Benyamin ne Manase anim.Kanyan wo tumi;bra begye yɛn nkwa.
80.3: Ao Onyankopɔn, gye yɛn bio;ma wʼanim nhyerɛn yɛn so,na wɔagye yɛn nkwa.
80.4: Asafo Awurade Nyankopɔn,wʼabufuw bɛdɛw akosi da bɛn,wʼabufuw a etia wo nkurɔfo mpaebɔ no?
80.5: Wode nusu yɛɛ aduan maa wɔn dii;wode nusu kuruwama maa wɔn nomee.
80.6: Wode yɛn ayɛ nea yɛn mfɛfo ko ho,na yɛn atamfo serew yɛn.
80.7: Asafo Nyankopɔn, gye yɛn bio;ma wʼanim nhyerɛn wɔ yɛn so,na wɔagye yɛn nkwa.
80.8: Wutuu bobe fi Misraim beduae;wopam amanaman no na wuduae.
80.9: Wosiesiee asase no baabi maa no,egyee ntin na ɛtrɛw asase no so.
80.10: Ne nwini kataa mmepɔw no sone mman kataa sida akɛse no so.
80.11: Ɛdennan trɛw kɔɔ Po no so,na ɛfefɛw trɛw koduu Asubɔnten no ho.
80.12: Adɛn nti na woabubu nʼafasuama wɔn a wotwa mu wɔ hɔ no tetew ne bobe aba no?
80.13: Kɔkɔte fi wuram bɛsɛe no pasaana mmoadoma a wɔwɔ sare so de yɛ wɔn aduan.
80.14: Asafo Nyankopɔn, san bra yɛn nkyɛn!fi ɔsoro hɔ hwɛ na wubehu!Hwɛ saa bobe yi so,
80.15: ntin a wo nsa nifa adua no,ɔbabarima a woatetew no ama wo ho no.
80.16: Wɔatwa wo bobe no ato fam, ato mu gya ama ahyew;wʼanimka ma wo nkurɔfo ase tɔre.
80.17: Fa wo nsa kata ɔbarima a ɔwɔ wo nifa no so,onipa ba a woatetew no ama wo ho no.
80.18: Afei yɛrentwe yɛn ho mfi wo nkyɛn;kanyan yɛn, na yɛbɛbɔ wo din.
80.19: Asafo Awurade Nyankopɔn, gye yɛn bio,na ma wʼanim nhyerɛn yɛn so,na wɔagye yɛn nkwa.

81.1: Dwom Asaf dwom.Monto ahurusi dwom mma Onyankopɔn yɛn ahoɔden;mommɔ ose mma Yakob Nyankopɔn no!
81.2: Momma nnwom no so na monwosow akasaa.Mommɔ sanku ne bɛnta dɛdɛ no.
81.3: Monhyɛn mmentia ɔsram foforo da no,ne ne kurokumatwa mu, yɛn Aponto da no;
81.4: Eyi yɛ Israelfo ahyɛde,Yakob Nyankopɔn mmara.
81.5: Otintimii sɛ nhyehyɛe maa Yosefbere a ɔsɔre tiaa Misraim no,faako a yɛtee kasa a yɛnte ase no.
81.6: Ɔka se, “Miyii adesoa no fii wɔn mmati so,ne wɔn nsa fii kɛntɛn ho.
81.7: Mo ahohiahia mu mofrɛɛ me na migyee mo,migyee mo so wɔ aprannaa mu;mesɔɔ mo hwɛɛ wɔ Meriba nsu ho.
81.8: “Me nkurɔfo, muntie me kɔkɔbɔ yi,Israel, sɛ mubetie me a!
81.9: Ɛnsɛ sɛ munya anyame foforo bi wɔ mo mu;ɛnsɛ sɛ mokotow ananafo anyame.
81.10: Mene Awurade, mo Nyankopɔn amiyii mo fii Misraim asase so no.Mummue mo anom tɛtrɛɛ na mɛhyɛ mu ma.
81.11: “Nanso me nkurɔfo rentie me;Israel remmrɛ ne ho ase mma me.
81.12: Enti migyaa wɔn maa wɔn komadensɛ wɔnyɛ nea wɔpɛ biara.
81.13: “Sɛ me nkurɔfo tie me,na Israel nantew mʼakwan so a,
81.14: anka medi wɔn atamfo so ama wɔn ntɛmna mama me basa so atia wɔn a wokyi wɔn!
81.15: Wɔn a wɔtan Awurade no de osuro bɛkotow no,na wɔn asotwe to rentwa da.
81.16: Nanso wɔde atoko mu atoko papa bɛma mo adi;mede ɔbotan mu wo bɛma mo amee.”

82.1: Dwom Asaf dwom.Onyankopɔn di hene wɔ ɔsoro asafo mu;obu atɛn wɔ “anyame” mu.
82.2: “Wobɛbɔ wɔn a wɔnteɛ ho banna woayɛ nhwɛanim ama amumɔyɛfo akosi da bɛn?
82.3: Monka mmɔborɔfo ne ayisaa asɛm mma wɔn;mommɔ ahiafo ne wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so yiyedi ho ban.
82.4: Munnye ɔbrɛfo ne ahiafo;munnye wɔn mfi amumɔyɛfo nsam.
82.5: “Anyame no nnim de, na wɔnte hwee ase.Wokyinkyin wɔ sum mu;na asase fapem nyinaa wosow.
82.6: “Mekae se, ‘Moyɛ “anyame;”mo nyinaa yɛ Ɔsorosoroni no mma.’
82.7: Nanso mubewuwu sɛ nnipa pɛ;na moahwe ase sɛ ɔsodifo biara.”
82.8: Ao Onyankopɔn, sɔre, bu wiase atɛn;efisɛ amanaman nyinaa yɛ wo de.

83.1: Dwom Asaf Dwom.Ao, Onyankopɔn, ntena hɔ komm;mmua wʼano, Ao, Onyankopɔn, keka wo ho.
83.2: Hwɛ sɛnea wʼatamfo keka wɔn ho fa,na wɔn a wɔmpɛ wʼasɛm nso ama wɔn ti so.
83.3: Wɔde anifere repam atia wo nkurɔfo,wɔrepam atia wɔn a wo koma da wɔn so no.
83.4: Wɔka se, “Mommra na yɛnsɛe wɔn sɛ ɔman,sɛnea wɔrenkae Israel din bio.”
83.5: Wɔde adwene koro bɔ pɔw;na wɔpam tia wo,
83.6: Edom ntamadan ne Ismaelfo,Moabfo ne Hagarfo,
83.7: Gebalfo ne Amonfo ne Amalekfo,Filistifo ne Tirofo.
83.8: Asiria mpo akɔka wɔn hode wɔn ahoɔden akɔhyɛ Lot asefo de no mu den.
83.9: Yɛ wɔn sɛnea woyɛɛ Midian,sɛnea woyɛɛ Sisera ne Yabin wɔ asubɔnten Kison ho no,
83.10: wɔn a wɔsɛe wɔ En-Dorna wɔdan nwura no.
83.11: Yɛ wɔn atitiriw sɛ Oreb ne Seeb,ne wɔn mmapɔmma nyinaa sɛ Seba ne Salmuna,
83.12: a wɔkae se, “Momma yɛmfaOnyankopɔn adidibea nsase no no.”
83.13: Me Nyankopɔn, yɛ wɔn sɛ mfɛtɛ mu mfutuma,sɛ ntɛtɛ a mframa bɔ gu.
83.14: Sɛnea ogya hyew kwae,na ogyatannaa so nkoko mu hyew no no,
83.15: saa ara na fa wʼahum taa wɔnna fa wo mframa a ano yɛ den no hunahuna wɔn.
83.16: Ma animguase nka wɔn,na ama nnipa ahwehwɛ wo din akyi kwan, Awurade.
83.17: Ma wɔn anim ngu ase na wonni yaw;ma wonwuwu wɔ animguase mu.
83.18: Ma wonhu sɛ wo a wo din de Awurade no,wo nko ara ne Ɔsorosoroni wɔ asase nyinaa so.

84.1: Dwom Koramma dwom.Awurade Asafo,wʼatenae hɔ yɛ ahomeka!
84.2: Me kra pere, mpo ɛtɔ beraw,sɛ ɔbɛkɔ Awurade adiwo;me koma ne me honam teɛ mufrɛ Onyankopɔn teasefo.
84.3: Mpo akasanoma anya ofi,na asomfena nso anwen ne berebuw,faako a obesow ne mmawɔ beae bi a ɛbɛn wʼafɔremuka,Awurade Asafo, me Hene ne me Nyankopɔn.
84.4: Nhyira nka wɔn a wɔte wo fi;na wɔkamfo wo din daa.
84.5: Nhyira nka wɔn a wɔwɔ wo mu ahoɔden,na wɔde wɔn koma fi akwantu ase kɔhwehwɛ wo.
84.6: Sɛ wɔfa Baka Bon no mu awɔma hɔ yɛ nsuwansuwa;asusow bere nsu so taataa hɔ.
84.7: Wɔkɔ no ahoɔden so bere nyinaa,kosi sɛ wɔn mu biara bepue Onyankopɔn anim wɔ Sion.
84.8: Asafo Awurade Nyankopɔn, tie me mpaebɔ;Yakob Nyankopɔn, yɛ aso ma me.
84.9: Ao, Onyankopɔn, hwɛ yɛn nkatabo;fa ahummɔbɔ hwɛ nea woasra no ngo no.
84.10: Wʼadiwo hɔ da koro tenaye sen nnafua apem wɔ baabi foforo;mepɛ sɛ mɛyɛ ɔponanohwɛfo wɔ Onyankopɔn fisen sɛ mɛtena amumɔyɛfo ntamadan mu.
84.11: Efisɛ Awurade Nyankopɔn yɛ owia ne kyɛm;Awurade hu mmɔbɔ na ɔhyɛ anuonyam;ɔmmfa ade pa biara nkamewɔn a wɔteɛ.
84.12: Asafo Awurade,nhyira nka onipa a ɔde ne ho to wo so.

85.1: Dwom Koramma dwom.Wo Awurade, wodom wʼasase;wode Yakob ahonyade san maa no.
85.2: Wode wo nkurɔfo bɔne kyɛɛ wɔnna wokataa wɔn nnebɔne nyinaa so.
85.3: Wode wʼabufuw nyinaa too nkyɛnna wodan fii wʼabufuwhyew ho.
85.4: San gye yɛn bio, Onyankopɔn, yɛn Gyefo,na ma wʼani nnye yɛn ho.
85.5: Wo bo befuw yɛn akosi daa ana?Wʼabufuw bɛtoa so akɔ awo ntoantoaso nyinaa so ana?
85.6: Worenhyɛ yɛn den bio,na ama wo nkurɔfo asɛpɛw wɔn ho wɔ wo mu ana?
85.7: Awurade, kyerɛ yɛn wo dɔ a ɛnsa da no,na ma yɛn wo nkwagye no.
85.8: Metie nea Awurade Nyankopɔn bɛka;ɔde asomdwoe hyɛ ne nkurɔfo, ahotefo no bɔ,enti ɛnsɛ sɛ wɔsan kɔ agyimisɛm ho.
85.9: Ampa ara, ne nkwagye bɛn wɔn a wosuro no,na nʼanuonyam bɛtena yɛn asase so.
85.10: Ɔdɔ ne nokwaredi behyia,na trenee ne asomdwoe befew wɔn ho wɔn ho ano.
85.11: Nokwaredi bepue afi asase no so,na trenee ahwɛ afi ɔsoro.
85.12: Awurade bɛma yɛn nea eye ampa arana yɛn asase bɛma ne nnɔbae.
85.13: Trenee di nʼanimsiesie ɔkwan ma nʼanammɔntu.

86.1: Dwom Dawid mpaebɔ.Awurade, tie me na gye me so,efisɛ meyɛ ohiani ne mmɔborɔni.
86.2: Bɔ me nkwa ho ban, efisɛ mede me ho ama wo.Wo ne me Nyankopɔn, gye wʼakoa aɔde ne ho to wo so.
86.3: Awurade, hu me mmɔbɔ,na misu frɛ wo daa nyinaa.
86.4: Ma wʼakoa ani nnye,na wo Awurade, wo nkyɛnna mema me kra so ba.
86.5: Awurade, wuye na wode bɔne kyɛ,wowɔ ɔdɔ mmoroso ma wɔn a wosu frɛ wo nyinaa.
86.6: Awurade, tie me mpaebɔ;tie me mmɔborɔsu.
86.7: Mɛfrɛ wo mʼahohia da mu,na wubegye me so.
86.8: Awurade, onyame bi nni hɔ a ɔte sɛ wo;na wɔn nnwuma biara nto wo de.
86.9: Awurade, aman a woakyekyere nyinaabɛba abɛsom wo wɔ wʼanim;wɔbɛba abɛhyɛ wo din anuonyam.
86.10: Woyɛ ɔkɛse na woyɛ anwonwa nnwuma;wo nko ara ne Onyankopɔn.
86.11: Awurade, kyerɛ me wʼakwan,na mɛnantew wo nokware mu;ma memfa me koma nyinaa mma wona masuro wo din.
86.12: Mede me koma nyinaa meyi wo ayɛ, Awurade me Nyankopɔnna mahyɛ wo din anuonyam daa nyinaa.
86.13: Efisɛ ɔdɔ a wode dɔ me no so;woayi me afi owu amoa mu tɔnn.
86.14: Ao, Onyankopɔn, ahomasofo atow ahyɛ me so;basabasayɛfo kuw rehwehwɛ me akum me,nnipa a wɔmmfa wo nyɛ hwee no.
86.15: Nanso wo, Awurade, woyɛ mmɔborɔhunufo ne ɔdomfo Nyankopɔn,wo bo kyɛ fuw, na wʼadɔe ne wo nokware dɔɔso.
86.16: Dan wʼani hwɛ me na dom me;fa wʼahoɔden ma wʼakoana gye wʼafenaa babarima nkwa.
86.17: Ma me wo papayɛ ho nsɛnkyerɛnne,na mʼatamfo nhu na wɔn anim ngu asena wo, Awurade, wo na woaboa me akyekye me werɛ.

87.1: Dwom Koramma dwom.Wato ne fapem wɔ bepɔw kronkron no so;
87.2: Awurade dɔ Sion apon nosen Yakob atenae nyinaa.
87.4: “Mede Rahab ne Babiloniabɛka wɔn a wɔyɛ osetie ma me no ho,Filistia, Tiro ne Kus nsona maka se, ‘Wɔwoo eyinom wɔ Sion.’ ”
87.5: Ampa ara wɔbɛka afa Sion ho se,“Wɔwoo oyi ne ɔno wɔ no mu,na Ɔsorosoroni no ankasa de no betim hɔ.”
87.6: Awurade bɛkyerɛw wɔ nnipa dinkyerɛw nhoma no mu se,“Wɔwoo oyi wɔ Sion.”
87.7: Na wɔbɛto dwom se,“Me ntin nyinaa wɔ wo mu.”

88.1: Dwom Esrahini Heman ɔhaw ne amanehunu dwom.Awurade, woyɛ me nkwagye Nyankopɔnmisu wɔ wʼanim adekyee ne adesae.
88.2: Ma me mpaebɔ nnu wʼanim;brɛ wʼaso ase tie me sufrɛ.
88.3: Ɔhaw ahyɛ me kra mana me nkwa rebɛn owu.
88.4: Wɔkan me fra wɔn a wɔrekɔ ɔda mu no;mete sɛ obi a onni ahoɔden.
88.5: Wɔayi me asi nkyɛn wɔ awufo mu,te sɛ atɔfo a wɔdeda ɔda mu,wɔn a wonkae wɔn bio,na wonhwɛ wɔn bio.
88.6: Woatow me akyene ɔda ase tɔnn,wɔ sum kabii mu.
88.7: Wʼabufuwhyew ayɛ duru wɔ me so;woama wʼasorɔkye nyinaa abu afa me so.
88.8: Woafa me nnamfonom a wɔbɛn me afi me nkyɛnwoama me ho ayɛ wɔn ahi.Woaka me ahyɛ mu na mintumi nguan;
88.9: awerɛhow ama mʼani so ayɛ kusuu.Awurade misu frɛ wo da biara;metrɛw me nsam kyerɛ wo.
88.10: Woyɛ anwonwade kyerɛ awufo ana?Wɔn a wɔawuwu no sɔre kamfo wo ana?
88.11: Wɔka wʼadɔe ho asɛm wɔ ɔda mu,anaasɛ wo nokware ho asɛm wɔ ɔsɛe kurom ana?
88.12: Wohu wʼanwonwade wɔ beae a hɔ aduru sum,anaa wo trenee nnwuma no wɔ awerɛfiri asase so ana?
88.13: Nanso Awurade, misu frɛ wo sɛ boa me;me mpaebɔ du wʼanim adekyee mu.
88.14: Adɛn, Awurade, na wopo mena wode wʼanim hintaw me?
88.15: Mahu amane fi me mmofraase na mabɛn owu;wʼahunahuna ama mabrɛ na mapa abaw.
88.16: Wʼabufuwhyew abu afa me so;wʼahunahuna asɛe me.
88.17: Daa nyinaa wotwa me ho hyia sɛ nsuyiri,na wɔabu afa me so koraa.
88.18: Woafa me yɔnkonom ne mʼadɔfo afi me nkyɛn kɔ;na sum ayɛ mʼadamfo a ɔbɛn me pɛɛ.

89.1: Dwom Esrahini Etan ɔhaw ne amanehunu dwom.Mɛto Awurade adɔe ho dwom daa daa;mede mʼano bɛda wo nokwaredi adi awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu.
89.2: Mɛka se wʼadɔe no tim hɔ daa nyinaa,na woatim wo nokwaredi wɔ ɔsoro hɔ ankasa.
89.3: Wokae se, “Mene onipa a mayi no no ayɛ apam;maka ntam akyerɛ me somfo Dawid.
89.4: ‘Mɛma wʼase atim hɔ daana wʼahengua nso atim wɔ awo ntoantoaso nyinaa mu.’ ”
89.5: Awurade, ɔsorosorofo kamfo wʼanwonwade,na wo nokwaredi nso, wɔkamfo wɔ ahotefo asafo mu.
89.6: Na hena na ɔne wo Awurade sɛ wɔ ɔsoro hɔ?Hena na ɔte sɛ Awurade wɔ ɔsoro abɔde mu?
89.7: Akronkronfo agyinatufo mu, wosuro Onyankopɔn;wɔde osuro kɛse ma Onyankopɔn wɔ akronkronfo nhyiamu ase.
89.8: Asafo Awurade Nyankopɔn, hena na ɔte sɛ wo?Wo, Awurade, woyɛ ɔkɛse na wo nokwaredi atwa wo ho ahyia.
89.9: Wudi po a ɛworo no so;nʼasorɔkye bobɔ kɔ soro a, wobrɛ no ase.
89.10: Wodwerɛw Rahab sɛ atɔfo no mu baako;wode wo basa dennen no bɔɔ wʼatamfo pansamee.
89.11: Ɔsoro wɔ wo, na asase nso wɔ wo;wiase ne nea ɛwɔ mu nyinaa wo na wufii ase.
89.12: Wobɔɔ atifi ne anafo.Tabor ne Hermon de ahosɛpɛw to dwom ma wo din.
89.13: Tumi ayɛ wo basa ma;wo nsam wɔ ahoɔden, woama wo nsa nifa so.
89.14: Wʼahengua no fapem yɛ trenee ne atɛntrenee;adɔe ne nokwaredi di wʼanim.
89.15: Nhyira nka wɔn a wɔasua sɛnea wɔbɔ wo abodin,wɔn a wɔnantew wʼanim hann no mu, Awurade.
89.16: Wogye wɔn ani wɔ wo din mu da mu nyinaa;wodi ahurusi wɔ wo trenee mu.
89.17: Wone wɔn anuonyam ne ahoɔden,na wʼadom nti yɛyɛ nkonimdifo.
89.18: Ampa ara, yɛn kyɛm wɔ Awurade,na yɛn hene wɔ Israel Kronkronni no.
89.19: Da bi wokasaa wɔ anisoadehu mu,kyerɛɛ wʼahotefo se,“Madom ɔkofo bi ahoɔden;mapagyaw aberante bi afi nnipa no mu.
89.20: Mahu Dawid, me somfo;mede me ngo kronkron no asra no.
89.21: Me nsa bɛwowaw no;ampa ara me basa bɛhyɛ no den.
89.22: Ɔtamfo biara renhyɛ no sɛ ontua tow;omumɔyɛfo biara rentumi nhyɛ no so.
89.23: Mɛdwerɛw nʼatamfo wɔ nʼanimna mabobɔ nʼahohiahiafo ahwe fam.
89.24: Me nokware adɔe bɛka ne ho,na me din mu, wɔbɛma nʼabɛn so.
89.25: Mɛtrɛw nʼahye mu akosi po so,na ɔde ne nsa nifa bɛto nsubɔnten so.
89.26: Ɔbɛfrɛ me aka se, ‘Wone mʼagya,me Nyankopɔn, me nkwagye botan.’
89.27: Mɛyɛ no mʼabakan,asase so ahene nyinaa no mu ɔkɛse.
89.28: Mɛma mʼadɔe a mewɔ ma no no atena hɔ daa,na apam a me ne no ayɛ nso bɛtena hɔ daa.
89.29: Mɛma nʼase atim afebɔɔ,nʼahengua nso betim hɔ akosi sɛ ɔsoro betwa mu.
89.30: “Sɛ ne mmabarima po me mmarana sɛ wɔanni mʼahyɛde so,
89.31: sɛ wobu mʼahyɛde sona sɛ wɔanni me hyɛ nsɛm so a,
89.32: ɛno de mede abaa bɛtwe wɔn aso wɔ wɔn bɔne hona wɔn amumɔyɛ nso mede mmaatwa atwe wɔn aso;
89.33: Nanso merennyae mʼadɔe a meyɛ ma no nona mɛkɔ so adi no nokware.
89.34: Meremmu mʼapam no sona merensesa nea mede mʼano aka no.
89.35: Menam me din kronkron no so aka ntam prɛko,na merentwa Dawid atoro da,
89.36: meremma nʼase ntɔre dana nʼahengua nso betim wɔ mʼanim te sɛ owia;
89.37: ebetim hɔ daa te sɛ ɔsram,ɔdanseni nokwafo a ɔwɔ wim no.”
89.38: Nanso woapo no, woapa nʼakyi,wo bo afuw nea woasra no ngo no.
89.39: Woagu apam a wo ne wo somfo pamee no,woagu nʼahenkyɛw ho fi wɔ mfutuma mu.
89.40: Woabubu nʼafasu nyinaaama nʼabandennen adan nnwiriwii.
89.41: Wɔn a wotwa mu wɔ hɔ nyinaa fow no fa;na wayɛ aniwude ama ne mfɛfo.
89.42: Woama nʼatamfo nsa nifa so;ama wɔn nyinaa di ahurusi.
89.43: Woama nʼafoa ayɛ ɔkwa,na woannyina nʼakyi wɔ ɔko mu.
89.44: Wode nʼanuonyam aba awieina woatow nʼahengua akyene fam.
89.45: Woatwa ne mmerantebere nna sona wode animguase nguguso akata no so.
89.46: Awurade, enkosi da bɛn? Na wode wo ho behintaw?Wʼabufuwhyew bɛkɔ so adɛw akosi da bɛn?
89.47: Kae sɛnea me nkwanna twa mu ntɛm so.Efisɛ woabɔ yɛn nyinaa sɛ ade a etwa mu ntɛm so!
89.48: Hena na ɔbɛtena ase a ɔrenwu da?Anaasɛ hena na obetumi agye ne ho afi owu tumi nsam?
89.49: Awurade, ɛhe na wo tete adɔe kɛse no wɔ,nea wufi wo nokwaredi mu de kaa ntam kyerɛɛ Dawid no?
89.50: Kae, Awurade, sɛnea wɔadi wo somfo ho fɛwne sɛnea manya koma ama amanaman no akutiabɔ,
89.51: Awurade, akutiabɔ a wʼatamfo de adi fɛwde adi nea woasra no ngo no anammɔntu biara ho fɛw.

90.1: NHOMA A ƐTO SO ANANNnwom –Dwom Onyankopɔn nipa Mose mpaebɔ.Awurade, wo na woayɛ yɛn tenabeaawo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu.
90.2: Ansa na wɔrebɛbɔ mmepɔwanaasɛ worebɛda asase ne wiase adi no,na woyɛ Onyankopɔn fi mmeresanten kosi mmeresanten.
90.3: Woma adesamma san dan mfutuma,ka se, “Mo adesamma, monsan nkɔ mfutuma mu.”
90.4: Mfirihyia apem yɛ wʼani so sɛda koro a abɛsen mprempren,anaasɛ anadwo mu dɔnhwerew kakraa bi.
90.5: Wopra nnipa kɔ, wɔ owu nna mu;wɔte sɛ sare a afefɛw anɔpa,
90.6: ɛfefɛw yɛ frɔmfrɔm anɔpa de,nanso anwummere ɛwo na etwintwam.
90.7: Yɛresa wɔ wʼabufuw anona wʼanibere abɔ yɛn hu.
90.8: Wode yɛn amumɔyɛ asi wʼanim,na yɛn kokoa mu bɔne da wʼanim hann no mu.
90.9: Yɛn nna nyinaa twa mu wɔ wʼabufuwhyew mu;na yɛde awerɛhowdi na ewie yɛn mfe.
90.10: Yɛn nkwa nna si mfe aduɔson,anaasɛ aduɔwɔtwe, sɛ yɛwɔ ahoɔden a;na mu ahohoahoade yɛ ɔhaw ne awerɛhow,na etwa mu ntɛmntɛm, na yetu kɔ.
90.11: Sɛ anka yebehu sɛ wʼabufuw mu tumi te ɛ!Wʼabufuwhyew kɛse te sɛnea wo ho suro te.
90.12: Ma yenhu yɛn nna kan sɛnea ɛte,na yɛanya nyansa koma.
90.13: Tɔ wo bo ase, Awurade, enkosi da bɛn?Hu wʼasomfo mmɔbɔ.
90.14: Ma wʼadɔe a ɛnsa da no mmee yɛn adekyee mu,na yɛde anigye ato dwom adi ahurusi yɛn nna nyinaa mu.
90.15: Ma yɛn ani nnye nna bebree sɛ nna dodow a wode yɛn kɔɔ amanehunu mu no,sɛ mfirihyia dodow a yehuu ateetee no.
90.16: Ma wʼasomfo nhu wo nneyɛena wɔn mma nhu wʼanuonyam.
90.17: Ma Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn adom no ntena yɛn so;na yɛn nsa ano adwuma nyɛ yiye mma yɛn;yiw, ma yɛn nsa ano adwuma nyɛ yiye.

91.1: Dwom Nea ɔte Ɔsorosoroni no hintabea no biarabɛhome wɔ Otumfo no nwini ase.
91.2: Mese Awurade se, “Ɔyɛ me guankɔbea ne mʼabandennen,me Nyankopɔn a mewɔ no mu ahotoso.”
91.3: Ampa ara, obegye wo afi firisumfo afirine owuyare mu.
91.4: Ɔde ne ntakra bɛkata wo so;na ne ntaban ase na wubenya guankɔbea;ne nokware bɛyɛ wo nkatabo ne wo kyɛm.
91.5: Worensuro ɔdasu mu ɔsɛe,anaa bɛmma a etu awia,
91.6: anaa owuyare a ɛba sum mu,anaa ɔyaredɔm a ɛsɛe ade wɔ owigyinae bere.
91.7: Apem bɛtotɔ wo nkyɛn mu,na mpem du atotɔ wo nifa a,wo de, ɛremmɛn wo.
91.8: Wʼaniwa nko ara na wode bɛhwɛna woahu nnebɔneyɛfo asotwe.
91.9: Sɛ woka se, “Awurade ne me guankɔbea,”na wode Ɔsorosoroni no hɔ yɛ wo tenabea a,
91.10: ɔhaw biara remmunkam wo so,na ɔsɛe biara remmɛn wo ntamadan.
91.11: Efisɛ Onyankopɔn bɛsoma nʼabɔfo abɛbɔ wo ho banna wɔabɛwɛn wo wʼakwan nyinaa mu;
91.12: wɔde wɔn nsa bɛma wo so,na wo nan ampem ɔbo.
91.13: Wubetiatia gyata ne aprammiri so,wobɛnantew gyataforo ne ɔwɔ so.
91.14: Awurade ka se, “Esiane sɛ ɔdɔ me nti, megye no;mɛbɔ ne ho ban, efisɛ ogye me din to mu.
91.15: Ɔbɛfrɛ me na megye ne so;mɛka ne ho wɔ amanehunu mu,megye no na mahyɛ no anuonyam.
91.16: Mɛma nkwa nna a ɛware amee nona makyerɛ no me nkwagye.”

92.1: Dwom Dwom a wɔto no Homeda.Eye sɛ wɔkamfo wo Awuradena wɔto dwom de hyɛ wo anuonyam, Ɔsorosoroni,
92.2: na wɔpae mu ka wʼadɔe anɔpane wo nokware anadwo,
92.3: wɔ hama du sanku sone sankuten nnwom mu.
92.4: Awurade, wo nneyɛe ma mʼani gye;mede anigye to nnwom, wo nsa ano nnwuma nti.
92.5: Awurade, wo nnwuma yɛ akɛse,na wo nyansa mu dɔ!
92.7: amumɔyɛfo benyin sɛ sarena abɔnefo bɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm de,nanso wɔbɛsɛe wɔn pasaa.
92.8: Na wo Awurade, wɔayɛ wo ɔkɛse afebɔɔ.
92.9: Awurade, ampa ara,wʼatamfo bɛyera;na wɔbɛhwete abɔnefo nyinaa.
92.10: Woama me ahoɔden te sɛ ɛko;woahwie ngohuam papa agu me so.
92.11: Mahu mʼatamfo nkogu a wɔadi,mate sɛnea mʼatamfo atirimɔdenfo aguan afi akono.
92.12: Atreneefo bɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm te sɛ abedua,wobenyin sɛ Lebanon sida;
92.13: nea wɔadua wɔ Awurade fi,wobenyin frɔmfrɔm wɔ yɛn Nyankopɔn adiwo hɔ.
92.14: Wɔbɛkɔ so asow aba, onyinkyɛ mu mpo,wɔbɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm sɛ ahabammono,
92.15: de akyerɛ sɛ, “Awurade yɛ ɔtreneeni;ɔyɛ me botan, na atirimɔdensɛm biara nni ne mu.”

93.1: Dwom Awurade di hene, wɔde tumi ahentade ahyɛ no;wɔde tumi ahentade ahyɛ Awuradena wɔde ahoɔden ayɛ nʼakode.Wɔde wiase atim hɔ pintinn;na wɔrentumi ntutu.
93.2: Wʼahengua tim hɔ fi tete;na wowɔ hɔ fi mmeresanten.
93.3: Awurade, po ama wɔn ho so,po ama wɔn nne so;po ama wɔn asorɔkye a ɛbɔ dennen no so.
93.4: Nea ɔwɔ tumi sen nsu akɛse mmubomu,nea ɔwɔ tumi sen po nworoso,Awurade a ɔte ɔsoro no yɛ ɔkɛse.
93.5: Awurade, wo nhyehyɛe gyina hɔ pintinn;kronkronyɛ hyɛ wo fi anuonyamdaa nyinaa.

94.1: Dwom Awurade, Onyankopɔn a wotɔ were,Onyankopɔn a wotɔ were, hyerɛn.
94.2: Sɔre, asase so Temmufo,tua ahantanfo ka sɛnea ɛfata wɔn.
94.3: Awurade, enkosi da bɛn,amumɔyɛfo nnye wɔn ani nkosi da bɛn?
94.4: Wɔkasa ahantan so;ahohoahoa ahyɛ abɔnefo nyinaa ma.
94.5: Awurade, wɔdwerɛw wo nkurɔfo;wɔhyɛ wʼagyapade so.
94.6: Wokunkum akunafo ne ananafo;na wodi ayisaa awu.
94.7: Wɔka se, “Awurade nhu,Yakob Nyankopɔn ayi nʼani.”
94.8: Monhwɛ yiye, mo agyimifo a mowɔ nnipa no mu;nkwaseafo, da bɛn na mubehu nyansa?
94.9: Nea ɔbɔɔ aso no rente asɛm ana?Nea ɔyɛɛ ani no renhu ade ana?
94.10: Nea ɔteɛteɛ aman so no rentwe aso ana?Nea ɔkyerɛkyerɛ onipa no nnim nyansa ana?
94.11: Awurade nim onipa nsusuwii;onim sɛ enkosi hwee.
94.12: Awurade, nhyira ne onipa a woteɛteɛ no so,onipa a wokyerɛ no wo mmara no;
94.13: Woma ɔhome fi amanehunu nna mu,kosi sɛ wobetu amoa ama amumɔyɛfo.
94.14: Awurade rempo ne nkurɔfo;na ɔrennyaw nʼagyapade hɔ da.
94.15: Atemmu begyina treneeyɛ so bio,na wɔn a wɔn koma mu tew nyinaa bedi so.
94.16: Hena na ɔbɛsɔre atia amumɔyɛfo ama me?Hena na ɔbɛsɔre atia abɔnefo ama me?
94.17: Sɛ Awurade ammoa me a,anka mekɔɔ owu kommyɛ mu ntɛm so.
94.18: Bere a mekae se, “Me nan rewatiri” no,Awurade, wo dɔ no soo me mu.
94.19: Bere a me dadwen dɔɔso no,wʼawerɛkyekye maa me kra abotɔyam.
94.20: Ahengua a porɔwee ahyɛ no mma no ne wo wɔ ayɔnkofa ana?Ahengua a ne hyɛ nsɛm de amanehunu na ɛba no?
94.21: Wɔka bɔ mu tia atreneefona wɔn a wodi bem no, wobu wɔn kumfɔ.
94.22: Nanso Awurade yɛ mʼaban;na me Nyankopɔn ayɛ ɔbotan a ne mu na minya ahintawee.
94.23: Obetua wɔn nnebɔne no so kana wɔn amumɔyɛ nti wasɛe wɔn;Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn bɛsɛe wɔn.

95.1: Dwom Mommra mma yɛnto dwom wɔ anigye so mma Awurade;momma yɛmmɔ ose mma yɛn nkwagye Botan no.
95.2: Momma yɛmfa aseda mmra nʼanim,na yɛmfa ahosɛpɛw nnwom mma no so.
95.3: Efisɛ Awurade yɛ Onyankopɔn kɛse,ɔhenkɛse wɔ anyame nyinaa so.
95.4: Ne nsam na asase mu nneɛma nyinaa wɔ,na mmepɔw mpampam wɔ no.
95.5: Po wɔ no, ɔno na ɔbɔe,na ne nsa na ɛnwenee asase kesee no.
95.6: Mommra, mma yɛnkotow nsom no.Momma yemmu nkotodwe wɔ Awurade yɛn Yɛfo no anim!
95.7: Ɔyɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn;yɛyɛ ne didibea nnipa,ne nguankuw a ɔhwɛ wɔn so.Nnɛ, sɛ mote ne nne a,
95.8: mummpirim mo koma sɛnea moyɛɛ wɔ Meriba no,sɛnea moyɛɛ da no wɔ Masa, sare no so no,
95.9: Ɛhɔ no, mo mpanyimfo sɔɔ no hwɛe,a na wonim nea meyɛ maa wɔn.
95.10: Me bo fuw saa nnipa no mfe aduananna mekae se, “Wɔyɛ nnipa a wɔn koma aman afi me ho,na wɔanhu mʼakwan.”
95.11: Ɛno nti mekaa ntam wɔ mʼabufuw mu se,“Wɔrenhyɛn mʼahomegye mu da.”

96.1: Dwom Monto dwom foforo mma Awurade;asase nyinaa monto dwom mma Awurade.
96.2: Monto dwom mma Awurade, monkamfo ne din;mompae mu nka ne nkwagye no daa daa.
96.3: Monka nʼanuonyam wɔ amanaman mu,monka nʼanwonwade a wayɛ wɔ nnipa mu.
96.4: Awurade yɛ ɔkɛse na nkamfo fata no;ɛsɛ sɛ wosuro no sen anyame nyinaa.
96.5: Aman so anyame nyinaa yɛ ahoni bi kwa,nanso Awurade na ɔbɔɔ ɔsoro.
96.6: Anuonyam ne kɛseyɛ wɔ nʼanim;ahoɔden ne anuonyam wɔ ne kronkronbea hɔ.
96.7: Momfa mma Awurade, amanaman mmusuakuw,momfa anuonyam ne tumi mma Awurade.
96.8: Momfa anuonyam ne din a ɛfata mma Awurade;momfa afɔrebɔde nhyɛn nʼadiwo hɔ.
96.9: Monsɔre Awurade wɔ ne kronkronyɛ fɛfɛ mu;asase nyinaa momma mo ho mpopo wɔ nʼanim.
96.10: Monka nkyerɛ aman nyinaa se, “Awurade di hene.”Wɔabɔ asase atim hɔ pintinn, wɔrentumi ntutu;ɔde pɛpɛyɛ bebu nnipa atɛn.
96.11: Momma ɔsorosoro ani nnye, na asase nni ahurusi;momma po ne mu nneɛma nyinaa nworo;
96.12: Momma mfuw ne so nneɛma nyinaa mmɔ ose;momma kwae mu nnua nyinaa mfa ahosɛpɛw nto nnwom.
96.13: Momma abɔde nyinaa nni ahurusi wɔ Awurade anim, efisɛ ɔreba,ɔreba abebu asase no atɛn.Ɔde trenee bebu wiase atɛnna woabu nnipa nso atɛn wɔ ne nokware mu.

97.1: Dwom Awurade di hene, ma asase ani nnye;ma akyirikyiri mpoano ahorow no nsɛpɛw wɔn ho.
97.2: Omununkum ne sum kabii atwa no ho ahyia;trenee ne atɛntrenee yɛ nʼahengua no fapem.
97.3: Ogya di nʼanimna ɛhyew nʼatamfo wɔ afanan nyinaa.
97.4: Nʼanyinam hyerɛn wiase;asase hu na ne ho popo.
97.5: Mmepɔw nan sɛ nku wɔ Awurade anim,Awurade a asase nyinaa wɔ no no anim.
97.6: Ɔsoro pae mu ka ne trenee kyerɛna aman nyinaa hu nʼanuonyam.
97.7: Ahonisomfo nyinaa anim agu ase,wɔn a wɔde abosomhuhuw hoahoa wɔn ho no,anyame nyinaa monsɔre no.
97.8: Sion te, na ne ho sɛpɛw nona Yuda nkuraa ani gyeAwurade, esiane wʼatɛntrenee nti.
97.9: Wo, Awurade ne Ɔsorosoroni wɔ asase so nyinaa;wɔama wo so pa ara wɔ anyame nyinaa mu.
97.10: Ma wɔn a wɔdɔ Awurade no nkyi bɔne,ɔbɔ ne nkurɔfo a wɔyɛ nokwafo no ho banna ogye wɔn fi amumɔyɛfo nsam.
97.11: Hann hyerɛn wɔ atreneefo sona anigye ba wɔn a wɔn koma mu tew no so.
97.12: Momma mo ani nnye Awurade mu, mo a moyɛ atreneefo,na monkamfo ne din kronkron no.

98.1: Dwom Dwom.Monto dwom foforo mma Awurade,efisɛ wayɛ anwonwade bebree;ne nsa nifa ne ne basa kronkron noanya nkwagye ama no.
98.2: Awurade ama wɔahu ne nkwagyena wada ne trenee adi akyerɛ amanaman no.
98.3: Wakae nʼadɔene ne nokware a odi kyerɛɛ Israelfo no;asase ano nyinaa ahuyɛn Nyankopɔn nkwagye.
98.4: Asase nyinaa mommɔ ose mma Awurade,momfa nnwonto nni ahurusi;
98.5: Momfa sanku nto dwom mma Awurade,sanku ne nnwonto nnyigyei,
98.6: momfa torobɛnto ne adwennini mmɛn,nteɛ mu ahosɛpɛw so wɔ Awurade, yɛn hene no anim.
98.7: Momma po ne abɔde a ɛwɔ mu nyinaa nhuru so;asase ne wɔn a wɔte so nyinaa.
98.8: Momma nsubɔnten mmɔ wɔn nsam,mmepɔw nka mmom nto ahurusi nnwom;
98.9: ma wɔnto nnwom wɔ Awurade anim,efisɛ ɔreba abebu wiase atɛn.Ɔde trenee bebu wiase atɛnna ɔde pɛpɛyɛ abu nnipa atɛn.

99.1: Dwom Awurade di hene,momma amanaman no ho mpopo;ɔte nʼahengua so wɔ kerubim ntam,ma asase nwosow.
99.2: Awurade a ɔwɔ Sion yɛ ɔkɛse;wɔama no so wɔ amanaman nyinaa mu.
99.3: Ma wɔnkamfo wo din a ɛso na ɛyɛ nwonwa no,ɔyɛ ɔkronkron.
99.4: Ɔhene no yɛ ɔkɛse, ɔdɔ atɛntrenee,woama pɛpɛyɛ atim;wayɛ nea eye na ɛteɛwɔ Yakob mu.
99.5: Momma Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn sona monsɔre no wɔ ne nan ntiaso anim;ɔyɛ ɔkronkron.
99.6: Na Mose ne Aaron ka nʼasɔfo no ho,na Samuel ka wɔn a wɔbɔɔ ne din no ho;wɔfrɛɛ Awurade,na ogyee wɔn so.
99.7: Ofi omununkum dum mu kasa kyerɛɛ wɔn;wodii mmara ne ahyɛde a ɔmaa wɔn no so.
99.8: Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn,wugyee wɔn so;woyɛɛ bɔnefakyɛ Nyankopɔn maa Israel,nanso wotwee wɔn aso wɔ wɔn nnebɔne ho.
99.9: Momma Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn sona monsɔre no wɔ ne bepɔw kronkron no so,na Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn yɛ ɔkronkron.

100.1: Dwom Ayeyi Dwom.Mommɔ ose mma Awurade, asase nyinaa.
100.2: Momfa ahosɛpɛw nsom Awurade;momfa anigye nnwom mmra nʼanim.
100.3: Munhu sɛ Awurade yɛ Onyankopɔn;ɔno na ɔyɛɛ yɛn, na yɛyɛ ne de;yɛyɛ ne nkurɔfo ne ne didibea nguan.
100.4: Momfa aseda nhyɛn nʼapon mu,na momfa nkamfo nkɔ nʼadiwo;momfa aseda mma no, na monkamfo ne din.
100.5: Awurade ye; na nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa;ne nokwaredi kodu awo ntoatoaso nyinaa so.

101.1: Dwom Dawid Dwom.Mɛto wo dɔ ne wo trenee ho nnwom;Awurade, mɛto ayeyi nnwom ama wo.
101.2: Mɛhwɛ yiye abu ɔbra a ho tew;da bɛn na wobɛba me nkyɛn?Mede koma a afɔdi nni mubɛhwɛ me fi so.
101.3: Merennye ade a ɛyɛ tanbiara nto mu.Mikyi nnipa a wonni gyidi nneyɛe;meremfa me ho mmata ho.
101.4: Nnipa a wɔn koma yɛ kɔntɔnkye remmɛn me;me ne bɔne nni hwee yɛ.
101.5: Obiara a odi ne yɔnko ho nseku wɔ kokoa mu no,ɔno na mɛsɛe;nea ɔwɔ ahantan ani ne ahomaso koma,ɔno na merennyigye no so.
101.6: Mʼani bɛkɔ anokwafo a wɔwɔ asase no so no sona me ne wɔn atena;nea ne nantew ho nni asɛm noɔno na ɔbɛsom me.
101.7: Nea ɔyɛ ɔdaadaafo biararentena me fi;nea otwa nkontompo norennyina mʼanim.
101.8: Adekyee biara,mɛsɛe amumɔyɛfo a wɔwɔ asase yi so nyinaa;na mapam ɔdebɔneyɛni biaraafi Awurade kuropɔn mu.

102.1: Dwom Aberante mmɔborɔni mpaebɔ. Osu kyerɛ Awurade bere a ɔwɔ ahohia mu.Awurade, tie me mpaebɔ;na ma me mmoa ho sufrɛ nnu wʼanim.
102.2: Mmfa wʼanim nhintaw mebere a mewɔ ahohia mu.Brɛ wʼaso ase ma me;na sɛ misu frɛ wo a, gye me so ntɛm.
102.3: Me nkwanna reyera te sɛ wusiw;me nnompe adɔ sɛ nyansramma.
102.4: Me koma abotow na akisa sɛ sare;na me kɔn nnɔ aduan.
102.5: Mʼapinisi dennen ntimaka ɔhonam ne nnompe.
102.6: Mete sɛ sare so patu,te sɛ patu a ɔte nnwiriwii mu.
102.7: Meda hɔ a, mʼani gu so; mayɛ sɛanomaa bi a ɔno nko ara si ɔdan atifi.
102.8: Da mu nyinaa mʼatamfo bɔ me akutia.Wɔn a wodi me ho fɛw no bɔ me din de dome.
102.9: Mede nsõ ayɛ mʼaduanna mede nusu fra me nsu mu
102.10: esiane wʼabufuwhyew dennen no nti,woama me so, ayi me asi nkyɛn.
102.11: Me nkwa nna te sɛ anwummere sunsuma;na mehyew sɛ sare.
102.12: Nanso wo Awurade, woyɛ ɔhene daa daa;na wo din a ahyeta no te hɔ daa awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu.
102.13: Wobɛsɔre na woahu Sion mmɔbɔ;bere adu sɛ wuhu no mmɔbɔ;bere a wohyɛe no aso.
102.14: Nʼabo som bo ma wʼasomfo;ne mfutuma hyɛ wɔn awerɛhow.
102.15: Amanaman no besuro Awurade din;asase so ahemfo nyinaa bedi wʼanuonyam ni.
102.16: Awurade bɛkyekyere Sion bio,na wapue wɔ nʼanuonyam mu.
102.17: Obetie mmɔborɔfo mpaebɔ;na ɔremmu nʼani ngu wɔn sufrɛ so.
102.18: Monkyerɛw eyi mma nkyirimma,sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wɔn a wonnya nwoo wɔn no bɛkamfo Awurade;
102.19: “Awurade hwɛɛ fam fi ne kronkronbea wɔ ɔsoro hɔ;ofi ɔsoro hwɛɛ asase,
102.20: sɛnea ɔbɛte nneduafo apinisi,na wɔagyaa wɔn a wɔabu wɔn kumfɔ no.”
102.21: Enti wɔbɛpae mu abɔ Awurade din wɔ Sionna wɔakamfo no wɔ Yerusalem,
102.22: bere a amanaman ne ahenni ahorowbehyia mu na wɔasom Awurade.
102.23: Ɔmaa me yɛɛ mmerɛw wɔ bere a merenyin.Otwaa me nkwa nna so.
102.24: Enti mekae se,“Me Onyankopɔn, mfa me nkɔ, wɔ me nkwa nna mfimfini;wo mfe wɔ hɔ daa kodu awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu.
102.25: Mfiase no wotoo asase fapem,na ɔsoro yɛ wo nsa ano adwuma.
102.26: Ne nyinaa betwa mu na wo de, wobɛtena hɔ daa;wɔbɛtetew te sɛ atade.Wobɛsesa wɔn te sɛ ntama,na wɔbɛtow wɔn agu.
102.27: Nanso wote sɛnea wote,na wo mfe to rentwa da.
102.28: Wʼasomfo mma bɛtena nkwa mu wɔ wʼanim;na wɔn asefo ase betim wɔ wʼanim.”

103.1: Dwom Dawid de.Me kra, kamfo Awurade;na me mu ade nyinaa nkamfo ne din kronkron no.
103.2: Me kra, kamfo Awurade,na mma wo werɛ mmfi ne nneyɛe pa nyinaa,
103.3: ɔno na ɔde wo mfomso nyinaa kyɛ wona ɔsa wo nyarewa nyinaa,
103.4: ogye wo nkwa fi ɔda mu,na ɔde adɔe ne mmɔborɔhunu bɔ wo abotiri,
103.5: ɔde nnepa ma wo sɛ wʼapɛde,na wo mmerantebere yɛ foforo sɛ ɔkɔre.
103.6: Awurade yɛ adetrenee,na obu wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so nyinaa atɛntrenee.
103.7: Ɔkyerɛɛ Mose nʼakwan,na ɔmaa Israelfo huu ne nneyɛe.
103.8: Mmɔborɔhunufo ne ɔdomfo ne Awurade,ne bo kyɛ fuw na nʼadɔe dɔɔso.
103.9: Ɔrenkɔ so mmɔ sobo,na ɔrennya yɛn ho menasepɔw nkosi daa;
103.10: Ɔnhwɛ yɛn bɔne ne yɛn nni sɛnea ɛfatana ontua yɛn nnebɔne so ka sɛnea ɛte.
103.11: Na sɛnea ɔsoro ne asase ntam ware no,saa ara na nʼadɔe so wɔ wɔn a wosuro no no so.
103.12: Sɛnea apuei ne atɔe ntam ware no,saa ara na wama yɛn ne yɛn mmarato ntam kwan aware.
103.13: Sɛnea agya yam hyehyew no wɔ ne mma ho no,saa ara na Awurade yam hyehye no ma wɔn a wosuro no no;
103.14: na onim sɛnea wɔyɛɛ yɛn,ɔkae se yɛyɛ mfutuma.
103.15: Ɔdesani de, ne nna te sɛ sare,ɔyɛ frɔmfrɔm sɛ nwura mu nhwiren;
103.16: sɛ mframa bɔ fa ne so a, na onni hɔ,na ne sibea nkae no bio.
103.17: Nanso efi mmeresanten kosi nnasantenAwurade adɔe wɔ wɔn a wosuro no so,na ne trenee wɔ wɔn mma mma so,
103.18: wɔn a wodi nʼapam no sona wɔkae di ne mmara so.
103.19: Awurade asi nʼahengua wɔ ɔsoro,na nʼahenni di ade nyinaa so.
103.20: Monkamfo Awurade, mo a moyɛ nʼabɔfo,mo atumfo a moyɛ nʼahyɛde,mo a mutie nʼasɛm.
103.21: Monkamfo Awurade, ɔsoro asafo nyinaa,nʼasomfo a moyɛ nʼapɛde.
103.22: Monkamfo Awurade, ne nnwuma nyinaa;nea ɛwɔ nʼahenni mu nyinaa.Me kra, kamfo Awurade!

104.1: Dwom Me kra, kamfo Awurade!Awurade me Nyankopɔn, woyɛ ɔkɛse!Wɔafura wo tumi ne anuonyam.
104.2: Ɔde hann akata ne ho sɛ atade;ɔtrɛw ɔsoro mu te sɛ ntamadan,
104.3: na ɔde ne mpia mu mpuran sisi nsu so.Ɔde omununkum yɛ ne teaseɛnamna ɔde nantew mframa ntaban so.
104.4: Ɔsoma nʼabɔfo sɛ mframa,na ɔsoma nʼasomfo sɛ ogyaframa.
104.5: Ɔde asase asi ne fapem sona ɛrenhinhim da.
104.6: Wode bun kataa so sɛ atadena nsu gyinaa mmepɔw no so.
104.7: Nanso wʼanimka maa nsu no guanee,wʼaprannaa nnyigyei maa woguanee;
104.8: Wɔsen faa mmepɔw so,kɔɔ aku mu tɔnn,koguu faako a wode ama wɔn no.
104.9: Wotoo ɔhye a wɔrentumi ntra;na wɔammɛkata asase so bio.
104.10: Ɔma nsuwa sen fa abon mu,ɛsen fa mmepɔw ntam.
104.11: Wɔma wuram mmoa nyinaa nsu nom;atorɔm de kum wɔn sukɔm.
104.12: Wim nnomaa nwen wɔn berebuw wɔ nsu no ho;na wɔto nnwom wɔ nnua no mman so.
104.13: Ofi ne soro mpia mu tɔ nsu gugu mmepɔw so;ne nnwuma so aba mee asase.
104.14: Ɔma sare fifi ma anantwi,na ɔbɔɔ nnua maa onipa sɛ onnuana ɛmma aduan mfi asase mu:
104.15: nsa a ɛma onipa koma tɔ ne yam,ngo a ɛma onipa anim tɔ so,ne aduan a ekura onipa koma.
104.16: Wogugu Awurade nnua no so yiye,Lebanon sida a oduae no.
104.17: Ɛsow na nnomaa yɛ wɔn mmerebuw,na asukɔnkɔn nso yɛ nʼatenae wɔ ɔpepaw nnua no mu.
104.18: Mmepɔw atenten no yɛ wuram mmirekyi de;na abotan yɛ guankɔbea ma ewi.
104.19: Ɔsram kyerɛ bere nkyekyɛmu,na owia nim bere a ɔkɔtɔ.
104.20: Wode sum ba ma ɛyɛ adesaena kwae mu mmoa nyinaa kɔ ahayɛ.
104.21: Gyata bobɔ mu pɛ wɔn hanam,wɔhwehwɛ wɔn aduan fi Onyankopɔn hɔ.
104.22: Owia pue ma wɔsan wɔn akyi;wɔsan kɔdeda wɔn atu mu.
104.23: Afei, onipa kɔ nʼadwuma sokɔyɛ adwuma ara kosi anwummere.
104.24: Awurade, wo nnwuma dɔɔso!Nyansa mu na woyɛɛ ne nyinaa;wʼabɔde ahyɛ asase so ma.
104.25: Po na ɛda hɔ tɛtrɛɛ tamaa yi,a abɔde bebree a enni ano;akɛse ne nketewa ahyɛ no ma.
104.26: So na ahyɛn di akɔneaba,na ɔdɛnkyɛmmirampɔn a woyɛɛ no di agoru.
104.27: Wɔn nyinaa hwɛ wo kwansɛ wobɛma wɔn wɔn aduan wɔ bere a ɛsɛ mu.
104.28: Wode ma wɔn a, wɔtase;wubue wo nsam a nnepa mee wɔn.
104.29: Wode wʼanim hintaw wɔn a,wɔbɔ hu;sɛ wugye wɔn home a,wowuwu na wɔsan kɔ mfutuma mu.
104.30: Sɛ wode wo Honhom no ma wɔn ana wɔabɔ wɔn,na woyɛ asase ani foforo.
104.31: Ma Awurade anuonyam ntena hɔ daa;ma Awurade ani nnye ne nnwuma ho,
104.32: nea ɔhwɛ asase na ɛwosow,na ɔde ne nsa ka mmepɔw a wusiw fi mu ba.
104.33: Mɛto dwom ama Awurade me nkwa nna nyinaa;sɛ mete ase yi, mɛto ayeyi dwom ama me Nyankopɔn.
104.34: Ɔmma me mpaebɔ nsɔ nʼanibere a meregye mʼani wɔ Awurade mu yi.
104.35: Ma nnebɔneyɛfo nyera wɔ asase so;na amumɔyɛfo ase nhyew.Me kra, kamfo Awurade.Kamfo Awurade.

105.1: Dwom Da Awurade ase na da ne kɛseyɛ adi.Ma wiase nyinaa nhu nea wayɛ.
105.2: Monto dwom mma no, monto ayeyi dwom mma no;monka nʼanwonwade no nyinaa.
105.3: Monhoahoa mo ho wɔ ne din kronkron mu;momma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ Awurade no nnya koma mu anigye.
105.4: Momma mo ani nna Awurade ne nʼahoɔden no so;na monhwehwɛ nʼanim bere biara.
105.5: Monkae anwonwade a wayɛne nsɛnkyerɛnne, ne atɛn a obui,
105.6: Abraham mma, Onyankopɔn asomfo,Yakob mma a wapaw wɔn.
105.7: Ɔyɛ Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔn.Nʼahenni da adi wɔ asase so nyinaa.
105.8: Ɔkae nʼapam daa nyinaa,asɛm a ɔhyɛ maa awo ntoantoaso apem no,
105.9: apam a ɔne Abraham yɛe no,ntam a ɔka kyerɛɛ Isak no.
105.10: Ɔhyɛɛ mu den maa Yakob sɛ mmara,de maa Israel sɛ apam a ɛbɛtena hɔ afebɔɔ.
105.11: Ɔkae se, “Mede Kanaan asase no bɛma wosɛ kyɛfa a ɛbɛyɛ wʼagyapade.”
105.12: Ɔkaa eyi bere a na wɔnnɔɔso,ahɔhokuw ketewa bi a wɔwɔ Kanaan.
105.13: Wofii aman so kɔɔ aman so;fii ahemman mu kɔɔ ahemman mu.
105.14: Wamma obi anhyɛ wɔn so;wɔn nti, ɔkaa ahene anim se:
105.15: “Mommfa mo nsa nka wɔn a masra wɔn ngo;na monnyɛ mʼadiyifo bɔne bi.”
105.16: Ɔmaa ɔkɔm baa asase no sona ɔsɛee akwan a wɔfa so nya wɔn aduan nyinaa;
105.17: na ɔsomaa ɔbarima bi dii wɔn anim,Yosef a wɔtɔn no sɛ akoa no.
105.18: Wɔde mpokyerɛ guu ne nʼanan,na wɔde dade nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn hyɛɛ ne kɔn,
105.19: kosii sɛ nea ɔhyɛɛ ho nkɔm no baa mu,kosii sɛ Awurade asɛm no daa no adi sɛ ɔyɛ ɔnokwafo.
105.20: Ɔhene no soma ma wokoyii no;aman no sodifo gyaa no.
105.21: Ɔyɛɛ no ne fi so wuranea ɔwɔ nyinaa sodifo,
105.22: sɛ ɔnkyerɛ ne mmapɔmma nea ɔpɛna ɔnkyerɛ ne mpanyimfo nyansa.
105.23: Na Israel kɔɔ Misraim;Yakob kɔtenaa Ham asase so sɛ ɔnanani.
105.24: Awurade maa ne nkurɔfo ase dɔe;ɔyɛɛ wɔn bebree dodo maa wɔn atamfo,
105.25: wɔn a ɔdan wɔn koma sɛ wɔntan ne nkurɔfona wɔmpam nʼasomfo ti so.
105.26: Ɔsomaa ne somfo Mose,ne Aaron a na wayi no no.
105.27: Wɔyɛɛ ne nsɛnkyerɛnne nwonwaso wɔ wɔn mu,nʼanwonwade wɔ Ham asase so.
105.28: Ɔsomaa sum, na ɔmaa asase duruu sum,efisɛ na wɔatew nʼasɛm no so atua.
105.29: Ɔmaa wɔn nsu nyinaa dan mogya,nam so kum mu mpataa.
105.30: Mpɔtorɔ bɛhyɛɛ asase no so ma,na wɔhyɛn ɔman no sodifo mpia mu.
105.31: Ɔkasae, na nwansena bebreene ntontom baa ɔman no mu baabiara.
105.32: Ɔmaa wɔn osu dan mparuwboa anyinam nenam mu wɔ ɔman no nyinaa mu;
105.33: Ɔsɛee wɔn bobe ne borɔdɔma nnuana obubuu ɔman no so nnua pasaa.
105.34: Ɔkasae, na mmoadabi bae,tɛwtɛw a wontumi nkan wɔn;
105.35: wɔwee ahabammono biara a ɛwɔ wɔn asase no so,na wodii wɔn mfuw so nnuan.
105.36: Afei okunkum wɔn asase so mmakan nyinaa,wɔn mmarimayɛ mu aba a edi kan nyinaa.
105.37: Oyii Israel a ɔso dwetɛ ne sikakɔkɔɔfii wɔn mmusuakuw mu a obiara ho antɔ kyima.
105.38: Misraim ani gyei, bere a wɔkɔe,efisɛ na Israelfo ho hu atɔ wɔn so.
105.39: Ɔtrɛw omununkum mu kataa wɔn so,na ogya maa wɔn hann anadwo.
105.40: Wobisae, na ɔbrɛɛ wɔn mparuwboɔmaa ɔsoro aduan mee wɔn.
105.41: Obuee ɔbotan mu maa nsu fii mu bae;na ɛsen faa sare no so sɛ asubɔnten.
105.42: Ɔkaee ne bɔ kronkron bi aɔhyɛɛ ne somfo Abraham no.
105.43: Oyii ne nkurɔfo maa wɔn ani gyei;wɔn a wapaw wɔn no dii ahurusi;
105.44: ɔde amanaman no nsase maa wɔn,na nea ebinom abrɛ anya no bɛyɛɛ wɔn agyapade
105.45: na wɔahwɛ nʼahyɛdeadi ne mmara so.Munyi Awurade ayɛ.

106.1: Dwom Monkamfo Awurade!Monna Awurade ase na oye;na nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
106.2: Hena na obetumi aka nneɛma akɛse a Awurade ayɛ?Anaasɛ obetumi aka ne nkamfo awie?
106.3: Nhyira nka wɔn a wɔkɔ so bu atɛntrenee,na daa wɔyɛ nea eye.
106.4: Awurade, sɛ wuhu wo nkurɔfo mmɔbɔ a kae me,sɛ wugye wɔn nkwa a, boa me,
106.5: na manya wɔn a wapaw wɔn no yiyedi mu kyɛfa,na manya wo manfo anigye no mu kyɛfa,na me ne wʼagyapade no abɔ mu de nkamfo ama wo.
106.6: Yɛayɛ bɔne sɛnea yɛn nenanom yɛe no;yɛayɛ mfomso na yɛadi atirimɔdensɛm.
106.7: Bere a yɛn nenanom wɔ Misraim no,wɔannwene wo nsɛnkyerɛnne ho;wɔankae wʼadɔe bebrebe no,na wɔtew atua wɔ Po Kɔkɔɔ no ho.
106.8: Nanso ne din nti ogyee wɔn nkwa,sɛnea ɔbɛda ne tumi kɛse no adi.
106.9: Ɔteɛɛ Po Kɔkɔɔ no ma ɛyowee;ɔde wɔn faa bun mu te sɛ sare so.
106.10: Ogyee wɔn fii ɔtamfo no nsam;nea ɔtan wɔn no nsam na oyii wɔn fii.
106.11: Nsu kataa wɔn atamfo so;na ɔbaako mpo annya nkwa.
106.12: Afei wogyee ne bɔhyɛ no diina wɔtoo nʼayeyi nnwom.
106.13: Nanso ntɛm so, wɔn werɛ fii nea wayɛna wɔantwɛn nʼagyinatu.
106.14: Akɔnnɔ bɛhyɛɛ wɔn mu wɔ sare so hɔ,asase paradada no so na wɔsɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛe,
106.15: enti ɔmaa wɔn nea wobisae,nanso ɔde ɔfɔn yare baa wɔn so.
106.16: Na nsraban mu hɔ wɔn ani beree Mosene Aaron a Awurade atew ne ho no.
106.17: Asase mu bue ma ɛmenee Datanna esiee Abiram asafo no.
106.18: Ogya tɔɔ wɔn akyidifo no mu;ogyatannaa hyew amumɔyɛfo no.
106.19: Wɔyɛɛ nantwi ba wɔ Horebna wɔkotow ohoni a wɔde fagude ayɛ.
106.20: Wɔsesaa wɔn Anuonyamwɔde nantwinini, a ɔwe sare nsɛsode.
106.21: Wɔn werɛ fii Onyankopɔn a ogyee wɔn nkwa,nea ɔyɛɛ nneɛma akɛse wɔ Misraim no,
106.22: nsɛnkyerɛnne a ɔyɛɛ wɔ Ham asase sone nneɛma a ɛyɛ hu wɔ Po Kɔkɔɔ ho no.
106.23: Enti ɔkae se ɔbɛsɛe wɔn,nanso Mose a ɔyɛ nea wapaw no no,sɔre gyinaa Onyankopɔn ne nnipa no ntam;ɔsrɛ de dwudwoo nʼabufuwhyew no ano sɛnea ɔrensɛe wɔn.
106.24: Afei wɔn ani ansɔ asase fɛfɛ no;na wɔannye ne bɔhyɛ no anni.
106.25: Wonwiinwii wɔ wɔn ntamadan muna wɔanyɛ osetie amma Awurade.
106.26: Enti ɔmaa ne nsa so kaa ntam kyerɛɛ wɔn seɔbɛma wɔatotɔ wɔ sare no so,
106.27: ɔbɛma wɔn asefo atotɔ wɔ amanaman muna wabɔ wɔn ahwete nsase nyinaa so.
106.28: Wɔde wɔn ho bɔɔ Baal-Peor hona wodii afɔrebɔde a wɔde ama anyame a wonni nkwa;
106.29: wɔde wɔn atirimɔdensɛm hyɛɛ Awurade abufuwna ɔyaredɔm sii wɔn mu.
106.30: Na Pinehas sɔre dii akagyinamu,na wosiw ɔyaredɔm no ano.
106.31: Wɔde eyi yɛɛ trenee maa nowɔ awo ntoatoaso a enni awiei a ɛbɛba no mu.
106.32: Meriba nsu ho nso, wɔhyɛɛ Awurade abufuw,na wɔn nti, ɔhaw baa Mose so,
106.33: efisɛ wɔtew Onyankopɔn Honhom anim atua,na asɛm a wannwene ho fii Mose anom.
106.34: Wɔansɛe nnipa nosɛnea Awurade hyɛɛ wɔn no,
106.35: nanso wɔde wɔn ho frafraa amanaman noyɛɛ nneɛma a wɔyɛ no bi.
106.36: Wɔsom wɔn ahoni,na ɛbɛyɛɛ afide maa wɔn.
106.37: Wɔde wɔn mmabarimane wɔn mmabea bɔɔ afɔre maa abosom.
106.38: Wɔkaa mogya a edi bem gui,wɔn mmabarima ne wɔn mmabea mogya awɔde bɔɔ afɔre maa Kanaan ahoni nomaa asase no ho guu fi.
106.39: Wɔde nea wɔyɛɛ no guu wɔn ankasa ho fi;wɔnam nea wɔyɛɛ no so bɔɔ aguaman.
106.40: Enti Awurade bo fuw ne nkurɔfo;na okyii nʼagyapade.
106.41: Ɔdan wɔn maa amanaman no,na wɔn atamfo dii wɔn so.
106.42: Wɔn atamfo hyɛɛ wɔn sona wɔkaa wɔn hyɛɛ wɔn tumi ase.
106.43: Mpɛn bebree, Awurade gyee wɔn,nanso wɔkɔɔ so tew atuana wɔsɛe wɔ wɔn bɔne mu.
106.44: Nanso ohuu wɔn ahohiahiabere a wosu frɛɛ no no.
106.45: Wɔn nti ɔkaee nʼapam no,na ofii nʼadɔe kɛse no mu huu wɔn mmɔbɔ.
106.46: Ɔmaa asodifo a wɔafa wɔn nnommum nonyaa ahummɔbɔ maa wɔn.
106.47: Gye yɛn, Awurade yɛn nkwagye Nyankopɔn,na boaboa yɛn ano fi amanaman so,na yɛada wo din kronkron no ase,na yɛde nkamfo ahyɛ wo anuonyam.
106.48: Ayeyi nka Awurade, Israel Nyankopɔn,emfi mmeresanten nkosi nnasanten.Momma nnipa no nyinaa nka se, “Amen!”Monkamfo Awurade.

107.1: NHOMA A ƐTO SO ANUMNnwom –Dwom Monna Awurade ase na oye;na nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
107.2: Momma wɔn a Awurade agye wɔn nka saa,wɔn a wagye wɔn afi ɔtamfo nsam no;
107.3: wɔn a ɔboaboaa wɔn ano fii nsase so no,efi apuei kosi atɔe, atifi kosi anafo.
107.4: Ebinom kyinkyinii wɔ nsase pradada so,a wɔanhu ɔkwan ankɔ kuropɔn no mu, faako a wobetumi anya atenae.
107.5: Ɔkɔm ne osukɔm dee wɔnna wɔtotɔɔ beraw.
107.6: Afei wosu frɛɛ Awurade wɔ wɔn amanehunu mu,na ogyee wɔn fii wɔn ahohiahia mu.
107.7: Ɔde wɔn faa ɔkwan tee sobaa kuropɔn a wotumi tena mu no mu.
107.8: Momma wɔnna Awurade ase, nʼadɔe a ɛnsa dane nʼanwonwade a ɔyɛ ma nnipa no ho,
107.9: ɔma wɔn a osukɔm de wɔn nsuna ɔde nnepa hyɛ wɔn a ɔkɔm de wɔn ma.
107.10: Ebinom tenaa sum ne awerɛhow mu,nneduafo a wɔde dade nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn agu wɔn,
107.11: efisɛ wɔatew Onyankopɔn nsɛm ho atuana wɔabu Ɔsorosoroni no agyinatu animtiaa.
107.12: Enti ogyaa wɔn maa adwumaden;wohintihintiwii, na wɔannya ɔboafo.
107.13: Afei wosu frɛɛ Awurade wɔ wɔn amanehunu mu,na ogyee wɔn fii wɔn ahohia mu.
107.14: Oyii wɔn fii sum ne awerɛhow mu,na obubuu wɔn nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn mu.
107.15: Momma wɔnna Awurade ase, nʼadɔe a ɛnsa dane nʼanwonwade a ɔyɛ ma nnipa no ho,
107.16: efisɛ obubu kɔbere mfrafra aponna otwitwa nnadeban mu.
107.17: Ebinom bɛyɛɛ nkwaseafo, wɔn atuatew nti,na wohuu amane, wɔn nnebɔne nti.
107.18: Wokyii aduan nyinaana wotwiw bɛnee owu pon ano.
107.19: Afei wosu frɛɛ Awurade, wɔn amanehunu muna ogyee wɔn fii wɔn ahohia mu.
107.20: Ɔsomaa nʼasɛm na ɔsaa wɔn yare;na ogyee wɔn fii ɔda mu.
107.21: Momma wɔnna Awurade ase, nʼadɔe a ɛnsa dane nʼanwonwade a ɔyɛ ma nnipa no ho.
107.22: Momma wɔmmɔ aseda afɔrena wɔmfa ahurusi nnwom nka ne nnwuma ho asɛm.
107.23: Ebinom tenaa ahyɛn mu wɔ po so;wɔyɛ aguadifo wɔ nsu akɛse so.
107.24: Wohuu Awurade nnwuma,nʼanwonwade a ɛwɔ bun mu.
107.25: Ɔkasa maa ahum tuina ekukuru asorɔkye.
107.26: Wokukuru kɔɔ ɔsorosoro na wosian kɔɔ bun mu tɔnn;wɔn amanehunu mu no wɔn koma tui.
107.27: Wokyim totɔɔ ntintan sɛ asabowfo;na wonhu nea wɔnnyɛ bio.
107.28: Afei wosu frɛɛ Awurade, wɔn amanehunu mu,na ogyee wɔn fii wɔn ahohia mu.
107.29: Ɔmaa ahum no yɛɛ dinn;po so asorɔkye ano brɛɛ ase.
107.30: Wɔn ani gyei, bere a ɛyɛɛ dinn no,na ɔkyerɛɛ wɔn ɔkwan de wɔn koduu gyinabea a wɔpɛ.
107.31: Momma wɔnna Awurade ase, nʼadɔe a ɛnsa dane nʼanwonwade a ɔyɛ ma nnipa no ho.
107.32: Wɔmma no so wɔ asafo no muna wɔnkamfo no wɔ mpanyimfo nhyiamu ase.
107.33: Ɔdan nsubɔnten maa no yɛɛ sare,asuten yɛɛ asase wosee,
107.34: na asasebere dan nkyenenkyene,wɔn a wɔte asase no so amumɔyɛ nti.
107.35: Ɔdan sare so maa no yɛɛ nsuwansuwana nkyɛkyerɛ yɛɛ sɛ nsuten anan mu;
107.36: Ɛhɔ na ɔde wɔn a ɔkɔm de wɔn kɔsoɛe,na wɔkyekyeree kuropɔn tenaa mu.
107.37: Wɔyɛɛ mfuw ne bobe nturona ɛmaa wɔn nnɔbae bebree.
107.38: Ohyiraa wɔn na wɔn ase dɔe.Wamma wɔn nyɛmmoa dodow so anhuan.
107.39: Afei wɔn dodow so huaneena nhyɛso, amanehunu ne awerɛhow brɛɛ wɔn ase;
107.40: nea obu abirɛmpɔn animtiaa noma wokyinkyin asase kesee a ɔkwan nni hɔ so.
107.41: Nanso ɔmaa ahiafo so fii wɔn ahohia muna ɔmaa wɔn mmusua dɔɔ sɛ nguankuw.
107.42: Atreneefo hu ma wɔn ani gye,nanso amumɔyɛfo nyinaa mua wɔn ano.
107.43: Momma nea ɔyɛ onyansafo no mmu eyinom,na onsusuw Awurade adɔe kɛse no ho.

108.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Onyankopɔn, me koma asi pi;mede me kra nyinaa bɛto wʼayeyi nnwom.
108.3: Awurade, mɛkamfo wo wɔ aman mu;mɛto wo ho nnwom wɔ nnipa no mu.
108.4: Wʼadɔe so, ɛkorɔn sen ɔsoro;wo nokwaredi du wim.
108.5: Onyankopɔn, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔma wo so tra ɔsoro,na ama wʼanuonyam aba asase nyinaa so.
108.6: Fa wo nsa nifa gye yɛn na boa yɛn,na ama wɔn a wodɔ wɔn no anya nkwa.
108.7: Onyankopɔn akasa afi ne kronkronbea se,“Nkonim mu na mɛkyɛ Sekem muna masusuw Sukot Bon.
108.8: Gilead yɛ me de; Manase nso saa ara;Efraim yɛ me dade kyɛw,Yuda yɛ mʼahempema.
108.9: Moab yɛ me guasɛn,Edom so na metow me mpaboa gu;na meteɛ mu nkonimdi so gu Filistifo so.”
108.10: Hena na ɔde me bɛkɔ kuropɔn a wɔabɔ ho ban no mu?Hena na obedi mʼanim akɔ Edom?
108.11: Onyankopɔn, ɛnyɛ wo na woapo yɛnna wo ne yɛn asraafo nkɔ ɔsa bio ana?
108.12: Boa yɛn tia ɔtamfo no,na ɔdesani mmoa nka hwee.
108.13: Onyankopɔn wɔ yɛn afa yi, yebedi nkonim,na obetiatia yɛn atamfo so.

109.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Me Nyankopɔn a mekamfo wo,nyɛ komm,
109.2: na amumɔyɛfo ne nkontompofoatu wɔn ano agu me so;wɔde atoro tɛkrɛma akasa atia me.
109.3: Wɔde nitansɛm atwa me ho ahyiana wɔtow hyɛ me so a menkaa wɔn.
109.4: Wɔka nsɛm to me so de tua mʼadɔeyɛ so ka,nanso meyɛ obi a mepɛ mpaebɔ.
109.5: Wɔde bɔne tua me papayɛ so ka,na wɔde ɔtan tua mʼadɔeyɛ so ka.
109.6: Ma onipa bɔne bi nsɔre ntia no;na Satan nnyina ne nsa nifa so.
109.7: Wodi nʼasɛm a, ma onni fɔ,na ne mpaebɔ mmu no kumfɔ.
109.8: Ma ne nkwa nna nyɛ kakraa bi;na ɔfoforo nsi nʼanan mu sɛ ɔkannifo.
109.9: Ma ne mma nyɛ ayisaana ne yere nyɛ okunafo.
109.10: Ma ne mma nkyinkyin nsrɛsrɛ ade;ma wɔmpam wɔn mfi wɔn afi a abubu no mu.
109.11: Ma ɔdefirifo bi mfa nea ɔwɔ nyinaa;na ananafo mfom nʼadwuma so aba.
109.12: Mma obiara nhu no,anaa ne ayisaa mmɔbɔ.
109.13: Ma nʼase nhyew,na wɔn din nyera wɔ awo ntoatoaso a ɛreba no mu.
109.14: Ma wɔnkae nʼagyanom nnebɔne wɔ Awurade anim;na ne na bɔne no ntena hɔ daa.
109.15: Wɔn bɔne nyinaa nka Awurade anim,na wɔankae wɔn bio wɔ asase so.
109.16: Efisɛ wannwene da sɛ ɔbɛyɛ adɔe,na mmom ɔtaa ahiafommɔborɔfo ne wɔn a wɔn werɛ ahow de kɔɔ owu mu.
109.17: Nʼani gyee sɛ ɔbɛdomeenti nnome mmra no so;wampɛ sɛ obehyiraenti nhyira mmɔ no.
109.18: Ɔhyɛɛ nnome sɛ atade;ɛno kɔɔ ne nipadua mu sɛ nsu,ne ne nnompe mu sɛ ngo.
109.19: Ma ɛnyɛ sɛ atade a ɛkyekyere ne ho,ne abɔso a ɛbɔ no daa.
109.20: Ma eyi nyɛ Awurade akatua a ɔde ma me sobobɔfo,wɔn a wɔka nsɛmmɔne fa me ho no.
109.21: Nanso wo Asafo Awurade,wo din nti wo ne me nni no yiye;fi wʼadɔe mu gye me.
109.22: Efisɛ meyɛ ohiani ne nea onni bi,na me koma atɔ beraw wɔ me mu.
109.23: Mitwaa mu sɛ anwummere sunsuma;wopia me kyene sɛ mmoadabi.
109.24: Mmuadadi ama me nkotodwe mu agugow;mafɔn, na ama aka me nnompe.
109.25: Mayɛ aserewde ama wɔn a wɔbɔ me sobo;sɛ wohu me a, wɔwosow wɔn ti.
109.26: Boa me, Awurade me Nyankopɔn;gye me sɛnea wʼadɔe te.
109.27: Ma wonhu sɛ ɛyɛ wo nsa,na wo na woayɛ, Awurade.
109.28: Wɔbɛdome, nanso wubehyira;sɛ wɔtow hyɛ me so a wɔn anim begu ase,nanso wo somfo ani begye.
109.29: Mʼatamfo befura animguase;na akyekyere wɔn ho sɛ atade.
109.30: Mede mʼano bɛma Awurade so ayɛ no kɛse;mɛkamfo no wɔ dɔm mu.
109.31: Efisɛ ogyina ohiani nsa nifa sosɛ obegye no nkwa afi wɔn a wobu no kumfɔ nsam.

110.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade ka kyerɛɛ me Wura se,“Tena me nifa sokosi sɛ mede wʼatamfobɛyɛ wʼanan ase ntiaso.”
110.2: Awurade bɛterɛw wʼahempema dennen mu afi Sion;na wubedi hene wɔ wʼatamfo so.
110.3: Wʼasraafo beyi wɔn koma muda a wobɛkɔ ɔsa.Tumi kronkron bɛyɛ wʼaduradena wo mmabun bɛba wo nkyɛnsɛnea obosu gugu anɔpahema.
110.4: Awurade aka ntamna ɔrensesa nʼadwene:“Woyɛ daapem sɔfosɛ Melkisedek sɛso.”
110.5: Awurade wɔ wo nifa so;ɔbɛdwerɛw ahemfo wɔ nʼabufuwhyew da no.
110.6: Obebu amanaman atɛn aboaboa awufo ano;na wadwerɛw asodifo a wɔwɔ asase so nyinaa.
110.7: Ɔbɛnom asuwa a ɛda ɔkwankyɛn mu nsuenti obedi nkonim.Ɔhene no bɛnom asuwa a ɛda ɔkwankyɛn mu nsu,na wanya ahoɔden, na wagyina nkonimdi mu.

111.1: Dwom Monkamfo Awurade!Mefi me koma nyinaa mu ama Awurade sowɔ atreneefo aguabɔ ne asafo no mu.
111.2: Awurade nnwuma yɛ akɛse;wɔn a wɔn ani gye ho nyinaa susuw ho.
111.3: Ne nnwuma yɛ tumi ne anuonyam,na ne trenee wɔ hɔ daa.
111.4: Ɔma yɛkae nʼanwonwade;Awurade yɛ ɔdomfo ne mmɔborɔhunufo.
111.5: Ɔma wɔn a wosuro no no aduan;ɔkae nʼapam no daa.
111.6: Wakyerɛ ne nkurɔfo tumi a ɛwɔ ne nnwuma mu,sɛ ɔde aman afoforo nsase ama wɔn.
111.7: Ne nsa ano nnwuma yɛ nokware na ɛteɛ;nʼahyɛde nyinaa mu wɔ ahotoso.
111.8: Etim hɔ daa daa,nokware ne trenee mu na ɔyɛe.
111.9: Ɔde ogye maa ne nkurɔfo;ɔde nʼapam sii hɔ afebɔɔ,ne din yɛ kronkron na ɛyɛ hu.
111.10: Awurade suro yɛ nyansa mfiase;wɔn a wodi nʼahyɛde so nyinaa wɔ nhumu pa.Ɔno na daa ayeyi wɔ no.

112.1: Dwom Monkamfo Awurade.Nhyira nka onipa a osuro Awuradena onya nʼahyɛde mu anigye pii.
112.2: Ne mma bɛyɛ atumfo wɔ asase no so;atreneefo awo ntoatoaso benya nhyira.
112.3: Ahonya ne sika wɔ ne fi,na ne trenee tena hɔ daa.
112.4: Sum mu mpo hann pue ma nnipa a wɔteɛ,ma ɔdomfo, mmɔborɔhunufo ne ɔnokwafo.
112.5: Yiyedi bɛba wɔn a wɔn tirim yɛ mmerɛw na wɔde fɛm kwa,wɔn a wɔde atɛntrenee yɛ wɔn nneɛma no so.
112.6: Ampa ara ɔrenhinhim da biara da;wɔbɛkae onipa trenee daa.
112.7: Ɔte asɛmmɔne a, ɛmmɔ no hu;ne koma si pi wɔ Awurade mu ahotoso mu.
112.8: Ne koma wɔ bammɔ, na onsuro;awiei no ɔde nkonimdi behyia nʼatamfo.
112.9: Ɔtow nʼakyɛde pete aman so ma ahiafo nea wohia,nʼadɔe no tena hɔ daa;wɔbɛkae wɔn daa na wɔahyɛ wɔn anuonyam.
112.10: Omumɔyɛfo behu ama ayɛ no yaw,ɔbɛtwɛre ne se na wafɔn;omumɔyɛfo tirimpɔw bɛyɛ ɔkwa.

113.1: Dwom Monkamfo Awurade.Monkamfo Awurade, mo a moyɛ nʼasomfo no,monkamfo Awurade din.
113.2: Momma wɔnkamfo Awurade din,mprempren ne daa nyinaa.
113.3: Efi faako a owia pue kosi faako a ɛkɔtɔ,ma wɔnkamfo Awurade din.
113.4: Wɔama Awurade so aman nyinaa so,nʼanuonyam tra ɔsorosoro.
113.5: Hena na ɔte sɛ Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn,Ɔbaako no a odi hene wɔ ɔsorosoro,
113.6: ɔno na ɔbɔ ne mu asehwɛ ɔsorosoro ne asase?
113.7: Ɔma ahiafo so fi mfutuma muna ɔma onnibi so fi nso siw so;
113.8: ɔde wɔn tena mmapɔmma mu,wɔn nkurɔfo mmapɔmma mu.
113.9: Ɔbɔ obonin atenase wɔ ne fisɛ ɔbeatan a nʼani gye.Monkamfo Awurade.

114.1: Dwom Bere a Israelfo fii Misraim,na Yakobfifo fii ananafo asase so no,
114.2: Yuda bɛyɛɛ Awurade kronkronbeana Israel bɛyɛɛ nʼaheman.
114.3: Po no hwɛe, na eguanee,Yordan san nʼakyi;
114.4: Mmepɔw huruhuruwii sɛ adwennini,nkoko nso huruhuruwii sɛ nguantenmma.
114.5: Dɛn na ɛbae, ɛpo, na wuguanee?Yordan, adɛn, na wosan wʼakyi?
114.6: Mmepɔw, adɛn, na muhuruhuruw sɛ adwennini,na mo nkoko, muhuruhuruw sɛ nguantenmma yi?
114.7: Asase, ma wo ho mpopo wɔ Awurade anim,wɔ Yakob Nyankopɔn anim,
114.8: ɔno na ɔmaa ɔbotan no dan asubura,na ɔbotan dennen dan nsuwa aniwa no.

115.1: Dwom Ɛnyɛ yɛn, Awurade, ɛnyɛ yɛn,na wo din na anuonyam nka,wʼadɔe ne wo nokwaredi nti.
115.2: Adɛn nti na aman no bisa se,“Wɔn Nyankopɔn wɔ he?”
115.3: Yɛn Nyankopɔn wɔ ɔsoro;nea ɔpɛ biara na ɔyɛ.
115.4: Nanso wɔn ahoni yɛ dwetɛ ne sikakɔkɔɔ awɔde onipa nsa na ayɛ.
115.5: Wɔwɔ ano, nanso wontumi nkasa;wɔwɔ ani, nanso wonhu ade.
115.6: Wɔwɔ aso, nanso wɔnte asɛm;wɔwɔ hwene, nanso wɔnte hua.
115.7: Wɔwɔ nsa, nanso wɔnte nka;wɔwɔ anan, nanso wɔnnantew.Wontumi mma nnyigyei bi mfi wɔn mene mu.
115.8: Wɔn a wɔyɛɛ ahoni no bɛyɛ sɛ wɔn ara,saa ara na wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to wɔn so no bɛyɛ.
115.9: Mo Israelfo nyinaa, momfa mo ho nto Awurade so,ɔyɛ mo boafo ne kyɛm.
115.10: Ao Aaronfi, momfa mo ho nto Awurade so,ɔyɛ mo boafo ne kyɛm.
115.11: Mo a musuro no, momfa mo ho nto Awurade so,ɔyɛ mo boafo ne kyɛm.
115.12: Awurade kae yɛn na obehyira yɛn:Obehyira Israelfi,obehyira Aaronfi
115.13: Obehyira wɔn a wosuro Awurade,nketewa ne akɛse nyinaa.
115.14: Awurade mma wʼase nnɔ,wo ne wo mma.
115.15: Awurade nhyira wo,ɔsoro ne asase Yɛfo no.
115.16: Ɔsorosoro tɔnn yɛ Awurade de,nanso asase de, ɔde ama onipa.
115.17: Ɛnyɛ awufo na wɔkamfo Awuradewɔn a wɔkɔ fam dinn no.
115.18: Yɛn na yɛma Awurade sonnɛ ne daa nyinaa.Monkamfo Awurade.

116.1: Dwom Medɔ Awurade efisɛ, ɔtee me nne.Ɔtee me mmɔborɔsu.
