116.2: Esiane sɛ ɔbrɛɛ nʼaso ase maa me nti,mɛfrɛ no wɔ bere a mete ase yi.
116.3: Owu ahama bebaree me,ɔda ho yawdi baa me so,ɔhaw ne awerɛhow hyɛɛ me so.
116.4: Afei mebɔɔ Awurade din kae se,“Awurade, gye me nkwa!”
116.5: Awurade yɛ ɔdomfo ne ɔtreneeni;ayamhyehye ahyɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn ma.
116.6: Awurade bɔ ɔwɛmfo ho ban;bere a mewɔ ahohia mu no, ogyee me.
116.7: Nya abotɔyam bio, me kra,efisɛ Awurade ne wo adi no yiye.
116.8: Na wo, Awurade, woagye me kra afi owu mu;woamma mʼani amporow nisu,na woamma mʼanan anhintiw
116.9: sɛ mɛnantew Awurade animwɔ ateasefo asase so.
116.10: Migye dii; ɛno nti mekae se,“Mewɔ ahohia kɛse mu.”
116.11: Na mʼahokyere mu mekae se,“Nnipa nyinaa yɛ atorofo.”
116.12: Dɛn na metumi de atua Awurade kawɔ ne papa a wayɛ me nyinaa?
116.13: Mɛma nkwagye kuruwa no sona mabɔ Awurade din.
116.14: Medi bɔ a mahyɛ Awurade no nyinaa sowɔ ne nkurɔfo nyinaa anim.
116.15: Awurade nkoa nokwafo wusom bo wɔ Awurade ani so.
116.16: Awurade, ampa ara meyɛ wo somfo;meyɛ wo somfo, wʼafenaa babarima;woayi me afi me mpokyerɛ mu.
116.17: Mɛbɔ aseda afɔre ama wona mabɔ Awurade din.
116.18: Medi me ntam a maka Awurade no sowɔ ne nkurɔfo nyinaa anim,
116.19: wɔ adiwo a ɛwɔ Awurade fi no,wɔ wʼanim, Yerusalem.Monkamfo Awurade.

117.1: Dwom Mo aman nyinaa, monkamfo Awurade;mo nnipa nyinaa, momma ne din so.
117.2: Na nʼadɔe so wɔ yɛn so,na Awurade nokwaredi wɔ hɔ daa.Monkamfo Awurade.

118.1: Dwom Monna Awurade ase efisɛ oye,na nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
118.2: Momma Israel nka se,“Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.”
118.3: Momma Aaronfi nka se,“Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.”
118.4: Momma wɔn a wosuro Awurade nka se,“Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.”
118.5: Mʼahohia mu, misu frɛɛ Awurade;ogyee me so, na ɔma me dee me ho.
118.6: Awurade ne me boafo; enti merensuro.Dɛn na onipa betumi ayɛ me?
118.7: Awurade ne me wɔ hɔ; ɔyɛ me boafo.Mede nkonimdi bɛhwɛ mʼatamfo.
118.8: Eye sɛ yebehintaw wɔ Awurade mu,sen sɛ yɛde yɛn ho bɛto onipa so.
118.9: Eye sɛ yebehintaw Awurade mu,sen sɛ yɛde yɛn ho bɛto mmapɔmma so.
118.10: Amanaman no nyinaa twaa me ho hyiae,nanso Awurade din mu mitwitwaa wɔn gui.
118.11: Wotwaa me ho hyiaa wɔ baabiara,nanso Awurade din mu, mitwitwaa wɔn gui.
118.12: Wɔkyere guu me so sɛ nnowa,nanso wɔhyew ntɛm so sɛ nsɔe a ogya atɔ mu;Awurade din mu mitwitwaa wɔn gui.
118.13: Wosum me kɔɔ mʼakyi a anka mereyɛ ahwe ase,nanso Awurade boaa me.
118.14: Awurade yɛ mʼahoɔden ne me bammɔ;wayɛ me nkwagye.
118.15: Osebɔ ne nkonimdigyigye wɔ atreneefo ntamadan mu se,“Awurade nsa nifa ayɛ nneɛma akɛse!
118.16: Wɔama Awurade nsa nifa so;Awurade nsa nifa ayɛ nneɛma akɛse!”
118.17: Merenwu, mmom mɛtena asena mapae mu aka nea Awurade ayɛ.
118.18: Awurade atwe mʼaso dennen,nanso onyaa me mmaa owu ɛ.
118.19: Bue trenee apon ma me;na mɛhyɛn mu na mede aseda ama Awurade.
118.20: Awurade ponkɛse ni;ɛhɔ na atreneefo bɛfa ahyɛn mu.
118.21: Mɛda wo ase, efisɛ wugyee me so;na woayɛ me nkwagye.
118.22: Ɔbo a adansifo no poe no,abɛyɛ tweatibo.
118.23: Awurade na wayɛ eyi,na ɛyɛ nwonwa wɔ yɛn ani so.
118.24: Nnɛ yɛ da a Awurade ayɛ.Momma yɛn ani nnye na yenni ahurusi.
118.25: Awurade, gye yɛn nkwa;Awurade, ma yɛn nkonimdi.
118.26: Nhyira ne nea ɔnam Awurade din mu reba.Yehyira wo fi Awurade fi.
118.27: Awurade yɛ Onyankopɔn,na wama ne hann ahyerɛn yɛn so.Momfa nnua mman nkura na yɛnto afɔrebɔ santennkɔ afɔremuka no mmɛn ho.
118.28: Woyɛ me Nyankopɔn na meyi wo ayɛ;wone me Nyankopɔn na mɛma wo so.
118.29: Monna Awurade ase, efisɛ oye;na nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

119.1: Dwom Awurade MmaraNhyira nka wɔn a wɔn akwan yɛ pɛ,na wɔnantew sɛnea Awurade mmara kyerɛ.
119.2: Nhyira nka wɔn a wɔkora nʼahyɛde,na wofi wɔn koma nyinaa mu hwehwɛ no.
119.3: Wɔnyɛ mfomso biara;na wɔnam nʼakwan so.
119.4: Woayɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ pa ato hɔa ɛsɛ sɛ wodi so pɛpɛɛpɛ.
119.5: Ao, sɛ anka mʼakwan besi pi,ayɛ osetie wɔ wo hyɛ nsɛm ho ɛ!
119.6: Sɛ midwen wo mmaransɛm no nyinaa ho a,ɛno de, anka mʼanim rengu ase.
119.7: Mede koma a mu tew bɛkamfo wobere a meresua wo mmara a ɛteɛ no.
119.8: Medi wo hyɛ nsɛm so;na nnyaw me korakora.
119.9: Awurade Mmara Ho OsetieAberante bɛyɛ dɛn na nʼakwan ho atew?Ɛsɛ sɛ odi wʼasɛm so.
119.10: Mede me koma nyinaa hwehwɛ wo;mma me mman mfi wo mmara nsɛm ho.
119.11: Mede wʼasɛm asie me koma musɛnea merenyɛ bɔne ntia wo.
119.12: Awurade, ayeyi nka wo;kyerɛkyerɛ me wo hyɛ nsɛm.
119.13: Mede mʼano ka mmaraa efi wʼanom nyinaa.
119.14: Mʼani gye sɛ midi wʼahyɛde so,sɛnea obi ani gye ahonya bebree ho no.
119.15: Midwinnwen wo nkyerɛkyerɛ hona mehwehwɛ wʼakwan mu.
119.16: Mʼani gye wo hyɛ nsɛm ho;na merentoto wʼasɛm ase.
119.17: Awurade Mmara Mu AhotɔYɛ wo somfo yiye;na matena ase adi wʼasɛm so.
119.18: Bue mʼani na minhu anwonwade aɛwɔ wo mmara no mu.
119.19: Meyɛ ɔnanani wɔ asase so;mfa wo mmaransɛm no nhintaw me.
119.20: Me kra tɔ beraw bere biara,wo mmara ho anigyina nti.
119.21: Woka ahantanfo anim, wɔn a wɔadome wɔn,na wɔman fi wo mmaransɛm ho no.
119.22: Yi wɔn animka ne animtiaabu fi me mu,efisɛ midi wʼahyɛde so.
119.23: Ɛwɔ mu sɛ sodifo hyia di me ho nseku,nanso wo somfo bedwinnwen wʼahyɛde ho.
119.24: Wʼahyɛde yɛ mʼanigyedena ɛyɛ me fotufo.
119.25: Awurade Mmara Sodi Ho BɔhyɛWoabrɛ me ase ma meda mfutuma mu;kyɛe me nkwa so sɛnea wʼasɛm no te.
119.26: Mesesee mʼakwan na wugyee me so;kyerɛkyerɛ me wʼahyɛde.
119.27: Ma mente nea ɛwɔ wo nkyerɛkyerɛ mu ase;na mesusuw wʼanwonwade ho.
119.28: Awerɛhow ama me kra atɔ beraw;hyɛ me den sɛnea wʼasɛm no kyerɛ.
119.29: Yi me fi nnaadaa akwan so;na fa wo mmara so dom me.
119.30: Mafa nokware kwan no so;mede me koma abata wo mmara ho.
119.31: Awurade, mikura wo nkyerɛkyerɛ mu dennen,mma mʼanim ngu ase.
119.32: Mitu mmirika wɔ wo mmaransɛm kwan no so,efisɛ woama mʼadwene mu adɔ.
119.33: Ntease Ho MpaebɔKyerɛkyerɛ me, Awurade, na minni wo hyɛ nsɛm so,na medi so akosi awiei.
119.34: Ma me ntease, na medi wo mmara so,na mede me koma nyinaa bedi so.
119.35: Kyerɛ me wo mmaransɛm kwan nona hɔ na minya anigye.
119.36: Dan me koma kɔ wʼahyɛde hona ɛnyɛ pɛsɛmenkominya so mfaso ho.
119.37: Yi mʼani fi nneɛma hunu so;na kyɛe me nkwa so sɛnea wʼasɛm te.
119.38: Di bɔ a woahyɛ wo somfo no so,na wasuro wo.
119.39: Yi animguase a ɛbɔ me hu no fi hɔ,efisɛ wo mmara yɛ papa.
119.40: Mʼani agyina wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no!Kyɛe me nkwa so wɔ wo trenee mu.
119.41: Awurade Mmara Mu AhotosoAwurade, ma wo dɔ a ɛnsa da no mmra me so,wo nkwagye no, sɛnea wo bɔhyɛ no te.
119.42: Afei mebua nea oyi me ahi no,efisɛ mewɔ wʼasɛm mu ahotoso.
119.43: Nyi nokwasɛm no mfi mʼanom,efisɛ mʼanidaso wɔ wo mmara mu.
119.44: Medi wo mmara so bere biaraakosi daa apem.
119.45: Mede ahofadi bɛnantew,efisɛ mahwehwɛ wo nkyerɛkyerɛ.
119.46: Mɛka wʼahyɛde ho asɛm wɔ ahemfo animna wɔrengu mʼanim ase,
119.47: efisɛ mʼani gye wo mmaransɛm ho,na medɔ no.
119.48: Mede nidi ma wo mmaransɛm a medɔ no,na midwinnwen wo hyɛ nsɛm ho.
119.49: Awurade Mmara No Mu AhotosoKae asɛm a woaka akyerɛ wo somfo,efisɛ woama me anidaso.
119.50: Mʼawerɛkyekye wɔ mʼamanehunu mu ne sɛ:Wo bɔhyɛ kyɛe me nkwa so.
119.51: Ahantanfo bu me animtiaa bebree,nanso mennan mfi wo mmara ho.
119.52: Awurade mekae wo tete mmara no,na minya awerɛkyekye wɔ mu.
119.53: Abufuw hyɛ me ma, esiane amumɔyɛfoa wɔapo wo mmara nti.
119.54: Wo hyɛ nsɛm yɛ me dwom tibanwɔ baabiara a mesoɛ.
119.55: Awurade, anadwo mekae wo din,na medi wo mmara so.
119.56: Eyi ne ade a meyɛ da biara,midi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ so.
119.57: Ahofama Wɔ Awurade Mmara Sodi MuAwurade, wo ne me kyɛfa;mahyɛ bɔ sɛ medi wo nsɛm so.
119.58: Mede me koma nyinaa ahwehwɛ wo;hu me mmɔbɔ sɛnea wo bɔhyɛ no te.
119.59: Madwene mʼakwan hona madan mʼanammɔntu akyerɛ wʼahyɛde.
119.60: Mɛyɛ ntɛm, merentwentwɛnsɛ medi wo mmara nsɛm so.
119.61: Ɛwɔ mu, amumɔyɛfo de hama kyekyere me,nanso me werɛ remfi wo mmara.
119.62: Ɔdasu mu, mesɔre de wʼaseda ma wo,wo mmara a ɛteɛ nti.
119.63: Meyɛ wɔn a wosuro wo nyinaa adamfo,wɔn a wodi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ so nyinaa.
119.64: Awurade, wʼadɔe ahyɛ asase so ma;kyerɛkyerɛ me wo hyɛ nsɛm.
119.65: Awurade Mmara Sodi So MfasoWo ne wo somfo nni no yiyesɛnea wʼasɛm te, Awurade.
119.66: Kyerɛkyerɛ me nimdeɛ ne atemmu pa,efisɛ migye wo mmara nsɛm no di.
119.67: Mefom ɔkwan ansa na mihuu amane,na mprempren de midi wʼasɛm so.
119.68: Wuye, na nea woyɛ nso ye;kyerɛkyerɛ me wo hyɛ nsɛm.
119.69: Ahantanfo de atoro asra me ho de,nanso mede me koma nyinaa di wo nkyerɛkyerɛ so.
119.70: Wɔn koma yɛ den na wonni ɔtema,nanso mʼani gye wo mmara ho.
119.71: Eye sɛ mihuu amanesɛnea mesua wo hyɛ nsɛm.
119.72: Mmara a efi wʼanom no som bo ma mesen dwetɛ ne sikakɔkɔɔ mpem mpem.
119.73: Nokware A Ɛwɔ Awurade Mmara MuWo nsa na ɛbɔɔ me na ɛnwenee me;ma me ntease a mede besua wo mmara nsɛm.
119.74: Sɛ wɔn a wosuro wo no hu me a, ma wɔn ani nnye,efisɛ mede mʼanidaso ahyɛ wʼasɛm mu.
119.75: Awurade, minim sɛnea wo mmara te,na nokwaredi mu na woatwe mʼaso.
119.76: Ma wʼadɔe a ɛnsa da no nkyekye me werɛsɛnea bɔ a woahyɛ wo somfo no te no.
119.77: Ma wʼayamhyehye mmra me so, na minnya nkwa,efisɛ mʼani ka wo mmara ho.
119.78: Ma ahantanfo ani nwu sɛ wɔfom me kwa ntinanso mesusuw wo nkyerɛkyerɛ ho.
119.79: Ma wɔn a wosuro wo no mmra me nkyɛn,wɔn a wɔte wo mmara ase no.
119.80: Ma me koma nnya bembu wɔ wo hyɛ nsɛm ho,na mʼanim angu ase.
119.81: Ogye MpaebɔWo nkwagye ho anigyina ama me kra atɔ piti,nanso mede mʼanidaso ahyɛ wʼasɛm mu.
119.82: Mahwɛ wo bɔhyɛ anim ama mʼani abu;meka se, “Da bɛn na wobɛkyekye me werɛ?”
119.83: Ɛwɔ mu sɛ mete sɛ nsa kotoku a ɛsɛn wusiw ano de,nanso me werɛ mfi wo hyɛ nsɛm no.
119.84: Wo somfo ntwɛn nkosi da bɛn?Da bɛn na wobɛtwe wɔn a wɔtaa me no aso?
119.85: Ahantanfo atu amoa de asum me afiri,a ɛne wo mmara bɔ abira.
119.86: Wo mmara nsɛm nyinaa mu wɔ ahotoso;boa me, efisɛ nnipa taa me kwa.
119.87: Ɛkaa kakraa bi a anka woyii me fii asase so,nanso minnyaee wo nkyerɛkyerɛ sodi.
119.88: Kyɛe me nkwa so sɛnea wʼadɔe te,na medi nkyerɛkyerɛ a efi wʼanom no so.
119.89: Awurade Mmara Mu GyidiAwurade, wʼasɛm no wɔ hɔ daa;egyina hɔ pintinn wɔ ɔsorosoro.
119.90: Wo nokwaredi kɔ so wɔ awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu;wode asase sii hɔ, na etim hɔ.
119.91: Wo mmara wɔ hɔ besi nnɛ,na nneɛma nyinaa som wo.
119.92: Sɛ mʼani anka wo mmara no ho a,anka mʼamanehunu akum me.
119.93: Me werɛ remfi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no,efisɛ ɛno so na wonam akyɛe me nkwa so.
119.94: Gye me nkwa, na meyɛ wo de;na mahwehwɛ wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no.
119.95: Amumɔyɛfo retwɛn sɛ wɔbɛsɛe me,nanso, misusuw wʼahyɛde ho.
119.96: Mahu sɛ pɛyɛ nyinaa wɔ nea ɛkɔpem;nanso wo mmara nsɛm no nni ɔhye.
119.97: Awurade Mmara Ho DɔAo, medɔ wo mmara no yiye!Midwinnwen ho da mu nyinaa.
119.98: Wo mmara nsɛm ma mihu nyansa sen mʼatamfo,efisɛ ɛwɔ me nkyɛn daa.
119.99: Mewɔ nhumu sen mʼakyerɛkyerɛfo nyinaa,efisɛ midwinnwen wʼahyɛde ho.
119.100: Mewɔ ntease sen mpanyimfo,efisɛ midi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ so.
119.101: Memfaa mʼanan nsii ɔkwan bɔne biara sosɛnea metumi ayɛ osetie ama wʼasɛm.
119.102: Memman mfii wo mmara ho,efisɛ wʼankasa na woakyerɛkyerɛ me.
119.103: Wo nsɛm yɛ me dɛ,ɛyɛ dɛ sen ɛwo wɔ mʼanom.
119.104: Minya ntease fi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ mu;enti mikyi ɔkwan bɔne biara.
119.105: Awurade Mmara Yɛ KaneaWʼasɛm yɛ mʼanan ase kaneane me kwan so hann.
119.106: Maka ntam ahyɛ mu kena semedi wo trenee mmara no so.
119.107: Mahu amane bebree;kyɛe me nkwa so, Awurade, sɛnea wʼasɛm te.
119.108: Awurade, ma wʼani nsɔ mʼanom nkamfo a efi me pɛ mu,na kyerɛkyerɛ me wo mmara.
119.109: Ɛwɔ mu sɛ daa metoto me nkwa ase de,nanso me werɛ remfi wo mmara.
119.110: Amumɔyɛfo asum me afiri,nanso memfom mfii wo nkyerɛkyerɛ ho.
119.111: Wʼahyɛde yɛ mʼagyapade afebɔɔ;ɛma me koma ani gye.
119.112: Me koma ayɛ krado sɛ ɛbɛhwɛ wo hyɛ nsɛm soakosi awiei.
119.113: Awurade Mmara Mu BammɔMikyi nnipa a wɔn adwene yɛ wɔn ntanta,na medɔ wo mmara.
119.114: Wone me guankɔbea ne me kyɛm;mede mʼanidaso ahyɛ wʼasɛm mu.
119.115: Mumfi me so nkɔ, mo nnebɔneyɛfo,na minni me Nyankopɔn mmara nsɛm so!
119.116: Wowaw me sɛnea wo bɔhyɛ no te, na mɛtena nkwa mu;mma mʼanidaso nyɛ ɔkwa.
119.117: So me mu, na menya ogye;na bere biara mɛhwɛ wo hyɛ nsɛm no.
119.118: Wopo wɔn a wɔfom wo hyɛ nsɛm nyinaa,na wɔn nnaadaa no yɛ ɔkwa.
119.119: Wotow amumɔyɛfo nyinaa gu sɛ afide;enti medɔ wʼahyɛde.
119.120: Wo ho suro ma me ho popo;wo mmara abɔ me hu.
119.121: Awurade Mmara Ho SetieMayɛ nea ɛteɛ na ɛyɛ pɛ.Nnyaa me mma wɔn a wɔhyɛ me so!
119.122: Hwɛ ma wo somfo nni yiye;mma ahantanfo nhyɛ me so.
119.123: Mahwɛ wo nkwagye anim ama mʼani abu,ɛrehwehwɛ wo bɔhyɛ a ɛteɛ no.
119.124: Wo ne wo somfo nni no sɛnea wʼadɔe te,na kyerɛkyerɛ me wo hyɛ nsɛm.
119.125: Meyɛ wo somfo; ma me nhumuna mate wʼahyɛde ase.
119.126: Awurade, bere aso sɛ woyɛ biribi;wɔrebu wo mmara so.
119.127: Esiane sɛ medɔ wo mmara nsɛmsen sikakɔkɔɔ, anaa sikakɔkɔɔ ankasa,
119.128: na midwen sɛ wo nkyerɛkyerɛ nyinaa ye nti,mikyi ɔkwan bɔne biara.
119.129: Pere Sɛ Wubedi Awurade Mmara SoWʼahyɛde yɛ nwonwa;enti midi so.
119.130: Wo nsɛm asete ma hann;na ɛma ntetekwaa nya ntease.
119.131: Mibue mʼanom na migu ahome,na mʼani gyina wo mmara nsɛm.
119.132: Dan wʼani hwɛ me na hu me mmɔbɔsɛnea woyɛ daa ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo din no.
119.133: Tutu mʼanammɔn sɛnea wʼasɛm no te;mma bɔne biara nni me so.
119.134: Gye me fi nnipa nhyɛso mu,na madi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ so.
119.135: Ma wʼanim nhyerɛn wo somfo sona kyerɛkyerɛ me wo hyɛ nsɛm.
119.136: Nsuten nisu aguare me,efisɛ nnipa nni wo mmara so.
119.137: Awurade Mmara Yɛ PɛƆtreneeni ne wo, Awurade,na wo mmara nso yɛ pɛ.
119.138: Ahyɛde a woayɛ no yɛ trenee;ɛyɛ nea wonya mu ahotoso pa ara.
119.139: Abufuw ahyɛ me ma,efisɛ mʼatamfo bu wɔn ani gu wo nsɛm so.
119.140: Wɔasɔ wo bɔhyɛ ahorow no ahwɛ pa ara,na wo somfo dɔ wɔn.
119.141: Ɛwɔ mu sɛ menka hwee na memfra de,nanso me werɛ mfi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ.
119.142: Wo trenee wɔ hɔ daa,na wo mmara no yɛ nokware.
119.143: Ɔhaw ne awerɛhow aba me so,nanso wo mmara nsɛm ma me ahosɛpɛw.
119.144: Wʼahyɛde yɛ nokware daa;ma me ntease na manya nkwa.
119.145: Ogye MpaebɔAwurade, mede me koma nyinaa mefrɛ wo, gye me so,na medi wo hyɛ nsɛm no so.
119.146: Misu mefrɛ wo, gye me nkwana midi wʼahyɛde so.
119.147: Mesɔre anɔpahema, na misu pɛ mmoa;mede me werɛ ahyɛ wo nsɛm mu.
119.148: Mʼani gu so anadwo nyinaa,na misusuw wo bɔhyɛ ho.
119.149: Tie me nne sɛnea wʼadɔe no te;Awurade, kyɛe me nkwa so sɛnea wo mmara te.
119.150: Wɔn a wɔhyehyɛ atirimɔdensɛm no abɛn,nanso wɔne wo mmara ntam ware.
119.151: Awurade, wo de, wobɛn me,na wo mmara nsɛm nyinaa yɛ nokware.
119.152: Mmere bi a atwa mu no, misuaa wʼahyɛdea wode tim hɔ sɛ ɛntena hɔ daa no.
119.153: Mmoa Ho MpaebɔHwɛ mʼamanehunu na gye me nkwaefisɛ me werɛ mfii wo mmara no.
119.154: Di mʼasɛm ma me na gye me;kyɛe me nkwa so sɛnea wo bɔhyɛ no te.
119.155: Nkwagye ne atirimɔdenfo ntam kwan ware,efisɛ wɔnhwehwɛ wo hyɛ nsɛm no.
119.156: Awurade, wʼayamhyehye yɛ kɛse;kyɛe me nkwa so sɛnea wo mmara no te.
119.157: Atamfo a wɔteetee me dɔɔso,nanso memman mfii wo nhyehyɛe ho.
119.158: Mehwɛ wɔn a wonni gyidi no a wɔn ho yɛ me nwini,efisɛ wonni wʼasɛm so.
119.159: Hwɛ sɛnea mʼani gye wo nkyerɛkyerɛ ho;Awurade, kyɛe me nkwa so sɛnea wʼadɔe te.
119.160: Wo nsɛm nyinaa yɛ nokware;na wo mmara a ɛteɛ no to rentwa da.
119.161: Nya Ahofama Ma Awurade MmaraSodifo taataa me kwa,nanso ɛyɛ wʼasɛm nko ara na misuro.
119.162: Mʼani gye wo bɔhyɛ hote sɛ obi a wanya asade kɛse.
119.164: Mekamfo wo mpɛn ason da biara,wo mmara a ɛteɛ no nti.
119.165: Wɔn a wɔdɔ wo mmara no wɔ asomdwoe mmoroso,na biribiara rentumi mma wonhintiw.
119.166: Awurade, metwɛn wo nkwagye,na midi wo mmara nsɛm so.
119.167: Midi wʼahyɛde sona medɔ no yiye.
119.168: Midi wo nkyerɛkyerɛ ne wʼahyɛde so,na wunim mʼakwan nyinaa.
119.169: Mmoa Ho MpaebɔAwurade, ma me sufrɛ nnu wʼanim;ma me ntease sɛnea wʼasɛm no te.
119.170: Ma me nkotosrɛ nnu wʼanim;na gye me sɛnea wo bɔhyɛ no te.
119.171: Ma nkamfo nhyɛ mʼanom ma;efisɛ wokyerɛkyerɛ me wo hyɛ nsɛm.
119.172: Ma me tɛkrɛma nto wʼasɛm ho dwom,efisɛ wo mmara nsɛm nyinaa yɛ trenee.
119.173: Ma wo nsa nyɛ krado mmɛboa me,efisɛ maso wo nkyerɛkyerɛ no mu.
119.174: Awurade, mʼani agyina wo nkwagye,na wo mmara yɛ mʼanigyede.
119.175: Ma mentena nkwa mu na matumi akamfo wo,na wo mmara nso awowaw me.
119.176: Mafom kwan sɛ oguan a wayera.Hwehwɛ wo somfo,efisɛ me werɛ mfii wo mmara nsɛm no ɛ.

120.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom.Misu frɛ Awurade wɔ mʼahohiahia mu,na ogye me so.
120.2: Awurade, gye me fi atoro ano,ne nnaadaa tɛkrɛma nsam.
120.3: Dɛn na ɔbɛyɛ wo,na dɛn na ɛka ho bio, wo nnaadaa tɛkrɛma?
120.4: Ɔde asraafo bɛmma a ano yɛ nnamne nnyansramma bɛtwe wʼaso.
120.5: Nnome nka me sɛ metena Mesek,na mete Kedar ntamadan mu!
120.6: Matena wɔn a wokyi asomdwoemu akyɛ dodo.
120.7: Meyɛ asomdwoe nipa;nanso sɛ mekasa a, wɔde yɛ ɔko.

121.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom.Mema mʼani so kyerɛ mmepɔw no,ɛhe na me mmoa fi bɛba?
121.2: Me mmoa fi Awurade,ɔsoro ne asase yɛfo no.
121.3: Ɔremma wo nan nwatiri,nea ɔhwɛ wo no rentɔ nko.
121.4: Ampa ara, nea ɔhwɛ Israel norentɔ nko na ɔrenna.
121.5: Awurade hwɛ wo so;Awurade ne wo nwini wɔ wo nsa nifa so;
121.6: Owia rensɛe wo wɔ adekyee mu,na ɔsram nso rensɛe wo anadwo.
121.7: Awurade bɛbɔ wo ho ban afi ɔsɛe nyinaa ho,ɔbɛhwɛ wo nkwa so;
121.8: Awurade bɛhwɛ wʼadifi ne wo fieba somprempren ne daa.

122.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom. Dawid de.Me ne wɔn a wosee me sɛ,“Ma yɛnkɔ Awurade fi” no ani gyei.
122.3: Wɔakyekyere Yerusalem yiye sɛ kuropɔnwahyehyɛ mu nneɛma fɛfɛ.
122.4: Ɛhɔ na mmusuakuw no kɔ,Awurade mmusuakuw no,Wɔkɔkamfo Awurade din,sɛnea nhyehyɛe a wɔde ama Israel no te.
122.5: Ɛhɔ na atemmu nhengua no sisi,Dawid fi nhengua no.
122.6: Monsrɛ asomdwoe mma Yerusalem se,“Ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo no nnya bammɔ.
122.7: Ma asomdwoe mmra wʼafasu muna bammɔ mmra wʼaban mu.”
122.8: Me nuanom ne me nnamfonom nti,mɛka se, “Asomdwoe ntena wo mu.”
122.9: Awurade yɛn Nyankopɔn fi nti,mɛhwehwɛ wo yiyeyɛ.

123.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom.Mema mʼani so kyerɛ wo,wo a wʼahengua si ɔsoro.
123.2: Sɛnea nkoa ani hwɛ wɔn wura nsa no,sɛnea afenaa ani hwɛ nʼawuraa nsa no no,saa ara na yɛn ani hwɛ Awurade, yɛn Nyankopɔnkosi sɛ obehu yɛn mmɔbɔ.
123.3: Hu yɛn mmɔbɔ, Awurade, hu yɛn mmɔbɔ,na wɔabu yɛn animtiaa bebree.
123.4: Ahomasofo fɛwdi ama yɛabrɛ dodo,ahantanfo animtiaabu afono yɛn.

124.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom. Dawid de.Sɛ anka Awurade nni yɛn afa a,ma Israel nka,
124.2: Sɛ anka Awurade nni yɛn afabere a nnipa tow hyɛɛ yɛn so,
124.3: bere a wɔn abufuw sɔre tiaa yɛn aanka wɔmemenee yɛn anikann;
124.4: anka nsuyiri no bebu afa yɛn so,anka ɔhweam no bɛtwe yɛn akɔ,
124.5: anka nsu a ano yɛ den nobɛpra yɛn kɔ.
124.6: Ayeyi nka Awurade awamma ho kwan amma wɔamfa wɔn se antetew yɛn mu.
124.7: Yɛaguan sɛ anomaaafi ofirisumfo afiri mu;wɔabubu afiri no,ama yɛaguan.
124.8: Yɛn mmoa wɔ Awurade din mu,ɔsoro ne asase Yɛfo no.

125.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom.Wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to Awurade so no te sɛ Bepɔw Sion,a ɛnwosow na etim hɔ daa no.
125.2: Sɛnea mmepɔw atwa Yerusalem ho ahyia no,saa ara na Awurade atwa ne nkurɔfo ho ahyiamprempren ne daa.
125.3: Amumɔyɛfo ahempema renka asase awɔde ama atreneefo no so,sɛ ɛba saa a, atreneefonam wɔn so bɛyɛ bɔne.
125.4: Awurade wɔn a wɔyɛ papa no, yɛ wɔn papa,wɔn a wɔteɛ wɔ koma mu no, yɛ wɔn papa.
125.5: Na wɔn a wɔman fa akwan kɔntɔnkye so no de,Awurade betwa wɔn ne nnebɔneyɛfo asu.Asomdwoe nka Israel.

126.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom.Bere a Awurade de Sion fi nnommum san bae no,yɛyɛɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔsosoo adae.
126.2: Ɔserew hyɛɛ yɛn anom ma,anigye nnwom hyɛɛ yɛn tɛkrɛma so ma.Na wɔkaa wɔ amanaman no mu se,“Awurade ayɛ nneɛma akɛse ama wɔn.”
126.3: Awurade ayɛ nneɛma akɛse ama yɛn,na anigye ahyɛ yɛn ma.
126.4: Awurade, san fa yɛn siade ma yɛn,te sɛ nsuwansuwa a ɛwɔ Negeb no.
126.5: Wɔn a wodua no nusu mu node anigye nnwom betwa.
126.6: Wɔn a wɔde osu fi adiso aba a wɔrekodua no,de anigye nnwom bɛsan abaa wɔsoso nnɔbae afiafi.

127.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom. Salomo de.Sɛ Awurade ansi ɔdan no a,adansifo no yɛ ho adwuma kwa.Sɛ Awurade ammɔ kuropɔn no ho ban a,awɛmfo no wɛn kwa.
127.2: Sɛ wosɔre anɔpahemana wotena kosi anadwo,na woyɛ adwumaden pɛ wʼano aduan a,ɛyɛ ɔkwa, efisɛ wɔn a ɔdɔ wɔn no, ɔma wɔn wɔ wɔn nnae mu.
127.3: Mma yɛ agyapade a efi Awurade hɔ,na mma yɛ akatua a efi no.
127.4: Mma a wɔwo wɔn mmabun bere mu note sɛ agyan a ɛhyɛ ɔsraani nsam.
127.5: Nhyira ne onipa anʼagyan kotoku ayɛ ma.Nʼanim rengu asebere a wahyia nʼatamfo wɔ kurow pon ano no.

128.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom.Nhyira ne wɔn a wosuro Awurade,na wɔnantew nʼakwan so.
128.2: Wubedi wʼadwuma so aba;nhyira ne yiyedi bɛyɛ wo de.
128.3: Wo yere bɛyɛ sɛ bobe a ɛsow abawɔ wo fi;na wo mmabarima ayɛ sɛ ngodua a afifiatwa wo pon ho ahyia.
128.4: Yiw, sɛɛ ne nea wobehyiraonipa a osuro Awurade no.
128.5: Awurade nhyira wo mfi Sionna ɔmma wunhu Yerusalem yiyeyɛ;wo nkwanna nyinaa.
128.6: Ɔmma wo ntena ase nhu wo mma mma.Asomdwoe nka Israel.

129.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom.“Wɔahyɛ me so pii afi me mmofraase,ma Israel nka ɛ.
129.2: “Wɔahyɛ me so pii afi me mmofraase,nanso wontumi nnii me so nkonim ɛ.
129.3: Fɛntɛmfo afɛntɛm mʼakyiayɛ wɔn nkɔmoa atenten.
129.4: Nanso Awurade yɛ ɔtreneeni;watwitwa amumɔyɛfo hama afi me ho ama made me ho.”
129.5: Ma wɔn a wɔtan Sion nyinaamfa animguase nsan wɔn akyi.
129.6: Ma wɔnnyɛ sɛ sare a ɛwɔ ɔdan atifi,a ennyin na ɛhyew;
129.7: na nnɔbaetwafo ntumi nnya biribi mfi mu nhyɛ ne nsa ma,na nea ɔboaboa ano nso nnya hwee nhyɛ nʼabasa ma.
129.8: Mma wɔn a wotwa mu wɔ hɔ no nka se,“Awurade nhyira mmra mo so;yehyira mo wɔ Awurade din mu.”

130.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom.Awurade, mifi bun mu su frɛ wo;
130.2: Awurade, tie me nne.Wɛn wʼasoma me nkotosrɛ.
130.3: Awurade, sɛ wubu yɛn bɔne ho nkontaa a,anka hena na obetumi agyina ano?
130.4: Nanso wowɔ bɔnefakyɛ;ɛno nti wosuro wo.
130.5: Metwɛn Awurade, me mu ade nyinaa twɛn,na nʼasɛm mu na mede mʼanidaso ahyɛ.
130.6: Metwɛn Awuradesen sɛnea awɛmfo twɛn adekyee,sen sɛnea awɛmfo twɛn adekyee.
130.7: Israel, ma wʼani nna Awurade so,efisɛ Awurade wɔ adɔe a enni huammɔna ogye ankasa wɔ ne mu.
130.8: Ɔno ankasa begye Israelafi wɔn bɔne nyinaa mu.

131.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom. Dawid de.Awurade, ahomaso nni me koma mu,na mʼani ntraa me ntɔn ɛ;memma nsɛm akɛse nhaw meanaa nsɛm a ɛyɛ nwonwa dodo ma me.
131.2: Na mmom, mama me kra anya abotɔyamte sɛ akokoaa a ɔda ne na so renum no,te sɛ akokoaa a otua nufu ano no,saa ara na me kra ayɛ wɔ me mu.
131.3: Israel, ma wʼani nna Awurade so,mprempren ne daa nyinaa.

132.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom.Awurade kae Dawidne ɔhaw ahorow a ogyinaa ano no.
132.2: Ɔkaa Awurade ntam,na ɔhyɛɛ nea ɔyɛ Otumfo ma Yakob no bɔ se,
132.3: “Merenhyɛn me fina merenkɔda me mpa so,
132.4: meremma nna mmfa mena meremma mʼani nkum,
132.5: kosi sɛ menya baabi ama Awurade,baabi a nea ɔyɛ Otumfo ma Yakob No bɛtena.”
132.6: Yɛtee wɔ Efrata,yɛbɛtoo so wɔ Yaar mfuw so.
132.7: “Momma yɛnkɔ nʼatenae;momma yɛnsom wɔ ne nan ntiaso hɔ.
132.8: ‘Awurade, sɔre bra wʼahomegyebea,wo ne wo tumi adaka no.
132.9: Ma trenee nyɛ sɛ ntade mma wʼasɔfo;ma wʼahotefo nto ahurusi nnwom.’ ”
132.10: Wo somfo Dawid nti,nyi wʼani mfi nea woasra no ngo no so.
132.11: Awurade kaa ntam kyerɛɛ Dawid,nokware ntam a ɔntwe nsan se,“Wʼasefo no mu baakona mede no bɛtena wʼahengua so.
132.12: Sɛ wo mmabarima di mʼapam sona wotie me nkyerɛkyerɛ a,ɛno de wɔn mmabarima bɛtenawʼahengua so afebɔɔ.”
132.13: Awurade ayi Sion,ɔde hɔ ayɛ nʼatenae:
132.14: “Ɛha ne mʼahomegyebea daa nyinaa;ɛha na mɛtena adi hene, efisɛ ha na mepɛ,
132.15: mede nneɛma pa bebree behyira nona mama nʼahiafo adidi amee.
132.16: Mede nkwagye befura nʼasɔfo,na nʼahotewfo ato ahurusi nnwom daa.
132.17: “Mɛma obirɛmpɔn bi apue wɔ Dawid ahenni mu,na mede kanea asi hɔ ama nea masra no ngo no.
132.18: Mede aniwu befura nʼatamfo,nanso wɔbɛhyɛ no ahenkyɛw a ɛhyerɛn.”

133.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom. Dawid de.Hwɛ oye a eye ne fɛ a ɛyɛsɛ anuanom bɔ mu tena faako!
133.2: Ɛte sɛ ngo a ɛsom bo a wɔahwie agu apampam,na esian kogu bɔgyesɛ mu,esian kogu Aaron bɔgyesɛ mu,ma bi kogu nʼatade kɔn mu.
133.3: Ɛte sɛ Hermon bosu aɛtɔ gu Bepɔw Sion so.Ɛhɔ na Awurade ahyɛ ne nhyira,nkwa a to ntwa da no.

134.1: Dwom Ɔsoroforo dwom.Awurade asomfo nyinaa, monkamfo Awurade,mo a mosom wɔ Awurade fi anadwo nyinaa.
134.2: Momma mo nsa so wɔ kronkronbea hɔna monkamfo Awurade.
134.3: Awurade a ɔbɔɔ ɔsoro ne asase no,mfi Sion nhyira mo.

135.1: Dwom Monkamfo Awurade.Monkamfo Awurade din;monkamfo no, mo Awurade asomfo,
135.2: mo a mosom wɔ Awurade fi,wɔ adiwo a ɛwɔ yɛn Nyankopɔn fi.
135.3: Monkamfo Awurade efisɛ oye;monto ayeyi nnwom mma ne din, na ɛno na ɛyɛ anisɔ.
135.4: Awurade ayi Yakob sɛ ɔnyɛ ne de,wayi Israel sɛ nʼade a ɛsom bo.
135.5: Minim sɛ Awurade so;Ɔso sen anyame nyinaa.
135.6: Awurade yɛ nea ɔpɛ biarawɔ ɔsoro ne asase so,po ne mu bun nyinaa.
135.7: Ɔma omununkum ma ne ho so fi asase ano ba;ɔsoma anyinam ka osu hona ɔma ahum tu fi ne koradan mu.
135.8: Okum Misraim mmakan,nnipa ne mmoa mmakan.
135.9: Ɔsomaa ne nsɛnkyerɛnne ne nʼanwonwade baa mo mfimfini, Misraim,de tiaa Farao ne nʼasomfo nyinaa.
135.10: Ɔsɛee amanaman pii,na okunkum ahemfo akɛse,
135.11: Amorifo hene, SihonBasan hene, Ogne Kanaan ahemfo nyinaa,
135.12: na ɔde wɔn nsase maa sɛ agyapadeɔde maa ne nkurɔfo Israelfo.
135.13: Awurade, wo din wɔ hɔ daa.Awurade wo din ahyeta awo ntoatoaso nyinaa mu.
135.14: Awurade bedi ama ne nkurɔfona obehu nʼasomfo mmɔbɔ.
135.15: Amanaman no ahoni yɛ dwetɛ ne sikakɔkɔɔa wɔde onipa nsa na ayɛ.
135.16: Wɔwɔ ano, nanso wontumi nkasa,wɔwɔ ani, nanso wonhu ade;
135.17: wɔwɔ aso, nanso wɔnte asɛm,na ɔhome nso nni wɔn anom.
135.18: Wɔn a wɔyɛɛ ahoni no bɛyɛ sɛ wɔn ara,saa ara na wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to wɔn so no bɛyɛ.
135.19: Monkamfo Awurade, mo Israelfo nyinaa;monkamfo Awurade, Aaron fi;
135.20: monkamfo Awurade, Lewi fi;monkamfo Awurade, mo a musuro no.
135.21: Mumfi Sion nkamfo Awurade,monkamfo nea ɔte Yerusalem no.Monkamfo Awurade.

136.1: Dwom Monna Awurade ase na oye.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.2: Monna anyame mu Nyankopɔn no ase.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.3: Monna awuranom mu Awurade no ase.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.4: Ɔno nko ara na ɔyɛ anwonwade akɛse.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.5: Ɔno na ofi ne ntease mu bɔɔ ɔsoro.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.6: Ɔno na ɔtrɛw asase mu de kataa nsu so.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.7: Ɔno na ɔbɔɔ akanea akɛse no.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.8: Ɔbɔɔ owia sɛ enni adekyee so.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa;
136.9: Ɔbɔɔ sram ne nsoromma sɛ wonni adesae so no.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.10: Ɔno na okunkum Misraimfo mmakan,Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.11: na oyii Israelfo fii wɔn mu no.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.12: Ɔde nsa kɛse ne basa a wateɛ mu.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.13: Ɔno na ɔpaee Po Kɔkɔɔ no mu no,Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.14: na ɔde Israelfo faa mfimfini no.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.15: Nanso ɔpraa Farao ne nʼasraafo guu Po Kɔkɔɔ mu no.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.16: Ɔno na odii ne nkurɔfo anim wɔ sare no so.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.17: Ɔno na okum ahemfo akɛse no,Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.18: na okum ahemfo akunini no.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.19: Okum Amorifo hene, Sihon,Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.20: ne Basanhene, Og.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.21: Na ɔde wɔn nsase maa sɛ agyapade.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.22: Ɔde maa ne somfo Israel sɛ agyapade.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.23: Ɔkaee yɛn, yɛn mmerɛwyɛ mu.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.24: Na ogyee yɛn fii yɛn atamfo nsam.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.25: Ɔno na ɔma abɔde biara aduan.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.
136.26: Monna ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn no ase.Nʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa.

137.1: Dwom Babilonia nsubɔnten ho, ɛhɔ na yɛtena suubere a yɛkaee Sion no.
137.2: Ɛhɔ konkɔn so nnua muna yɛde yɛn asanku sensɛnee,
137.3: ɛhɔ na yɛn nnommumfafo kaa se yɛnto nnwom,yɛn ahohiafo hwehwɛɛ anigye nnwom fii yɛn nkyɛn;wɔkae se, “Monto Sion nnwom baako nkyerɛ yɛn!”
137.4: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛatumi ato Awurade nnwom,bere a yɛwɔ ananafo asase so?
137.5: Yerusalem, sɛ me werɛ fi wo ama me nsa nifa werɛ mfi sankubɔ.
137.6: Sɛ mankae wo a,ma me tɛkrɛma nka ntare mʼanomsɛ mamfa Yerusalemsɛ mʼanigyede kɛse pa ara a.
137.7: Kae, Awurade, nea Edomfo yɛɛda a Yerusalem hwee ase no.Wɔteɛɛ mu se, “Munnwiriw,munnwiriw ngu fam nkɔka ne fapem!”
137.8: Ɔbabea Babilonia, wɔadome wo akɔ ɔsɛe mu,nea otua wo ka bio ani gyewɔ nea wode ayɛ yɛn no ho.
137.9: Nea ɔkyere wo nkokoaade wɔn dwiradwira abotan no ani gye.

138.1: Dwom Dawid de.Awurade, mede me koma nyinaa ayi wo ayɛ;mɛto wʼayeyi dwom wɔ “anyame” no anim.
138.2: Mede mʼani bɛkyerɛ wʼasɔredan kronkron no, akotow wona makamfo wo dinwɔ wʼadɔe a enni huammɔ ne wo nokwaredi nti,efisɛ woama wʼahyɛde no so yiye;ama asen wo titiriwyɛ.
138.3: Bere a misu frɛɛ wo no, wugyee me so;woma minyaa akokoduru ne nnamyɛ.
138.4: Awurade, sɛ ahemfo a wɔwɔ wiase nyinaa te nea woahyɛ no a,ma wɔnkamfo wo.
138.5: Ma wɔnto Awurade akwan ho nnwom,na Awurade anuonyam yɛ kɛse.
138.6: Ɛwɔ mu sɛ Awurade wɔ ɔsorosoro de, nanso ɔhwɛ mmɔborɔfo,na ahantanfo de, ohu wɔn wɔ akyirikyiri.
138.7: Ɛwɔ mu sɛ menam ɔhaw mu de,nanso wobɔ me nkwa ho ban;woteɛ wo nsa wɔ mʼatamfo abufuw so,na wode wo nsa nifa gye me nkwa.
138.8: Awurade bɛma nea wahyehyɛ ama me no aba mu;Awurade, wʼadɔe wɔ hɔ daa,nnyaa wo nsa ano nnwuma akyidi.

139.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade, woahwehwɛ me muna woahu me.
139.2: Wunim mʼasetena ne me sɔre;wufi akyirikyiri hu mʼadwene mu.
139.3: Wunim mʼadifi ne me nnae mu;wunim mʼakwan nyinaa mu.
139.4: Ansa na mebue mʼano akasa noAwurade, na wunim ne nyinaa dedaw.
139.5: Woakata me ho nyinaa ahyiana wobɔ me ho ban.
139.6: Saa nimdeɛ yi yɛ me nwonwa dodo,ɛkɔ soro dodo ma me sɛ medu ho.
139.7: Ɛhe na metumi afi wo honhom anim akɔ?Ɛhe na metumi aguan afi wʼanim akɔ?
139.8: Sɛ meforo soro a, wowɔ hɔ.Na mekɔsɛw me kɛtɛ wɔ asaman a, wo ni.
139.9: Sɛ mede adekyee ntaban tuna mekɔtena po akyi nohɔ a,
139.10: mpo hɔ na wo nsa begya me akɔ,na wo nsa nifa beso me mu.
139.11: Na meka se, “Ampa ara sum mmɛkata me sona hann nnan adesae ntwa me ho nhyia a,”
139.12: sum mpo nyɛ sum mma wo;na anadwo bɛhyerɛn sɛ awia;sum ne hann yɛ wo pɛ.
139.13: Na wo na wobɔɔ me honhomwonwen me wɔ me na awotwaa mu.
139.14: Mekamfo wo, efisɛ woyɛɛ me anwonwakwan so a ɛyɛ hu;wo nnwuma yɛ nwonwa.Minim ɛno yiye pa ara.
139.15: Wɔamfa me bɔbea anhintaw wobere a wɔyɛɛ me kokoa mu no;bere a wɔnwenee me wɔ asase bun mu no,
139.16: wʼani huu me, bere a meyɛ mogyatɔw no.Nna dodow a woatwa ama me no,wɔakyerɛw ne nyinaa wɔ wo nhoma muansa na mu baako reba mu.
139.17: Onyankopɔn, wo nsusuwii som bo ma me!woka ne nyinaa bɔ mu a, ɛtrɛw dodo!
139.18: Sɛ mise mɛkan a,ne dodow bɛboro mpoano nwea,sɛ minyan a,me ne wo wɔ hɔ ara.
139.19: Sɛ anka, Onyankopɔn, wubekunkum amumɔyɛfo ɛ!Mumfi me so, mo a moyɛ mogyapɛfo!
139.20: Wɔde adwemmɔne ka wo ho asɛm;wʼatamfo mmmɔ wo din pa.
139.21: Awurade, metan wɔn a wɔtan wo,na mikyi wɔn a wɔsɔre tia wo no ana?
139.22: Minni hwee sɛ ɔtan a mewɔ ma wɔn;mefa wɔn sɛ mʼatamfo.
139.23: Hwehwɛ me mu, Onyankopɔn, na hu me koma;sɔ me hwɛ, na hu mʼadwene.
139.24: Hwɛ sɛ bɔne bi wɔ me mu a,na di mʼanim fa daa nkwa kwan so.

140.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade, gye me fi nnebɔneyɛfo nsam;bɔ me ho ban fi basabasayɛfo nsam,
140.2: wɔn a wodwen bɔne wɔ wɔn koma muna wɔhwanyan ɔko mu da biara.
140.3: Wɔsew wɔn tɛkrɛma ano te sɛ ɔwɔ de;nhurutoa bɔre wɔ wɔn ano.
140.4: Awurade, yi me fi amumɔyɛfo nsam;bɔ me ho ban fi basabasayɛfo awodwen sɛ wobetwintwan mʼanan mu no ho.
140.5: Ahantanfo asum me afiri;wɔatrɛtrɛw wɔn asau ahama muwɔasunsum me mfiri wɔ me kwan so.
140.6: Awurade, meka kyerɛ wo se, “Wone me Nyankopɔn.”Awurade, tie me mmɔborɔsu.
140.7: Otumfo Awurade, me gyefo hoɔdenfo,wokata me ti so wɔ ɔko da,
140.8: nyɛ amumɔyɛfo abisade mma wɔn, Awurade;mma wɔn nhyehyɛe nnyɛ yiye.
140.9: Wɔatwa me ho ahyia,nanso, ma amumɔyɛsɛm a efi wɔn anom no nsɛe wɔn.
140.10: Ma nnyansramma ngu wɔn so;ma wɔntow wɔn ngu ogya mu,ngu dontori amoa mu a wɔrensɔre bio.
140.11: Mma dinsɛefo ase ntim asase no so;ma amanehunu ntaataa kitikitiyɛfo.
140.12: Minim sɛ Awurade bu ahiafo atɛntreneena odi onnibi asɛm ma no.
140.13: Ampa ara, atreneefo bɛkamfo wo dinna wɔn a wɔnam tee no bɛtena nkwa mu wɔ wʼanim.

141.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade, misu frɛ wo, bra me nkyɛn ntɛm so.Sɛ misu frɛ wo a, gye me so.
141.2: Ma me mpaebɔ mmra wʼanim sɛ aduhuam;ma me nsa a mema so no nyɛ sɛ anwummere afɔrebɔ.
141.3: Awurade, ma ɔwɛmfo nwɛn mʼano;na wɛn mʼano pon.
141.4: Mma wɔnntwe me koma nnkɔ nea ɛyɛ bɔne ho,na ankɔyɛ nea amumɔyɛfo yɛ no bi,mma me ne abɔnefonni wɔn nnɔkɔnnɔkɔwade.
141.5: Ma ɔtreneeni mmɔ me, ɛyɛ ayamye;ma ɔnka mʼanim, ɛyɛ me ti so ngo.Me ti rempo.Me mpaebɔ da so tia abɔnefo nneyɛe daa.
141.6: Wɔbɛtow wɔn sodifo afi ɔbotan so abɛhwe fam;na amumɔyɛfo behu sɛ me nsɛm no yɛ nokware.
141.7: Wɔbɛka se, “Sɛnea obi funtum na otutu asase no,saa ara na wɔabɔ yɛn nnompe ahwete ɔda ano.”
141.8: Nanso Otumfo Awurade, mʼani wɔ wo so;wo mu na mihintaw, nnyaw me mma owu.
141.9: Bɔ me ho ban fi mfiri a wɔasunsum me no ho,mfiri a abɔnefo asunsum no.
141.10: Ma amumɔyɛfo no ankasa ɔtan nyi wɔn,bere a mitwa mu kɔ dwoodwoo no.

142.1: Dwom Dawid de. Bere a na ɔwɔ ɔbodan mu no. Mpaebɔ.Meteɛ mu su frɛ Awurade;mema me nne so su frɛ Awurade sɛ onhu me mmɔbɔ.
142.2: Mihwie mʼahiasɛm gu nʼanim;meka me haw kyerɛ no.
142.3: Sɛ me kra tɔ beraw wɔ me mu a,ɛyɛ wo na wunim me kwan.Ɔkwan a menam so nonnipa asum me afiri.
142.4: Hwɛ na hu, obiara nni me nifa so;mʼasɛm mfa obiara ho;minni guankɔbea bi;me nkwa mfa obiara ho.
142.5: Awurade, misu frɛ wo;mise, “Wone me guankɔbea,me kyɛfa wɔ ateasefo asase so.”
142.6: Tie me sufrɛ,na mewɔ ahohia kɛse mu;gye me fi mʼataafo nsam,efisɛ wɔn ho yɛ den sen me.
142.7: Yi me fi mʼafiase,na makamfo wo din.Afei atreneefo betwa me ho ahyiaesiane wo papa a woayɛ me no nti.

143.1: Dwom Dawid dwom.Awurade, tie me mpaebɔ,tie me mmɔborɔsu;fi wo nokwaredi ne trenee mubra bɛboa me.
143.2: Mfa wʼakoa nkɔ atemmu mu,na ɔteasefo biara nteɛ wɔ wʼanim.
143.3: Ɔtamfo no taa me,ɔbɔ me hwe fam;ɔma me tena sum mute sɛ wɔn a wowuwuu dedaada.
143.4: Ɛno nti me honhom atɔ beraw wɔ me mu;na me koma di yaw wɔ me mu.
143.5: Mekae tete nna no;midwinnwen wo nnwumane nea wo nsa ayɛ nyinaa ho.
143.6: Mema me nsa so kyerɛ wo;wo ho sukɔm de me kra sɛ asase kesee.
143.7: Awurade, gye me so ntɛm;me honhom tɔ piti.Mfa wʼanim nhintaw meanyɛ saa a mɛyɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔkɔ amoa mu no.
143.8: Ma mente wʼadɔe a ɛnsa da no ho asɛm daa anɔpa,na mede me ho ato wo so.Kyerɛ me ɔkwan a memfa so,na wo na mema me kra so kyerɛ.
143.9: Awurade gye me fi mʼatamfo nsam,na wo mu na mede me ho hintaw.
143.10: Kyerɛ me na menyɛ wʼapɛde,na wo ne me Nyankopɔn;ma wo honhom pa nonkogya me asasetaw so.
143.11: Awurade, wo din nti, kyɛe me nkwa so;wo trenee mu, yi me fi ɔhaw mu.
143.12: Fi wʼadɔe a ɛnsa da no mu mua mʼatamfo ano;na sɛe wɔn a wokyi me no nyinaa,na meyɛ wo somfo.

144.1: Dwom Dawid de.Nkamfo nka Awurade, me Botan,nea ɔma me nsa akodi ho ntetewee,ne me nsateaa ma ɔsa.
144.2: Ɔyɛ mʼadɔe Nyankopɔn ne mʼabandennen,me bammɔ ne me gyefo,me kyɛm a mewɔ guankɔbea wɔ no mu,ɔno na ɔka nnipa hyɛ mʼase.
144.3: Awurade, hena ne onipa a wʼani ku no hoonipa ba a wudwen ne ho yi?
144.4: Onipa te sɛ ɔhome;ne nna te sɛ sunsuma a ɛretwa mu.
144.5: Awurade, fi ɔsoro hɔ na sian bra fam;fa wo nsa ka mmepɔw, na emfi wusiw.
144.6: Soma anyinam na bɔ atamfo no hwete;to wo mmɛmma no ma wonguan.
144.7: Teɛ wo nsa fi ɔsoro bra fam;gye me na yi mefi nsu akɛse ho,fi ananafo nsam,
144.8: wɔn a atoro ayɛ wɔn anom ma,na wɔn nsa nifa yɛ nnaadaa.
144.9: Onyankopɔn, mɛto dwom foforo ama wo;mɛto dwom wɔ sanku a ahama du gu so so ama wo,
144.10: ama Ɔbaako a ɔde nkonimdi ma ahemfo,na ogye ne somfo Dawid fi afoawerɛmfo ano.
144.11: Gye me na yi me fiananafo nsam,wɔn a atoro ayɛ wɔn anom mana wɔn nsa nifa yɛ nnaadaa.
144.12: Afei yɛn mmabarima mmerantebere mubɛyɛ sɛ afifide a wɔahwɛ so yiye,na yɛn mmabea bɛyɛ sɛ aduma wɔasen de asiesie ahemfi.
144.13: Yɛn asan bɛyɛ amaama;aduan ahorow biara bɛba so.Yɛn nguan dodow so bɛto mpem mpem,wɔn so bɛto mpem du du wɔ yɛn mfuw so;
144.14: yɛn anantwi bɛtwe nnesoa duruduru.Wɔrennwiriw afasu,yɛrenkɔ nkoasom mu,na agyaadwotwa remma yɛn mmɔnten so.
144.15: Nhyira nka nnipa a ɛbɛba mu saa ama wɔn.Nhyira nka nnipa a wɔn Nyankopɔn ne Awurade.

145.1: Dwom Ayeyi dwom. Dawid de.Mɛma wo so, me Nyankopɔn, Ɔhenkɛse;mɛkamfo wo din daa daa.
145.2: Da biara, mɛkamfo wo;na mama wo din so daa daa.
145.3: Awurade so, na ɔsɛ nkamfo kɛse;obiara ntumi nsusuw ne kɛseyɛ.
145.4: Awo ntoatoaso baako bɛkamfo wo nnwuma akyerɛ afoforo;wɔbɛka wo nnwuma akɛse ho asɛm.
145.5: Wɔbɛka wʼanuonyam ne wo tumi a ɛheran no ho asɛm,na mɛdwene wʼanwonwadwuma ho.
145.6: Wɔbɛka wo nnwuma a ɛyɛ hu no mu tumi ho asɛm;na mapae mu aka wo nneyɛe akɛse no akyerɛ.
145.7: Wɔbɛhyɛ wo papayɛ mmoroso no ho fa,na wɔde anigye ato wo trenee ho dwom.
145.8: Awurade yɛ ɔdomfo ne mmɔborɔhunufo;ne bo kyɛ fuw na nʼadɔe dɔɔso.
145.9: Awurade ye ma obiara;na ɔwɔ ahummɔbɔ ma nʼabɔde nyinaa.
145.10: Awurade, wʼabɔde nyinaa bɛkamfo wo;na wʼahotefo bɛma wo so.
145.11: Wɔbɛka wʼahenni no anuonyam ho asɛmna wɔaka wo mmaninyɛ ho asɛm,
145.12: sɛ ɛbɛyɛ a nnipa behu wo nnwuma akɛsene wʼahenni anuonyam a ɛheran no.
145.13: Wʼahenni yɛ daa ahenni,na wo tumidi wɔ hɔ ma awo ntoantoaso nyinaa.Awurade di ne bɔhyɛ nyinaa so,na ɔwɔ ɔdɔ ma biribiara a wayɛ.
145.14: Awurade wowaw wɔn a wɔhwe asena ɔpagyaw wɔn a wɔn nnesoa ama wɔakom.
145.15: Aniwa nyinaa hwɛ wo kwan,na woma wɔn, wɔn aduan wɔ ne bere mu.
145.16: Wubue wo nsam,na woma biribiara a ɛwɔ nkwa no nʼapɛde.
145.17: Awurade teɛ wɔ nʼakwan nyinaa mu;na ɔyɛ adɔe ma nea wayɛ nyinaa.
145.18: Awurade bɛn wɔn a wɔfrɛ no nyinaa,wɔn a wɔfrɛ no nokware mu nyinaa.
145.19: Ɔyɛ wɔn a wosuro no no apɛde ma wɔn;otie wɔn sufrɛ na ogye wɔn.
145.20: Awurade hwɛ wɔn a wɔdɔ no no nyinaa so,nanso amumɔyɛfo de, ɔbɛsɛe wɔn nyinaa.
145.21: Mʼano bɛkamfo Awurade.Ma abɔde nyinaa nkamfo ne din kronkron nodaa daa.

146.1: Dwom Monkamfo Awurade.Me kra, kamfo Awurade!
146.2: Mɛkamfo Awurade me nkwanna nyinaa;mɛto ayeyi dwom ama me Nyankopɔn, sɛ mete ase yi.
146.3: Mommfa mo ho nto mmapɔmma so,adesamma a wɔrentumi nnye nkwa.
146.4: Sɛ wɔn honhom tu kɔ a, wɔsan kɔ dɔte mu,saa da no ara wɔn nsusuwii nyinaa yɛ ɔkwa.
146.5: Nhyira ne nea ne boafo ne Yakob Nyankopɔn,nea nʼanidaso wɔ Awurade, ne Nyankopɔn mu.
146.6: Ɔno ne ɔsoro ne asase Yɛfo,po ne biribiara a ɛwɔ mu nyinaaAwurade a ɔyɛ nokwafo daa no.
146.7: Odi ma wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so,na ɔma wɔn a ɔkɔm de wɔn aduan.Awurade gyaa nneduafo,
146.8: Awurade ma anifuraefo hu ade.Awurade ma wɔn a wɔakom no so,Awurade dɔ atreneefo.
146.9: Awurade hwɛ ahɔho so,na ɔwowaw ayisaa ne akunafo,na amumɔyɛfo akwan de, ɔdan ani.
146.10: Awurade di hene daa daa,Ao, Sion, wo Nyankopɔn, wɔ awo ntoatoaso nyinaa so.Monkamfo Awurade.

147.1: Dwom Monkamfo Awurade.Eye sɛ wɔto ayeyi nnwom ma yɛn Nyankopɔn,ɛyɛ fɛ na ɛfata dodo sɛ wɔkamfo no!
147.2: Awurade kyekyere Yerusalem;Ɔboaboa Israel nnommum ano.
147.3: Ɔsa wɔn a wɔn koma abotow no yare,na ɔkyekyere wɔn akuru.
147.4: Ɔkyerɛ nsoromma dodow a ɛwɔ hɔ,na ɔde obiara din frɛ no.
147.5: Yɛn Awurade so, na ne tumi yɛ kɛse;yɛrente nʼase nwie.
147.6: Awurade wowaw ahobrɛasefona ɔtotow amumɔyɛfo hwehwe fam.
147.7: Monto aseda nnwom mma Awurade.Momfa sanku nto dwom mma yɛn Nyankopɔn.
147.8: Ɔde omununkum kata ɔsoro ani;ɔma asase osuma sare nyin wɔ nkoko so.
147.9: Ɔma anantwi aduan,na sɛ kwaakwaadabimma su a, ɔma wɔn aduan.
147.10: Ɛnyɛ ɔpɔnkɔ ahoɔden na nʼani sɔna ɛnyɛ onipa ahoɔden nso.
147.11: Na mmom, Awurade ani sɔ nnipa a wosuro no,wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho to nʼadɔe a ɛnsa da no so no.
147.12: Momma Awurade so, Yerusalem;kamfo wo Nyankopɔn, Sion,
147.13: ɔma wʼapon akyi adaban yɛ den,na ohyira wo nkurɔfo a wɔte wo mu.
147.14: Ɔma wʼahye so dwo,na ɔde awi ankasa ma wo.
147.15: Ɔsoma nʼahyɛde kɔ asase so;nʼasɛm tu mmirika ntɛm so.
147.16: Ɔtrɛw sukyerɛmma mu sɛ oguan ho nwi,na ɔpete obosu sukyerɛmma sɛ nsõ.
147.17: Ɔtotow mparuwbo gu fam sɛ mmosea.Hena na obetumi agyina nʼawɔw dennen no ano?
147.18: Ɔsoma nʼasɛm no ma ɛnan no;ɔhwanyan ne mframa, na nsu sen.
147.19: Wada nʼasɛm adi akyerɛ Yakob,ne mmara ne ɔhyɛ nsɛm akyerɛ Israel.
147.20: Ɔnyɛɛ eyi maa ɔman foforo biara ɛ;wonnim ne mmara.Monkamfo Awurade!

148.1: Dwom Monkamfo Awurade!Monkamfo Awurade mfi ɔsorosoro,monkamfo no wɔ ɔsoro sorɔnsorɔmmea.
148.2: Nʼabɔfo nyinaa, monkamfo no,ne ɔsoro asafo nyinaa, monkamfo no.
148.3: Owia ne ɔsram, monkamfo no,nsoromma a ɛhyerɛn nyinaa, monkamfo no.
148.4: Monkamfo no, ɔsoro mu sorone mo nsu a mowɔ ɔsoro atifi.
148.5: Momma wɔn nyinaa nkamfo Awurade din,efisɛ ɔno na ɔhyɛ ma wɔbɔɔ wɔn.
148.6: Ɔde wɔn sisii hɔ afebɔɔ;na ɔmaa ɔhyɛ nsɛm bi a ɛrentwa mu da.
148.7: Monkamfo Awurade mfi asase so,mo po kɛse mu abɔde ne po bun nyinaa,
148.8: anyinam ne mparuwbo, sukyerɛmma ne omununkum,ahum a moyɛ nʼapɛde,
148.9: mo mmepɔw ne nkoko nyinaa,nnua a ɛsow aba ne sida nyinaa,
148.10: nwura mu mmoa ne anantwi,abɔde nketewa ne nnomaa a wotu,
148.11: asase ne amanaman nyinaa so ahemfo,mo mmapɔmma ne asase sodifo nyinaa,
148.12: mmerante ne mmabaa,mmasiriwa ne mmofra nso.
148.13: Ma wɔnkamfo Awurade din,na ne din so sen din biara;nʼanuonyam korɔn wɔ asase ne ɔsoro so.
148.14: Wapagyaw mmɛn bi ama ne nkurɔfo,nʼahotewfo nyinaa nkamfo;Israelfo, nnipa a wɔda ne koma so no nkamfo.Monkamfo Awurade.

149.1: Dwom Monkamfo Awurade.Monto dwom foforo mma Awurade,monkamfo no wɔ ahotefo asafo mu.
149.2: Ma Israel ani nnye ne Yɛfo mu.Ma Sion mma ani nnye wɔn Hene mu.
149.3: Ma wɔmfa asaw nkamfo ne dinna wɔmfa sanku ne akasaa nto dwom mma no.
149.4: Na Awurade ani sɔ ne nkurɔfo;ɔde nkwagye kyɛw hyɛ ahobrɛasefo.
149.5: Momma ahotefo nni ahurusi wɔ anuonyam yi mu;na wɔnto ahosɛpɛw dwom wɔ wɔn mpa so.
149.6: Onyankopɔn nkamfo nhyɛ wɔn anom,na ɛnyɛ afoa anofanu wɔ wɔn nsam,
149.7: sɛ wɔmfa ntɔ were wɔ amanaman no sone asotwe wɔ nnipa no so,
149.8: sɛ wɔmfa nyɛ nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn nkyekyere wɔn ahemfo,ne dade mpokyerɛ ngu wɔn atitiriw,
149.9: sɛ wɔmfa mmu atɛn, sɛnea wɔakyerɛw atia wɔn no.Eyi ne nʼahotewfo nyinaa anuonyam.Monkamfo Awurade.

150.1: Dwom Monkamfo Awurade.Monkamfo Awurade wɔ ne kronkronbea;monkamfo no wɔ ɔsoro tumi mu.
150.2: Monkamfo no wɔ ne tumi mu nneyɛe ho;monkamfo no wɔ ne kɛseyɛ a ɛboro biribiara so no ho.
150.3: Momfa torobɛnto nnyigyei nkamfo no,momfa asanku ne bɛnta nkamfo no,
150.4: momfa akasaa ne asaw nkamfo no,momfa sankuten ne atɛntɛbɛn nkamfo no,
150.5: momfa kyɛnkyɛn mmobɔmu so nkamfo no,momfa kyɛnkyɛn nnyigyei nkamfo no.
150.6: Momma nea ɛhome nyinaa nkamfo Awurade.Monkamfo Awurade.
